Question: aym ayl
Answer: aym ayl mtadd chyzawn ka hawalha dy sakta hay ، bshmwl: myrl lnch: ayk wylth mynjmnt kmpny jo lwghwn ko apnay maly ahadaf kay hasawl main mdd kay liye maly mshyr aur zaaty rhanmaiy fraham krty haay۔ mlylytr: mytrk sstm main hajm kay liye pymaish ka ayk ywnt ، js main ayk hazaar mili lytr kay brabr haay۔lytr 23۔mchyn lrnngh: msanway zahaant kay andr mtaalaha ka ayk shabha jo alghwrthm aur madal tyar karnay par mrkwza hay jo kmpywtr ya mshynwn ko wazuha tawr par prwghramda 4. aym ayl prwghramngh zaban kay baghair ، aadad wa shmar par mbny pysh ghwiyan aur fysalay karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔zaban 5. dyghr: aym ayl dusri chyzawn ka bhi hawalha dy sakta hay ، jesay maly kay liye aaly stahay antrnyt dawmyn ، kmpywtr kay sntrl prwsysngh ywnt (sy py yw) ، ya markszam-lynn azam ko braha rast hadayat ، kmywnst aaiydayalwjy 5.1ml2cambridge3cancer4wikepedia5wikeipedia ki ayk shkl۔

Question: zayr nghrany aur ghair nghrany sykhnay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: zayr nghrany aur ghair nghrany shuda sykhnay main mshyn sykhnay kay do aham tarykay hain jo madal ko trbyt denay aur pysh ghwiyan karnay kay liye dayta ka astamal karnay kay tarykay sy mkhtlf hayn۔nghrany aur ghair zayr nghrany sykhnay kay mabyn klydy akhtlafat yeh hayn: nghrany sykhnay: madalza ko trbyt denay kay liye lybl laga hoa un pt aur aaؤt pt dayta astamal krta haay۔ mksad yeh hay keh aadad wa shmar aur mtalwbha aaؤt pt kay nmwnay ko dykhtay hoey ، un pt aur aaؤt pt kay mabyn talkat ko bhatr bnata haay۔aadad wa shmar main kabl mshahadha۔ lybl laga hoa "trynngh" dayta madal ko pysh ghwiyan ya fysalay karnay kay liye skhanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jab nya dayta pysh kya jata haay۔ zayr nghrany sykhnay kay liye kamn kay astamal kay maamlat drjha bndy aur rjat psndanha hayn۔kywnkha aaؤt pt pehlay hi malwm hay ، trbyt kay tarykha kar ko zayada sydha bnana۔ ghair mhafwza sykhnay: madalza ko trbyt denay kay liye lybl laga hoa un pt aur aaؤt pt dayta astamal nahin krta haay۔ mksad yeh hay keh dayta pwaints kay ayk syt main mwjwd kdrty dahanchay ka andazaha lghaya jaiay۔dayta aur madal ko malwmat ko dryaft karnay kay liye apnay tawr par kam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ghair nghrany sykhnay kay liye kamn astamal kay maamlat tlashy tjzayha aur jhaty main kami hayn۔ ghair mhafwza sykhnay kay alghwrthm aap ko nghrany ki talym kay mkablay main zayada pychydha prwsysngh kam anjam denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔dyghr kdrty lrnngh ghhary sykhnay aur kmk sykhnay kay tarykwn kay sath mwazanha۔ khlasaha main ، nghrany sykhnay sy madalza ko pysh ghwiyan karnay ya fysalay karnay kay liye lybl laga hoa dayta astamal kya jata hay ، jabky ghair mnzam sykhnay sy aadad wa shmar kay andr nmwnwn aur talkat ko dryaft karnay kay liye ghair mnkwlha aadad wa shmar ka astamal hawta haay۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main tasab-mkhtlf tjart ki tjart ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: tasab-mkhtlf tjart ka tjart mshyn lrnngh ka ayk bnyady tsawr hay jo madal ki tasab aur tghyr ko kam karnay ki salahayt kay mabyn tjart sy mrad haay۔tasab mshyn lrnngh madal aur sahayha kdr kay zaryaha akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay darmiyan frk hay ، jabky mkhtlf aadad wa shmar kay liye madal pyshn ghwiy ki tghyr hay ya aysy kdr jo hamain hamary dayta ko phylanay kay baray main btaty haay۔aaly tasab wala madal bohat aasan hay aur trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ko achhy tarah sy ft nahin rkhta hay ، js ki wjha sy kam ftngh hawty hay ، jabky aaly tghyr ka ayk madal bohat pychydha hawta hay aur trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ko bhi achhy tarah sy ft krta hay ، js ki wjha sy zayada mnasb hawta haay۔mksad yeh hay keh ayk zayada sy zayada madal bnanay kay liye tasab aur tghyr kay mabyn mythy jghha tlash ki jaiay۔tasab-mkhtlf tjart ki tjart main zayr nghrany sykhnay main ayk mrkzay msilha hay ، aur jab kesi bhi mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm main drstghy ki bat aaty hay tou pysh ghwiy ki ghltaywn (tasab aur tghyr) ko smjhna zurwry haay۔an ghltaywn ko smjhnay sy ، hum alghwrthm ki trbyt kay doran dayta syt kay zayada mnasb aur kam ftngh sy bch saktay hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، tasab-tghyrat ka tjart ayk mwsar aur drst madal bnanay kay l over zayada mnasb aur kam ftngh kay mabyn sahayha twazan tlash karnay kay baray main haay۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main kis had tak zayada mnasb hay aur isy kesay rwka jaskta haay؟
Answer: mshyn sykhnay main zayada sy zayada ftngh ayk aam msilha hay jahan trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par ayk madal ko bohat achhy tarah sy trbyt di jati hay ، js ki wjha sy niay ، nzar nah aanay waly aadad wa shmar par naksa karkrdghy hawty haay۔awwr ftngh is wkt hawty hay jab koi madal bohat pychydha hawta hay aur bnyady nmwnwn ki bjaiay trbyt kay aadad wa shmar main shwr ko apni ghrft main la jata haay۔mndrjha zayl tknykwn ka astamal krkay zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwka jaskta haay: kras twsayk: zurwrt sy zayada ftngh sy bchnay kay liye sab sy taaktwr khsawsayat main sy ayk kras twsayk haay۔as kay pychhay khyal yeh hay keh abtdaiy trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ko niay dayta par madal ki karkrdghy ko janchnay kay liye astamal kya jaiay۔as sy hatmy pysh ghwiy par asar prata hay jab aap madal bnatay hayn۔ ryghwlraizayshn: ryghwlraizayshn un tarykwn ka ayk ghrwp hay jo sykhnay kay alghwrthm ko madal ko aasan bnanay par mjbwr krta haay۔brahaway ko daytasyt kay saiza ko msanway tawr par brahanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ fychr ka antkhab: khsawsayt ka antkhab madal main astamal kay l relevant mtalkha khsawsayat kay sab syt ko mntkhb karnay ka ayk aml haay۔ prtwn ko khtm karna ya ywntwn ki tadad fy prt: prtwn ko hatana ya tadad ko kam karna ya tadad ko kam karna ya tadad ko kam krnaywnt fy prt madal ko aasan bna saktay hain aur zayada sy zayada ftngh ko kam krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، mkhtlf tknykwn jesay kras twsayk ، abtdaiy astapngh ، ktaiy ، bakaadghy ، jwranay ، aadad wa shmar ko brahanay ، khsawsayt ka antkhab ، aur thawn ki tadad ko kam karnay kay zaryaha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwka jaskta haay۔ywnt fy prt

Question: mshyn lrnngh paip lain main shaml akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mshyn lrnngh paip lain un akdamat ka ayk slslha hay jo mshyn lrnngh madal kay zaryaha prwsysngh kay liye dayta tyar karnay kay liye anjam dyiay jatay hayn۔paip lain aap kay pas dstyab dayta ki ksm ki bnyad par mkhtlf hawskty hay ، lekin aam tawr par mndrjha zayl akdamat shaml karty hayn: dayta aktha krna: pehla kdm woh dayta aktha karna hay jsay aap mshyn lrnngh madal ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal karna chahti hayn۔aadad wa shmar mkhtlf zaraia sy aasktay hain ، jesay CSV failyn ، dayta bys ، APIs ، IOT synsr ، aur dyghr۔ dayta pry prwsysngh: is mrhalay main ، kham dayta aktha kya jata hay aur isy ayk hi mnzam frym wrk main zum kya jata haay۔as mrhalay main dayta ki safaiy ، dayta ko narmlaizayshn ، aur dayta transfarmyshn shaml haay۔ fychr anjynirngh: fychr anjynirngh mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta syt sy anthaaiy mtalkha khsawsayat ko mntkhb karnay aur tbdyl karnay ka aml haay۔ madal ka antkhab: madal kay antkhab main antkhab shaml hawta haay۔bhatryn alghwrthm ya madal jo un pt dayta ki bnyad par aaؤt pt ki drst pyshn ghwiy krskta haay۔as mrhalay main mshyn lrnngh kay mnasb alghwrthm ka antkhab karna ، haaiprprmy mytrza trtyb dena ، aur madal ki trbyt shaml haay۔ pysh ghwiy ki nsl: ayk bar madal ki trbyt haasal karnay kay bad ، is ko niay dayta par pysh ghwiyan pyda karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay kay liye ، yeh zurwry hay keh kras anjam dyn-twsayk ، abtdaiy rkna ، ktaiy ، bakaadghy ، jwranay ، aadad wa shmar main azuafha ، khsawsayt ka antkhab ، aur fy prt par thawn ya akaiywn ki tadad ko kam krna۔mshyn lrnngh paip lain ko wkt kay sath jma krdha kham aadad wa shmar kay mslsl slslay par karrwaiy karnay kay liye khwdkar bnaya jaskta hay ، js sy mstkl tawr par sykhnay wala nzaam pyda hawta hay jo hamyshha tazaha aadad wa shmar sy sykhta rhata hay aur askyl par hakyky wkt ki asalaha kay liye tazaha trien pysh ghwiyan pyda krta haay۔

Question: drjha bndy kay kamwn main astamal shuda aham tshkhysay mytrks kya hayn؟
Answer: drjha bndy kay kamwn main mtadd tshkhysay mytrks astamal hawty hain ، jn main shaml hayn: drstghy: janch pratal waly mkdmat ki kal tadad main hakyky ntaij ka tnasb۔yha ayk aham drjha bndy mytrk hay aur bainry kay sath sath mlty klas ki drjha bndy kay msail 123.Confusion mytrks kay liye aasany sy mwzawn haay۔as main hakyky msabt ، hakyky mnfy ، ghalat msabt aur ghalat mnfy 243 ki tadad zaahar hawty haay۔yha madal ki sirf mtalkha dayta pwaints 243 ki nshandhay karnay ki salahayt ki pymaish krta haay۔yha madal ki tamam mtalkha dayta pwaints 243.f1-askwr ki shnakht karnay ki salahayt ki pymaish krta haay: sahat sy mtalk aur yad ka haarmwnk mtalb۔yha ayk wahad mytrk hay jo sahat sy mtalk aur yadghary dono ko ykja krta haay۔ aar aw sy wkr: bainry drjha bndy ki karkrdghy ki ghrafykl nmaindghy۔yha mkhtlf had ki trtybat 5.auc main ghalat msabt shrha kay khlaf hakyky msabt shrha ko plat krta haay: aar aw sy wkr kay that alakha۔yha ayk wahad mytrk hay jo bainry drjha bndy ki karkrdghy ka khlasaha hr mmkn had ki trtybat 253 main krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، drjha bndy kay kamwn main astamal hony wali aham tshkhysay mytrks drstghy ، knfywzen mytrks ، sahat sy mtalk ، yaddasht ، ayf 1 askwr ، aar aw sy wkr ، aur aay yw sy hayn۔yha mytrks drjha bndy alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay main mdd karty hain aur mkhtlf madalza ka mwazanha karnay aur dyiay gaye msilay kay liye bhatryn antkhab karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: kras twsayk kya hay aur mshyn lrnngh main yeh kyon karaamd haay؟
Answer: kras twsayk ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mshyn lrnngh main astamal ki jati hay takha madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaskay aur is ki drstghy ko janch ki jaskay۔as main dstyab aadad wa shmar ko mtadd fwldaza ya sab syts main tksym karna ، un main sy ayk fwlda ko twsayk kay syt kay tawr par astamal karna ، aur bkyha fwldaza par madal ki trbyt shaml haay۔as aml ko mtadd bar dharaya jata hay ، hr bar twsayk kay syt kay tawr par ayk mkhtlf ghna ka astamal karty hayn۔aakhr main ، madal ki karkrdghy ka zayada mzubwta tkhmynha pyda karnay kay liye hr twsayk kay mrhalay kay ntaij ka awsta liya jata haay۔mtadd wjwhaat ki bnaa par mshyn lrnngh main kras twsayk mfyd haay: yeh mkhsawsa pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalngh kay msilay kay l an ayk mnasb madal ka mwazanha karnay aur un ka antkhab karnay main mdd krta haay۔niay ، nzar nah aanay waly aadad wa shmar pr۔ yeh ayk sy zayada twsayk kay sytwn ka astamal krkay madal ki karkrdghy ka ayk zayada drst tkhmynha fraham krta haay۔ yeh madal kay liye bhatryn haaiprprmytrza ki shnakht karnay main mdd krta hay ، jesay lrnngh ryt ، ryghwlraizayshn pyramytr ، aur pwshydha prtwn ki tadad۔madal kay pyramytrza ko tywn karnay aur is ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaiay۔ khlasaha main ، kras twsayk mshyn lrnngh main ayk mfyd tknyk hay jo madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay ، zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay aur madal kay liye bhatryn haaiprpymytrza ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krty haay۔ksy dyiay gaye msilay kay liye bhatryn madal ko mntkhb karnay aur madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye yeh ayk taaktwr twl haay۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main bakaadghy aur mamwl par lanay kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mshyn lrnngh main bakaadghy aur mamwl par lena do aham tknyk hayn۔bakaadghy aur mamwl par lanay kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: bakaadghy: bakaadghy sy madal pychydghy kay liye jrmanha shaml krkay mshyn lrnngh madalza main zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh azuafy malwmat shaml krkay madal ki pychydghy ko kam karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jesay Ajrmanay ki asatalaha ، nksaan ki tkryb myn۔ ryghwlraizayshn ki tknykwn main L1 ، L2 ، darap aaؤt ، aur bych ko mamwl par lana shaml haay۔ ryghwlraizayshn madal kay tghyr ko kam karnay aur is ki amwmy salahayt ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krty haay۔ narmlaizayshn: mamwl ki ayk aysy tknyk hay jo un pt ki khsawsayat ko A main askyl karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔mshyn lrnngh madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l similar isi tarah ki had۔ is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh tamam un pt khsawsayat main ayk hi pymanay aur had hawty hay ، jo trbyt kay doran madal ki tshkyl ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔ narmlaizayshn ki tknykwn main kam sy kam myks askylngh ، zayda askwr shaml hayn۔narmlaizayshn ، aur lagh transfarmyshn۔ narmlaizayshn trynngh kay doran madal kay asthakam aur hum aahanghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krty haay۔ khlasaha main ، bakaadghy aur mamwl kay mtaabk madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mshyn lrnngh main astamal hony wali do aham tknyk hayn۔bakaadghy sy madal ki pychydghy kay liye jrmanay ko shaml krkay zurwrt sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky mamwl par aanay ka astamal un pt khsawsayat ko isi tarah ki had main pymanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay takha trbyt kay doran madal ki tshkyl ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main fychr askylngh ka mksad kya hay aur kon sy tknyk astamal ki jaskty haay؟
Answer: fychr askylngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mshyn lrnngh main astamal ki jati hay takha aadad wa shmar main mwjwd aazaad khsawsayat ko ayk mkrrha had main mayary bnaya jaskay۔yha anthaaiy mkhtlf tawl wa arzu ya akdar ya akaiywn ko snbhalnay kay liye pry prwsysngh kay aadad wa shmar kay doran anjam diya jata haay۔fychr askylngh ka mksad yeh ykyny bnana hay keh tamam un pt khsawsayat main ayk hi pymanay aur had hawty hay ، jo trbyt kay doran madal ki tshkyl ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔fychr askylngh kiy wjwhaat ki bnaa par mshyn lrnngh main mfyd haay: is sy mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm kay msail sy bchnay main mdd mlty hay jo yeh frzu karty hain keh bray akdar ko zayada sy zayada wzan diya jana chahaiay۔ is sy trbyt kay doran madal kay asthakam aur hum aahanghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔ is sy bhatr hony main mdd mlty haay۔mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy yeh ykyny bnatay hoey keh tamam un pt khsawsayat main ayk hi pymanay aur had hawty haay۔ yahan mtadd tknykyn hain jn ko fychr askylngh kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl: bazayaft (mn myks narmlaizayshn): yeh tarykha aadad wa shmar ko ayk mkrrha rynj tak phancha dyta hay ،aam tawr par 0 aur 1. astyndardaaizayshn kay drmyan: yeh tarykha aadad wa shmar ko safr ka mtalb aur ywnt kay tghyr kay l scill is ki pymaish krta haay۔ lagh transfarmyshn: yeh tarykha ayk lwghrthmk fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko tbdyl krta haay۔ baks-kwks transfarmyshn: yeh tarykha pawr fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko tbdyl krta haay۔askylngh: yeh tarykha mydayn aur antrkwrtail rynj ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko askyl krta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، fychr askylngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mshyn lrnngh main astamal ki jati hay takha aadad wa shmar main mwjwd aazaad khsawsayat ko mayary bnaya jaskay۔yha trbyt kay doran madal kay asthakam aur hum aahanghy ko bhatr bnanay aur mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krta haay۔aysy mtadd tknykyn hain jn ko fychr askylngh kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl bazayaft ، mayary kary ، lagh transfarmyshn ، baks kwks transfarmyshn ، aur mzubwta askylngh۔

Question: K-nearrest prawsywn (KNN) alghwrthm aur is kay aham pyramytrza ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: K-nearrest prawsy (KNN) alghwrthm ayk sadha ، ghair pyramytrk ، aur zayr nghrany mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm hay jo drjha bndy aur rjat psndy dono kay msail hal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔alghwrthm aadad wa shmar main astfsar aur tamam msaalwn kay mabyn fasalay tlash krkay ، astfsar kay kryb trien msaalwn (kay) ki mkhsawsa tadad ka antkhab ، phir aksar lybl (drjha bndy ki sawrt myn) ko wwt dy kar ya lyblwn ka awsta la kar kam krta haay۔(rjat ki sawrt myn) 123. KNN alghwrthm kay aham pyramytrza yeh hayn: K: pyshn ghwiy karty wkt kryb trien prawsywn ki tadad par ghwr kryn۔alghwrthm main prawsywn ki tadad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye KNN alghwrthm main K ki kdr bohat zurwry haay۔an pt dayta ki bnyad par K-nearrest prawsywn (K-NN) alghwrthm main K ki kymt ka antkhab kya jana chahaiay۔aghr un pt dayta main zayada sy zayada bahar ya shwr hawta hay tou ، K ki aaly kymt bhatr hawghy۔drjha bndy main talkat sy bchnay kay l K K kay liye ayk ajyb kymt ka antkhab karnay ki sfarsh ki jati haay۔kras twsayk kay tarykay dyiay gaye daytasyt 412 kay liye bhatryn K wylyw ko mntkhb karnay main mdd krsktay hayn۔ dastns mytrk: fasalha mytrk do dayta pwaints kay darmiyan fasalay ki pymaish kay liye astamal hawta haay۔sb sy zayada aam tawr par astamal hony wali dwry ki pymaish ywklydayn fasalha ، mynhatn ka fasalha ، aur mnkwwsky fasalha 512 haay۔ wyt fnkshn: wzan ka fnkshn kryb prawsywn ko zayada wzan denay aur door kay prawsywn ko kam wzan denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aam tawr par astamal hony waly wzan kay afaal yksan aur fasalay par mbny wzan 12۔ khlasaha main hain ، K-nearrest prawsy (KNN) alghwrthm ayk sadha ، ghair pyramytrk ، aur nghrany shuda mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm hay jo drjha bndy aur rjat dono msail ko hal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔kay ayn ayn alghwrthm kay aham pyramytrza hain K ، fasalha mytrk ، aur wzan kay fnkshn۔an pyramytrza ka antkhab alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔

Question: bainry drjha bndy main sahat sy mtalk aur yad kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: sahat sy mtalk aur yad do aham tshkhysay mytrks hain jo bainry drjha bndy main astamal hawtay hayn۔sahat sy mtalk aur yad kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: sahat sy mtalk: sahat sy mtalk madal kay zaryaha ki hogi msabt pysh ghwiwn ki kal tadad main hakyky msabt ka tnasb haay۔ yeh madal ki sirf mtalkha dayta pwaint ki shnakht karnay ki salahayt ki pymaish krta haay۔ ayk aaly sahat sy mtalk askwr is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh is ki nshandhay krty haay۔madal kam ghalat msabt ghltayan kar raha haay۔ prysyzayshn ko ty py / (ty py + ayf py) kay tawr par hasab kya jata hay ، jahan ty py hakyky msabt ki tadad hay aur ayf py jhwtay msabt ki tadad haay۔ dwbarha kal kryn: yad rkhna kal main hakyky msabt ka tnasb haay۔aadad wa shmar main asal msabt maamlat ki tadad۔ yeh madal ki tamam mtalkha dayta pwaints ki nshandhay karnay ki salahayt ki pymaish krta haay۔ ayk aaly yad karnay wala askwr is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh madal kam ghalat mnfy ghltayan kar raha haay۔ty py hakyky msabt ki tadad hay aur ayf ayn jhwtay mnfy ki tadad haay۔ khlasaha ، sahat sy mtalk aur yad main do aham tshkhysay mytrks hain jo bainry drjha bndy main astamal hawty hayn۔sahat sy mtalk sirf mtalkha dayta pwaints ki nshandhay karnay ki madal ki salahayt ko mapta hay ، jabky yad aarhaa hay keh madal ki tamam mtalkha dayta pwaints ki nshandhay karnay ki salahayt ki pymaish krty haay۔ayk aaly sahat sy mtalk askwr is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh madal kam ghalat msabt ghltayan kar raha hay ، jabky ayk aaly yad karnay wala askwr is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh madal kam ghalat mnfy ghltayan kar raha haay۔

Question: jhaty kami kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is mksad kay liye astamal hony wali tknyk ki ayk msaal dyn۔
Answer: jhat main kami daytasyt main khsawsayat ya tawl wa arzu ki tadad ko kam karnay ka aml hay jabky zayada sy zayada malwmat ko brkrar rkhtay hawiay۔as ka astamal aadad wa shmar ko aasan bnanay aur kam karnay ، tsawr karnay aur tjzayha karnay main aasany pyda karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔mshyn sykhnay main jhat main kami aham hay kywnkha is sy sykhnay kay alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ، madal ki pychydghy ko kam karnay aur aadad wa shmar ko dykhnay main aasany pyda karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔yhaan jhaty kami kay liye astamal hony wali ayk tknyk ki ayk msaal haay: prnspl jzaw tjzayha (py sy aay): py sy aay ayk mkbwl tknyk hay jo jhaty kami kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔yha aadad wa shmar kay bnyady ajzaaa ko tlash krkay kam krta hay ، jo woh smt hain jn main aadad wa shmar main sab sy zayada mkhtlf hawta haay۔as kay bad py sy aay aadad wa shmar ko ayk nchlay jhaty zayly jghha par pysh krta hay jo aadad wa shmar main zayada tr tghyrat ko apni ghrft main la jata haay۔py sy aay ko dayta wyzenaizayshn ، fychr nkalnay ، aur dayta kmpryshn main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata haay۔yha ayk lkyry tknyk hay jo aam tawr par tksym hony par achhy tarah sy kam krty hay aur mtghyrat lkyry tawr par wabstha hawtay hayn۔ tawl wa arzu main kami kay l used astamal hony wali dusri tknykwn main shaml hayn: ty dastrybytda astakstk prawsy aymbydangh (ty sn): ty-ays ayn ay ayk nan lainr tknyk hay js kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta tsawr.yha aadad wa shmar ki kam jhaty nmaindghy tlash krkay kam krta hay jo dayta pwaints kay mabyn jwraay ki dwry ko mhafwza rkhta haay۔ lainr amtyazay tjzayha (ayl day aay): ayl day aay ayk nghrany ki tknyk hay jo khsawsayt ko nkalnay aur tawl wa arzu main kami kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔yha un khsawsayat kay lkyry amtzaaj ko tlash krkay kam krta hay jo dayta main klaswn ko bhatryn tawr par alag karty hayn۔ aatw aynkwdarza: aatw ankwdarza aasaaby nyt wrk hain jo ghair mnkwlha khsawsayt sykhnay aur jhaty kami kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔wha aadad wa shmar ki ayk kmprysda nmaindghy sykh kar kam karty hain jo asal aadad wa shmar ki tshkyl nw kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، tawl wa arzu main kami kesi daytasyt main khsawsayat ya tawl wa arzu ki tadad ko kam karnay ka aml hay jabky zayada sy zayada malwmat ko brkrar rkhtay hawiay۔py sy aay ، ty sn ، ayl day aay ، aur aatw knwdarza mshyn lrnngh main jhaty kami kay liye astamal hony wali kuch tknyk hayn۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main chalw karnay kay afaal ka kya krdar haay؟
Answer: chalw karnay kay afaal asaby nyt wrks main lazmi krdar ada karty hayn۔yha nan lainryty aasaaby nyt wrks ko un pt ki bnyad par pychydha nmaindghy aur afaal tyar karnay ki ajazat dyty hay jo ayk sadha lkyry ryghryshn madal kay zaryaha mmkn nahin hawghy۔ayktywyshn fnkshn fysalha krta hay keh aya ayk nywrwn ko chalw kya jana chahaiay ya nahin keh wzan waly rkm ka hasab ktab krkay aur is main tasab ko mazeed shaml krkay nhayn۔ayktywyshn fnkshn ka mksad nywrwn ki pydawar main adm khtaatay ko mtaarf krana haay۔ayktywyshn fnkshn ghair mtalkha dayta pwaints ko dbanay kay doran aasaaby nyt wrk ko aham malwmat astamal karnay main mdd krta haay۔ayktywyshn fnkshn ka krdar nwda (ya ayk prt) ko khlaya hoa un pt akdar kay ayk syt sy aaؤt pt haasal karna haay۔ayktywyshn fnkshn ka bnyady krdar yeh hay keh aghly pwshydha prt ko ya aaؤt pt kay tawr par khlaya jaye tou ayktywyshn fnkshn ka khlasaha wzan waly un pt ko nwda sy aaؤt pt wylyw main tbdyl karna haay۔ayktywyshn fnkshn msanway aasaaby nyt wrk ka ayk aham hasaha haay۔wha fysalha karty hain keh nyt wrk main nywrwn ka un pt aham hay ya nahin keh ryazuy ki aasan karrwaiywn ka astamal karty hoey pysh ghwiy kay aml myn۔ayktywyshn fnkshn ko mwsar hona chahaiay aur is ki ghnty kay wkt ko kam karna chahaiay kywnkha aasaaby nyt wrk bazu awkat lakhwn dayta pwaints par trbyt yaftha hawta haay۔ayktywyshn kay sab sy aam afaal main sghmaida ، TANH ، RELU ، aur saft myks ۔1 mykyn lylrngh mastr 2 aay aar ayks aai wy 3 aym jy ghrytlyirngh 4 wy 7 ayl aay by ays 5 jy ay ay ayksfwrjks shaml hayn۔

Question: asaby nyt wrks ki trbyt main byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm aur is ki ahamyt ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: msanway aasaaby nyt wrks ki trbyt kay liye byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm ayk wsya pymanay par astamal shuda alghwrthm haay۔pchhlay ahad (yany tkrar) main haasal hony wali ghltay ki shrha ki bnyad par aasaaby nyt wrk kay wzan ko thyk karnay ka yeh tarykha haay۔asaby nyt wrks ki trbyt main byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm aham hay kywnkha is sy nyt wrk ko apni ghltaywn sy sbk sykhnay aur nywran kay mabyn rabtawn kay wzan ko aydajst karnay ki ajazat mlty hay takha is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: farwrda prwpyghndaa: un pt dayta ko aasaaby nyt wrk main khlaya jata hay ، aur nyt wrk kay zaryaay un pt ko aaghay ki tshhayr kay zaryaha aaؤt pt ka hasab lghaya jata haay۔ pysh ghwiy shuda aaؤt pt aur asal kay darmiyan frkaaؤt pt ka hasab lghaya jata hay ، aur ghltay ko nyt wrk kay zaryaay pychhay ki taraf brahaya jata haay۔ bykwrda prwpyghndaha: ghltay ka astamal nyt wrk main nywran kay mabyn rabtawn kay wzan ko aydajst karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔yha nyt wrk main hr wzan kay slslay main ghltay kay mylan ka hasab lghanay aur tdryj ki mkhalf smt main wzan ko aydajst krkay kya jata haay۔ wzan kay wzan: wzan kay hasab ktab kay tdryj ki bnyad par ap dayt kya jata hay ، aur is aml ko ayk kay liye dharaya jata haay۔ahadwn ki mkhsawsa tadad ya jab tak ghltay ki shrha ko kam nahin kya jata haay۔ nywrl nyt wrks ki trbyt main byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm aham hay kywnkha is sy nyt wrk ko apni ghltaywn sy sykhnay aur nywrwn kay mabyn rabtawn kay wzan ko aydajst karnay ki ajazat mlty hay takha is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔wzan ko aydajst krkay ، nyt wrk ghltay ki shrha ko kam krskta hay aur is ki drstghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm ghhary sykhnay main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay aur bohat sy mshhawr nywrl nyt wrk fn tamyrat ki bnyad hay ، jesay knfywil nywrl nyt wrks (sy ayn ayn ays) aur bar bar nywrl nyt wrks (aar ayn ayn ays)

Question: tdryjy nzawl kya hay aur is ko mshyn lrnngh main kis tarah astamal kya jata haay؟
Answer: mylan nzawl ayk asalahay alghwrthm hay jo mshyn lrnngh main astamal kya jata hay takha madal kay wzan aur tasab ko aydajst krkay madal ki laght kay fnkshn ko kam sy kam kya jaskay۔laght ka fnkshn is bat ka ayk pymanha hay keh madal kis had tak bhatr karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krrhaa hay ، aur tdryjy nzawl ka hadf wzan aur tasab ka syt tlash karna hay jo laght kay kam ko kam sy kam karty hayn۔tdryjy nzawl alghwrthm main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: wzan aur tasab ko shrwa kryn: madal kay wzan aur tasab ko bay trtyb akdar kay sath shrwa kya jata haay۔ farwrda prwpyghndaha: un pt dayta ko madal main khlaya jata hay ، aur aaؤt pt ka hasab ktab is ki tshhayr kay zaryaay kya jata haay۔nyt wrk kay zaryaay un pt ko aaghay brahana۔wzan aur tasab kay mylan ka hasab lghaya jata haay۔ ap dayt wzan aur tasab: wzan aur tasab ka hasab ktab mylan ki bnyad par ap dayt kya jata hay ، aur is aml ko ayk mkhsawsa tadad main ahadwn ki ayk mkhsawsa tadad kay liye dharaya jata hay ya jab tak laght ka kam kam nahin hawta haay۔mshyn lrnngh main kywnkha yeh madal ko apni ghltaywn sy sbk sykhnay aur apni karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye wzan aur tasab ko aydajst karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔alghwrthm ka astamal bohat sy mshyn lrnngh madalza kay pyramytrza ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jata hay ، js main lkyry rjat ، lajstk ryghryshn ، aur aasaaby nyt wrk shaml hayn۔tdryjy nzawl ki mtadd aksam hain ، bshmwl bych mylan nzawl ، astakstk mylan nzawl ، aur mny bych tdryj nzawl ، hr ayk ko apnay fwaid aur nksaanat hayn۔

Question: jwranay waly sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur jwranay waly tarykha kar ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: jwraa lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js main madal ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l multiple ayk sy zayada madalza ki pysh ghwiyan shaml karna shaml haay۔jwraa sykhnay ka astamal madal kay tghyr aur tasab ko kam karnay aur is ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔yhaan jwranay waly tarykwn ki kuch msaalyn hayn: byghngh (bwtstryp jma krna): byghngh ayk jwranay wala tarykha hay js main trbyty aadad wa shmar kay mkhtlf zayly sytwn par mtadd madalza ki trbyt shaml hay aur un ki pysh ghwiwn ko ykja karna haay۔byghngh ka hadf madal kay tghyr ko kam karna aur is kay asthakam ko bhatr bnana haay۔ bwstngh: bwstngh ayk jwranay wala tarykha hay js main mtadd kmzawr madalza ko trtyb sy trbyt dena shaml hay ، js main hr madal pchhlay madal ki ghltaywn ko drst karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔frwgh denay ka hadf madal kay tasab ko kam karna aur is ki drstghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔ ryndam farst: ryndam farst ayk jwranay wala tarykha hay jo madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l multiple mtadd fysalha kn drkhtwn ko jwrata haay۔fysalay kay drkhtwn ko trbyt kay aadad wa shmar kay mkhtlf zayly sytwn par trbyt di jati hay ، aur un ki pysh ghwiyan hatmy pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye mil jati hayn۔ astykngh: astykngh ayk jwranay wala tarykha hay js main ayk sy zayada madalza ki trbyt aur myta madal kay un pt kay tawr par un ki pysh ghwiyan astamal karna shaml haay۔myta madal ko bys madalza ki pysh ghwiwn par trbyt di jati hay aur hatmy pysh ghwiy ki jati haay۔ mshyn sykhnay main sykhna ayk aham tknyk hay kywnkha is sy madal ki drstghy aur mzubwtay ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔jwranay waly tarykwn ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata hay ، bshmwl tsawyry shnakht ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur sfarsh kay nzaam۔

Question: jwraa sykhnay main byghngh aur frwgh denay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: byghngh aur bwstngh mshyn lrnngh main astamal hony wali do mshhawr jwra sykhnay ki tknyk hayn۔aghrchha dono tknykwn ka mksad kesi madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnana hay ، lekin woh apnay nktaha nzar main mkhtlf hayn۔byghngh aur bwstngh kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: byghngh: byghngh astyndaza bwtstryp ayghryghytngh۔ byghngh ayk mtwazay jwraa sykhnay ka tarykha haay۔ byghngh main trbyty aadad wa shmar kay mkhtlf zayly sytwn par mtadd madalza ki trbyt shaml hay aur un ki pysh ghwiy ko ykja karna haay۔awr aadad wa shmar ki drjha bndy aur rjat main astamal hony wali mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ki drstghy۔ byghngh aam tawr par fysalay kay drkhtwn kay tarykwn par laghw hawty haay۔ byghngh madal awsta nktaha nzar ka ayk khasa maamlha haay۔ byghngh zayada ftngh trynngh dayta kay msilay ko hal karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔ bwstngh ayk trtyb haay۔jwraa sykhnay ka tarykha۔ bwstngh main mtadd kmzawr madalza ki trtyb sy trbyt shaml hawty hay ، hr madal pchhlay madal ki ghltaywn ko drst karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔ bwstngh ko madal kay tasab ko kam karnay aur is ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ bwstngh sy zayada ftngh sy bchnay main mdd nahin mlty haay۔dr hakykt ، is tknyk ka khud hi is msilay ka samna karna prata haay۔ bwstngh by aai aay kay msilay ko kam karnay ki kwshsh krty haay۔ bwstngh is wkt mwsar hay jab drjha bndy karnay waly kay pas aaly by aai aay ays hawta haay۔ khlasaha ، byghngh aur bwstngh mshyn lrnngh main astamal hony wali do mkbwl jwra sykhnay ki tknyk hayn۔byghngh ayk mtwazay jwraa sykhnay ka tarykha hay js main trbyt kay aadad wa shmar kay mkhtlf zayly zakhyrwn par ayk sy zayada madalza ki trbyt aur un ki pysh ghwiyan shaml karna shaml haay۔frwgh dena ayk trtyb war sykhnay ka tarykha hay js main mtadd kmzawr madalza ko trtyb sy trbyt dena shaml hay ، hr madal pchhlay madal ki ghltaywn ko drst karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔byghngh trynngh kay aadad wa shmar kay msilay ko hal karnay ki kwshsh krta hay ، jabky BIAs kay msilay ko kam karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔

Question: mtn ki drjha bndy kay kamwn kay l natural kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) ansany zaban ko smjhnay aur is ki trjmany karnay ka aml hay kywnkha yeh bwla aur lkha hoa haay۔tykst ki drjha bndy ayn ayl py main ayk aham kam hay ، js main tykstwn ko tygh tfwyzu karna shaml hay takha inhain zamray main rkhyn۔tykst ki drjha bndy kay kamwn kay liye ayn ayl py main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta pry prwsysngh: ayn ayl py ka pehla kdm dayta pry prwsysngh hay ، js main dayta ki tyary aur safaiy shaml haay۔as main jmlay ki tksym ، lfza twknaizayshn ، kam kyasngh ، astymngh ya lymmytaizayshn ، lfza ko hatanay ، aur hajay ki asalaha jesay akdamat shaml hayn۔dayta pry prwsysngh ka hadf kham tykst dayta ko ayk zayada sakhtha shkl main tbdyl karna hay jo tjzayha kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ fychr nkalnay: aghla mrhalha fychr aykstrakshn hay ، js main pehlay sy tyar krdha tykst dayta ko addy khsawsayat kay ayk syt main tbdyl karna shaml hay jo hawskta haay۔mshyn lrnngh kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as main bygh aaf wrdaza ، ty ayf-aaiy day ayf ، aur lfza aymbydanghs jesi tknyk shaml hayn۔ madal ki trbyt: aghla mrhalha nkala hogi khsawsayat par mshyn lrnngh madal ko trbyt dena haay۔yha mkhtlf alghwrthm jesay lajstk ryghryshn ، fysalay kay drkhtwn ، aur aasaaby nyt wrks ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ madal ki tshkhysa: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur ayf 1 askwr ka astamal karty hoey madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔yha akdam is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye zurwry hay keh madal achhy karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krrhaa hay aur bhatry kay liye alakwn ki nshandhay krna۔ khlasaha main ، tykst ki drjha bndy kay kamwn kay liye ayn ayl py main dayta pry prwsysngh ، khsawsayt nkalnay ، madal ki trbyt ، aur madal ki tshkhysa shaml haay۔kham tykst dayta ko kesi aysy shkl main tbdyl karnay kay liye yeh akdamat aham hain jo mshyn lrnngh kay liye astamal hawsktay hain aur kesi aysay madal ki trbyt kay liye jo mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko drst tarykay sy mkhtlf zamrwn main drjha bndy krsktay hayn۔

Question: adm twazan waly daytasyts ko snbhalnay main kya aham chylnjza hain aur un sy kesay khtaab kya jaskta haay؟
Answer: mtwazan daytasyts ko snbhalna mshyn lrnngh main ayk aam chylnj hay ، khasa tawr par drjha bndy kay kamwn myn۔mtwazan daytasyts khrab madal ki karkrdghy ، had sy zayada ftngh ، aur aksaryty tabkay ki taraf tasab jesay msail ka sbb bn saktay hayn۔adm twazan waly daytasyts ko snbhalnay main kuch aham chylnjza hain aur un ko kis tarah hal kya jaskta haay: chylnjza: aklyty tabkay kay liye mhadwd aadad wa shmar: aklyty tabkay main mhadwd aadad wa shmar hawsktay hain ، js sy kesi aysay madal ki trbyt karna mshkl hawskta hay jo is ki drst drjha bndy krskay۔aksaryt tabkay ki tarf: madal aksaryty tabkay ki taraf mtasab hawskta hay ، js ki wjha sy aklyty tabkay par naksa karkrdghy ka baasa bnta haay۔staha ki tknyk main tabkaty tksym ko mtwazan karnay kay liye daytasyt main trmym karna shaml haay۔yha tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta hay jesay awwrsmplngh ، andarsmplngh ، aur haaibrda nmwnay lenay ky۔yha tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta hay jesay laght sy hasas sykhnay ، dhalyza mwwyngh ، aur jwraa sykhnay۔aksaryt aur aklyty klas dono par madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kryn۔ khlasaha main ، adm twazan waly daytasyts ko snbhalna mshyn lrnngh main ، khasa tawr par drjha bndy kay kamwn main ayk aam chylnj haay۔aklyty tabkay kay liye mhadwd aadad wa shmar ، aksaryty tabkay ki taraf tasab ، aur adm twazan waly daytasyts ko snbhalnay main zayada sy zayada had sy zayada aham chylnjza hayn۔aadad wa shmar ki staha ki tknyk ، alghwrthm staha ki tknyk ، aur tshkhysa mytrks ko un chylnjwn sy nmtnay aur aklyt ki klas par madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: kras ayntrwpy nksaan kay fnkshn kay tsawr aur trbyt ki drjha bndy kay madalza main is kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: drjha bndy kay kamwn kay l machine mshyn lrnngh main kras ayntrwpy nksaan ka kam aam tawr par astamal hony waly nksaan ka fnkshn haay۔yha pysh ghwiy shuda amkanat ko asal lyblwn sy mwazanha krkay drjha bndy kay madal ki karkrdghy ki pymaish krta haay۔kras ayntrwpy nksaan ka fnkshn trbyt kay doran madal kay wzan aur tasab ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔trbyt ki drjha bndy kay madalza kay liye kras ayntrwpy nksaan kay fnkshn kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: pysh ghwiy ki hogi amkanat ka hasab lghaiyn: madal un pt dayta lyta hay aur hr klas kay liye pysh ghwiy ki hogi amkanat ka hasab lghata haay۔ kras ayntrwpy nksaan ko rwkyn: kras antrwpynksaan ka hasab pysh ghwiy kay amkanat ko asal lyblwn sy mwazanha krkay kya jata haay۔nksaan is wkt zayada hawta hay jab pysh ghwiy ki janay wali amkanat asal lyblwn sy bohat door hawty hain aur jab woh kryb hawjatay hain tou wzan aur tasab ki frahamy kryn: madal kay wzan aur tasab ko byk prwpyghyshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab ktab nksaan ki bnyad par ap dayt kya jata haay۔mksad yeh hay keh nksaan ko kam sy kam kya jaye aur madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnaya jaiay۔ aml ko dwbarha pysh kryn: aml ko ayk mkhsawsa tadad kay liye dharadya jata hay ya jab tak nksaan ko kam nahin kya jata haay۔ trynngh drjha bndy kay madalza main kras ayntrwpy nksaan ka fnkshn ayk aham zaryaha haay۔kywnkha yeh madal ko apni ghltaywn sy sbk sykhnay aur apni karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye wzan aur tasab ko aydajst karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔kras ayntrwpy nksaan ka fnkshn aam tawr par lajstk rjat ، msanway aasaaby nyt wrks ، aur dyghr drjha bndy kay madalza main astamal hawta haay۔kras ayntrwpy nksaan ko kam sy kam krkay ، madal niay dayta ki drst drjha bndy krskta hay aur bhatr pysh ghwiy krskta haay۔

Question: haaipr pyramytr tywnngh ka mksad kya hay aur isy mwsar andaza main kesay kya jaskta haay؟
Answer: haaipr pyramytr tywnngh bhatryn karkrdghy ko haasal karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh madal kay liye zayada sy zayada haaiprprmytrza ka antkhab karnay ka aml haay۔haaiprprmytrza pyramytrza hain jo trbyt ka aml shrwa hony sy pehlay taay kyay jatay hain aur dayta sy nahin sykha jaskta haay۔haaiprprmytrza ki msaalwn main sykhnay ki shrha ، pwshydha prtwn ki tadad ، aur bakaadghy ki taakt shaml hayn۔haaiprprmytr tywnngh ka mksad haaiprprmy mytrza ka zayada sy zayada amtzaaj tlash karna hay jo nksaan kay fnkshn ko kam sy kam krta hay aur madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnata haay۔haaipr pyramytr tywnngh ko anjam denay kay liye kuch mwsar tarykay yeh hayn: ghrda srch: ghrda srch haaipr pyramytr tywnngh kay liye ayk aasan aur mnzam nktaha nzar haay۔as main haaipr pyra mytr ki akdar ki ayk ghrda ki wzuahat aur haaiprprmytrza kay hr amtzaaj par madal ki trbyt shaml haay۔ghrda ki tlash kmpywtyshnl tawr par mhanghy hawskty hay ، khasa tawr par jab haaiprprmytrza ki tadad bray haw۔ ryndam tlash: bay trtyb tlash haaiprprmy mytr tywnngh kay liye ayk zayada mwsar nktaha nzar haay۔as main tsaadfy tawr par haaiprprmytrza ka antkhab wzuahaty had sy mntkhb karna aur haaiprprmytrza kay hr amtzaaj par madal ki trbyt shaml haay۔bay trtyb tlash ghrda ki tlash kay mkablay main kam kmpywtyshnl tawr par mhangha hay aur jab tamam haaiprprmytrza atnay hi aham nahin hawtay hain tou zayada mwsar hawskta haay۔ aatwmytyda haaiprprmytr tywnngh: khwdkar haaiprprmytr tywnngh main zayada sy zayada haaiprprmytrza ki tlash kay liye alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawta haay۔kchh mshhawr khwdkar tarykwn main baysyin aaptymaizayshn ، jynyaty alghwrthm ، aur nywrl aarkytykchr srch shaml hayn۔ khlasaha main ، haaiprprmy mytr tywnngh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mshyn lrnngh ka ayk aham kdm haay۔ghrda ki tlash ، bay trtyb tlash ، aur khwdkar haaipr pyramytr tywnngh haaiprprmy mytr tywnngh anjam denay kay mwsar tarykay hayn۔zayadha sy zayada haaiprprmytrza ka antkhab krkay ، madal bhatr drstghy haasal krskta hay aur nksaan ki tkryb ko kam sy kam krskta haay۔

Question: klstrngh kay aml ki wzuahat karain aur klstrngh alghwrthm ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: klstrngh ayk mshyn lrnngh ki tknyk hay jo isi tarah kay dayta pwaints ko ayk sath ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha ayk ghair mnkwlha sykhnay ka tarykha hay jo aadad wa shmar main aur safaiy shaml haay۔as main narmlaizayshn ، fychr askylngh ، aur ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay jesay akdamat shaml hayn۔ fychr nkalnay: aghla mrhalha fychr nkalnay wala hay ، js main mtalkha Question: mntkly sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh mshyn lrnngh main kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: mntkly lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko dwbarha astamal karna shaml hawta hay js main mtalkha kam par niay madal kay liye nktaha aaghaza hawta haay۔transfr lrnngh ka astamal alm aur khsawsayat ko ayk kam sy dusray kam main haasal karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jo wkt aur wsail ki bcht aur madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔mshyn lrnngh main mntkly ki talym ko astamal karnay kay kuch tarykay yeh hayn: thyk twnngh: thyk twnngh main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal lena aur kesi niay kam kay l a ayk niay daytasyt par trbyt shaml haay۔pry trbyt yaftha madal kay wzan ko niay daytasyt ko ft karnay kay liye aydajst kya jata hay ، aur madal ko niay task par trbyt di jati haay۔ fychr nkalnay: khsawsayt nkalnay main un pt dayta sy khsawsayat ko nkalnay kay liye pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ka astamal aur un khsawsayat ko astamal karnay main shaml hawta haay۔ayk niay madal main un pt۔yha nktaha nzar mfyd hay jab nya daytasyt chhwta ho aur pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal nay aam khsawsayat ko sykha ho jo niay task kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔ dawmyn mwafkt: dawmyn mwafkt main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko ayk niay dawmyn main dahalna shaml hay jo is sy mtalk haay۔asal dawmyn۔yha nktaha nzar mfyd hay jab niay dawmyn main asal dawmyn sy mkhtlf khsawsayat hayn۔ transfr sykhnay ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl tsawyry shnakht ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki phachan۔mntkly ki talym main astamal hony waly kuch mshhawr pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madalza main VGG ، RESNET ، aur BERT shaml hayn۔mntkly lrnngh wkt aur wsail ki bcht aur madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti hay ، js sy mshyn lrnngh main ayk mfyd tknyk bn sakti haay۔

Question: tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye mjaza aasaaby nyt wrk (CNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye ayk mjazay aasaaby nyt wrk (sy ayn ayn) ki trbyt main mtadd akdamat shaml hain ، jn main dayta ki tyary ، madal fn tamyr ka dayzaain ، trbyt ، aur tshkhysa shaml hayn۔tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye sy ayn ayn ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: sy ayn ayn ki trbyt ka pehla kdm tsawyry dayta ko tyar karna haay۔as main tsaawyr ko yksan saiza main tbdyl karna ، pksl akdar ko mamwl bnana ، aur dayta ko trbyt ، twsayk ، aur janch main tksym karna shaml haay۔ madal aarkytykchr dayzaain: aghla mrhalha sy ayn ayn kay fn tamyr ko dayzaain karna haay۔as main thawn ki tadad ، fltrza ki jsamt ، ayktywyshn afaal ، aur pwlngh kay tarykwn ka antkhab karna shaml haay۔sy ayn ayn kay fn tamyr ko kyras ، tynsrflw ، ya paitwrch jesay twlza ka astamal karty hoey dayzaain kya jaskta haay۔ trynngh: aghla mrhalha sy ayn ayn ko trbyty aadad wa shmar par trbyt dena haay۔as main tsaawyr ko sy ayn ayn main khana khlana aur nksaan ki tkryb ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye madal kay wzan aur tasab ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔trbyt kay aml ko astakstk tdryjy nzawl ، aydam aaptymaizayshn ، ya aar aym ays py aar aw py jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ tshkhysa: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh twsayk aur janch kay sytwn par sy ayn ayn ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main mytrks ka hasab lghana shaml hay jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr۔tshkhysay aml ko abtdaiy rwknay ya sykhnay ki shrha kay nzaam alawkat jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye sy ayn ayn ki trbyt main mtadd akdamat shaml hain ، jn main dayta ki tyary ، madal fn tamyr ka dayzaain ، trbyt ، aur tshkhysa shaml haay۔an akdamat par aml karty hoey ، sy ayn ayn tsaawyr ko drst tarykay sy drjha bndy karna sykh sakta hay aur niay dayta par pysh ghwiyan krskta haay۔

Question: drjha bndy kay kamwn kay liye fysalha kn drkhtwn kay astamal kay fwaid aur nksaanat kya hayn؟
Answer: fwaid: wazuha tsawr: fysalha kn drkht smjhnay aur is ki trjmany karnay main aasan hain ، kywnkha yeh khyal zayada tr hamari rwzamrha ki zandghy main astamal hawta haay۔ksy fysalay kay drkht ki pydawar ko aasany sy ansanwn kay zaryaha trjmany ki jaskty haay۔pychydha fysalay ki hadwd bnaiyn ، inhain aasany sy ghair lkyry msail ko hal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ nwn pyramytrk: fysalay kay drkht aadad wa shmar ki tksym kay baray main koi kyas nahin karty hayn۔ trbyt ki mdt: trbyt ki mdt kam hay kywnkha yeh sirf dusray alghwrthm kay mkablay main kam hay kywnkha yeh sirf pyda krta hay kywnkha yeh sirf pyda krta haay۔ayk drkht۔ daysdawyntjza: zayada mnasb: fysalay kay drkht zayada sy zayada mnasb hony ka shkar hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh woh pychydha fysalay kay kwaad tshkyl dy saktay hain jo trbyt kay aadad wa shmar kay liye mkhsawsa hain aur niay aadad wa shmar main achhy tarah sy aam nahin karty hayn۔aadad wa shmar main tbdylywn kay liye ghair msthakm ، js ka mtalb hay keh aadad wa shmar main ayk chhwty sy tbdyly fysalay kay drkht ki sakht main ayk bray tbdyly ka sbb bn sakti haay۔ shwr kay liye ghair msthakm: fysalay kay drkht aadad wa shmar main shwr mchanay kay liye ghair msthakm hawsktay hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh chhwty chhwty mkhtlf haaltwn mynaadad wa shmar mkhtlf fysalay kay drkhtwn ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔ koi nhayn: fysalha kn drkht mstkl nahin hawtay hain ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh woh un msail kay l suitable mwzawn nahin hawsktay hain jn kay liye mstkl aaؤt pt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔had sy zayada ft hony aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay sy bchnay kay l .۔ khlasaha main ، fysalha kn drkhtwn kay mtadd fwaid hain ، jn main wazuha tsaw .rat ، bahar janay walon kay liye mzubwtay ، aur ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay ki salahayt shaml haay۔taham ، un kay mtadd nksaanat bhi hain ، jn main zayada mnasb ، aadad wa shmar main tbdylywn main adm asthakam ، aur adm asthakam shaml hayn۔fysalay kay drkht mshyn lrnngh main ayk mfyd twl saabt hawsktay hain ، lekin kesi khasa kam kay liye alghwrthm ka antkhab karty wkt un ki hadwd par ghwr kya jana chahaiay۔

Question: kmk sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur kesi drkhwast ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: kmk lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js main kesi ayjnt ki trbyt shaml hawty hay takha kesi mahawl main fysalwn ka slslha tyar kya jaskay takha anaam kay sghnl ko zayada sy zayada kya jaskay۔kmk lrnngh main mtadd hakyky dnya ki ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main shaml hayn: khwdmkhtar daraiywngh: kmk sykhnay ka astamal khud sy chlnay wali karwn ko mahawlyat aur tryfk ki haalt par mbny fysalay karnay kay liye trbyt denay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ pwrt fwlyw mynjmnt: sykhnay kay zaryaha srmayha kary kay mhakmwn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔mazuy kay markyt kay aadad wa shmar sy aur mwjwdha markyt ki haaltwn par mbny fysalay karnay say۔ haylth kyir: kmk sykhnay ka astamal mryzuwn kay liye alaj kay mnsawbwn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jaskta hay jo mryzuwn kay mazuy kay aadad wa shmar sy sykh kar aur mryzu ki mwjwdha haalt ki bnyad par fysalay kar kay astamal kya jaskta haay۔ amyj prwsysngh: kmk lrnngh hawskty haay۔tsawyry prwsysngh kay kamwn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jesay khsawsayt ka ptha lghanay ، tsawyry ktaaat ، aabjykt ki phachan ، aur trykngh۔ wydayw ghymza: anfwrsmnt lrnngh ko zahayn ayjnt bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo wydayw ghymza khyl saktay hain aur un ki ghltaywn sy sykh saktay hain takha un ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔ markytngh: kmk: kmksykhnay ka astamal mazuy kay saarfyn kay aadad wa shmar sy sykhnay aur mwjwdha markyt kay haalat par mbny fysalay karnay kay zaryaha markytngh ki mhamat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔saiykl daat khlasaha ، kmk lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js main kesi ayjnt ki trbyt shaml hawty hay takha kesi mahawl main fysalwn ka slslha tyar kya jaskay takha kesi anaam kay asharay ko zayada sy zayada kya jaskay۔kmk lrnngh main mtadd hakyky dnya ki ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main khwdmkhtar daraiywngh ، pwrt fwlyw mynjmnt ، haylth kyir ، amyj prwsysngh ، wydayw ghymza ، markytngh ، aur bradakast jrnlzam shaml hayn۔

Question: nghrany sykhnay main rjat aur drjha bndy main kya frk haay؟
Answer: rjat aur drjha bndy mshyn lrnngh main astamal hony wali do ksm ki nghrany sykhnay ki tknyk hayn۔rjat aur drjha bndy kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: rjat: ayk mstkl aaؤt pt mtghyr ki pysh ghwiy krta haay۔ anhasaar mtghyr aur ayk ya ayk sy zayada aazaad mtghyr kay mabyn talkat ko madal bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tarykhy aadad wa shmar ki bnyad par ، aur markyt kay rjhaanat par mbny astak ki kymt ki pysh ghwiy krna۔aspam kay tawr par aspam ya nahin ، tsaawyr ko mkhtlf ksmwn main drjha bndy karna ، aur pysh ghwiy karna keh aya koi saarf mnwr hoga ya nhayn۔ klasyfykyshn alghwrthm main fysalha kn drkht ، spwrt wyktr mshynyn (ays wy aym) ، aur kay nyrst prawsy (ayn ayn ayn) shaml hayn۔ khlasaha ، aham frk ، aham frk ، aham frk ، aham frkrjat aur drjha bndy kay darmiyan yeh hay keh rjat ayk mstkl aaؤt pt mtghyr ki pysh ghwiy krty hay ، jabky drjha bndy ayk wazuha aaؤt pt mtghyr ki pysh ghwiy krty haay۔rjat ka astamal anhasaar mtghyr aur ayk ya zayada aazaad mtghyr kay mabyn talkat ko madal karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky drjha bndy ka astamal mkhtlf ksmwn ya klaswn main dayta ko drjha bndy karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔

Question: spwrt wyktr mshynwn (ays wy aym) aur is kay aham pyramytrza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: spwrt wyktr mshynyn (ays wy aym) ayk zayr nghrany mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm hay jo drjha bndy aur rjat psndy dono kay msail kay liye astamal hawta haay۔pytrn ki drjha bndy aur nan lainr rjatwn kay mydan main ays wy aym wsya pymanay par laghw hawtay hayn۔ays wy aym kay aham pyramytrza yeh hayn: sy: yeh ghltay ki asatalaha ka bakaadha pyramytr ، sy haay۔yha kam trbyt ki ghltay aur kam janch ki ghltay kay hasawl kay darmiyan tjart ko kntrwl krta haay۔sy ki ayk chhwty sy kymt ayk wsya pymanay par marjn pyda krty hay ، js sy zayada ghalat tabkwn ki ajazat mlty hay lekin zayada mnasb hony ko kam kya jata hay ، jabky sy ki ayk bray kymt ayk tngh marjn pyda krty hay ، js sy ghalat tabkay ko kam kya jata hay lekin zayada sy zayada ftngh main azuafha hawta haay۔ krnl: yeh dana hay keh aadad wa shmar ko aaly main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jhaty jghha.dana ka fnkshn lkyry ، ksayraljhaty ، shaaay bnyad fnkshn (aar by ayf) ، ya sghmaida hawskta haay۔dana kay fnkshn ka Question: fychr anjynirngh ka mksad kya hay aur kon sy tknyk astamal ki jaskty haay؟
Answer: fychr anjynirngh kham aadad wa shmar ko un khsawsayat main tbdyl karnay ka aml hay jo mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm kay zaryaha un ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔fychr anjynirngh mshyn lrnngh main ayk aham akdam hay ، kywnkha yeh madal ki drstghy aur karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔yhaan kuch tknykyn hain jo fychr anjynirngh kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn: nkaisa: nkaisa aadad wa shmar main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay ka aml haay۔yha tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta hay jesay mtalb amptyshn ، mydayn amptyshn ، ya wzua ki nkaisa۔ zamrhaaty ankwdangh: zamrhaaty ankwdangh wazuha mtghyrat ko addy mtghyr main tbdyl karnay ka aml hay jo mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm kay zaryaha astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha ayk ghrm ankwdangh ، lybl ankwdangh ، ya bainry ankwdangh jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ hayndalngh aaؤt lyirza: aaؤt lyir dayta pwaints hain jo daytasyt main mwjwd dusray dayta pwaints sy nmayan tawr par mkhtlf hayn۔aaؤt lyirza ko snbhalnay main madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l these un dayta pwaints ki nshandhay karna aur un ko hatana ya tbdyl karna shaml haay۔ bainngh: bainngh mstkl mtghyrat ko mjrd zamray main ghrwp bndy ka aml haay۔yha tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta hay jesay msawy chwraaiy bainngh ، msawy frykwynsy bainngh ، ya K-means bainngh۔ askylngh: askylngh aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl karnay ka aml hay takha is main isi tarah ki had aur tksym haw۔yha tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta hay jesay mn myks askylngh ، zayda askwr askylngh ، ya lagh askylngh۔ lagh transfarmyshn: lagh transfarmyshn lajrythmk fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko tbdyl karnay ka aml haay۔yha un aadad wa shmar kay l useful karaamd saabt hawskta hay js main askyda dastry bywshn haay۔ fychr ka antkhab: khsawsayt ka antkhab madal kay liye anthaaiy mtalkha khsawsayat ko mntkhb karnay ka aml haay۔yha artbata tjzayha ، bahamy malwmat ، ya prnspl jzaw tjzayha (py sy aay) jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، fychr anjynirngh mshyn lrnngh ka ayk aham akdam hay js main kham dayta ko un khsawsayat main tbdyl karna shaml hay jo mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm kay zaryaha astamal hawsktay hayn۔fychr anjynirngh kay l techniques tzuadat ، jo mkhtlf ankwdangh ، hayndalngh aaؤt lyirza ، bainngh ، askylngh ، lagh transfarmyshn ، aur fychr slykshn jesi tknyk astamal ki jaskty hayn۔tknyk ka antkhab aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur msilay ko hal karnay par mnhasar haay۔

Question: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is mksad kay liye astamal hony wali tknyk ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghana ayk mshyn sykhnay ki tknyk hay jo nayab wakaat ya mshahadat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay jo mamwl ya mtwka slwk sy nmayan tawr par mkhtlf hawty haay۔bay zuabtaghywn ko wsya pymanay par tyn aksam main drjha bndy kya jaskta haay: pwaint bay zuabtaghy ، syak wa sbak sy mtalk bay zuabtaghy aur ajtmaay bay zuabtaghy۔mshyn lrnngh kay tsawrat ka astamal karty hoey bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghana kya jaskta hay ، aur yeh mndrjha zayl tarykwn sy kya jaskta haay: zayr nghrany bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghana: is tarykha kar kay liye ayk lybl laga hoa daytasyt ki zurwrt hawty hay js main mamwl aur ghair mamwly dono nmwnay hawtay hain takha pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ki tshkyl ki jaskay۔: is tarykha kar main lybl laga hoa daytasyt ki zurwrt nahin hay aur is main dayta pwaints ki nshandhay karna shaml hay jo baky dayta sy nmayan tawr par mkhtlf hayn۔ symy-sprytda bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghana: is tarykha kar main bay zuabtaghywn ki nshandhay karnay kay lybl laga hoa aur baghair lybl waly aadad wa shmar kay amtzaaj ka astamal shaml haay۔hakyky dnya ki ayply kyshnza ، bshmwl frada ka ptha lghanay ، saibrsykywryty ، dkhl andazay ka ptha lghanay aur taby tshkhysa۔bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal hony wali tknyk ki ayk msaal alag thlgh jnghl alghwrthm hay ، jo ayk ghair mnkwlha sykhnay ka alghwrthm hay jo aadad wa shmar main adm tzuadat ko alag thlgh karnay kay liye fysalay kay drkhtwn ka astamal krta haay۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main nksaan kay afaal ka kya krdar hay aur kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly nksaan kay afaal kya hayn؟
Answer: nksaan kay afaal mshyn lrnngh main ayk aham krdar ada karty hain kywnkha woh is mksad ki wzuahat karty hain js ka mksad madal ko bhatr bnana haay۔nksaan kay afaal ka mksad pysh ghwiy shuda aaؤt pt aur asal aaؤt pt kay mabyn frk ki pymaish karna haay۔nksaan ka fnkshn pysh ghwiy shuda aaؤt pt aur asal aaؤt pt kay mabyn ghltay ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur is ka mksad is ghltay ko kam sy kam karna haay۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly nksaan kay afaal hayn: mtalb askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay): yeh nksaan ka fnkshn rjat kay msail kay liye astamal hawta hay aur pysh ghwiy shuda aaؤt pt aur asal aaؤt pt kay mabyn awsta mrba frk ko mapta haay۔ myn mtalk ghltay (aym aay ay): yeh nksaan ka fnkshn astamal hawta haay۔rjat psndy kay msail aur pymaish kay l the pysh ghwiy shuda aaؤt pt aur asal aaؤt pt kay mabyn awsta mtalk frk۔ bainry kras ayntrwpy nksaan: yeh nksaan ka fnkshn bainry drjha bndy kay msail kay liye astamal hawta hay aur pysh ghwiy shuda amkan aur asal amkan kay darmiyan frk ko mapta haay۔ zamrha dar kras-antrwpynksaan: is nksaan ka fnkshn ksayr tabkaty drjha bndy kay msail kay liye astamal hawta hay aur hr tabkay kay liye pysh ghwiy shuda amkan aur asal amkan kay darmiyan frk ko mapta haay۔asal aaؤt pt۔ habr nksaan: yeh nksaan ka fnkshn aym ays ay aur aym aay ay ka ayk mjmwaha hay aur yeh rjat psndy kay msail kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ nksaan ki tkryb ka antkhab msilay ko hal hony ki nwayt aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ki ksm par mnhasar hawta haay۔nksaan ki tkryb ka astamal madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay aur madal kay pyramytrza ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔

Question: kras twsayk ka astamal karty hoey madal kay antkhab aur tshkhysa kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: madal ka antkhab kesi dyiay gaye msilay kay liye bhatryn mshyn lrnngh madal ka antkhab karnay ka aml haay۔madal kay antkhab kay aml main amydwarwn kay madalza ka ayk syt mntkhb karna ، hr madal ko trynngh daytasyt par trbyt dena ، aur twsayk daytasyt par hr madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karna shaml haay۔kras twsayk madal kay antkhab aur tshkhysa kay liye aam tawr par astamal hony wali tknyk haay۔kras twsayk ka astamal karty hoey madal kay antkhab aur tshkhysa ka aml yeh haay: dayta ko tksym kryn: pehla kdm dayta ko trbyt ، twsayk aur janch kay sytwn main tksym karna haay۔trbyt ka syt madal ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، twsayk ka syt trbyt kay doran madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur tystngh syt ko madal ki hatmy karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ madalza ko mntkhb kryn: aghla mrhalha mntkhb karna haay۔amydwarwn kay madalza ka ayk mjmwaha jo msilay kay liye astamal hawskta haay۔as main mkhtlf alghwrthm ، haaiprprmytrza ، aur fychr syt shaml hawsktay hayn۔ madalza ko tryn kryn: aghla mrhalha hr madal ko trbyt kay syt par trbyt dena haay۔as main madal ko aadad wa shmar kay mtaabk ft karna aur nksaan ki tkryb ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye madal pyramytrza ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔ madalza ka jaizaha lyn: aghla mrhalha twsayk kay syt par hr madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karna haay۔as main mytrks ka hasab lghana shaml hay jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr۔ bhatryn madal mntkhb kryn: hatmy mrhalha twsayk kay syt par apni karkrdghy ki bnyad par bhatryn madal ka antkhab karna haay۔as kay bad is madal ki janch ki janch pratal par is ki karkrdghy ki tsadyk kay l. ki jati haay۔ kras twsayk ayk aysy tknyk hay jo dayta ko K-folds main tksym krkay aur K-1 fwldaza par madal ki trbyt krkay madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haaybaky ghnaas aml ko K awkat dharaya jata hay ، aur awsta karkrdghy ka hasab lghaya jata haay۔kras twsayk sy zayada mnasb hony main mdd mlty hay aur madal ki karkrdghy ka zayada drst tkhmynha fraham krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، madal ka antkhab kesi dyiay gaye msilay kay liye bhatryn mshyn lrnngh madal ka antkhab karnay ka aml haay۔kras twsayk madal kay antkhab aur tshkhysa kay liye aam tawr par astamal hony wali tknyk hay ، js main aadad wa shmar ko trbyt ، twsayk ، aur janch kay sytwn main tksym karna ، madalza ka antkhab karna ، madalza ki trbyt ، madalza ka jaizaha lena ، aur is ki karkrdghy par mbny bhatryn madal ka antkhab karna shaml haay۔twsayk ka syt

Question: mshyn lrnngh main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn mshyn lrnngh main aam tawr par astamal hony wali do tknyk hain takha zayada mnasb aur madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: jrmanha ki asatalaha: L1 bakaadghy sy madal kay pyramytrza ki mtalk akdar ki bnyad par jrmanha ki asatalaha shaml hawty hay ، jabky L2 ryghwlraizayshn pyramytrza kay mrba ki bnyad par jrmanha ki asatalaha shaml krty haay۔wyrl halwn kay liye ، jahan madal kay kuch pyramytrza safr par syt kyay jatay hain ، jabky ayl 2 ryghwlraizayshn nan asprs hal ki taraf jata haay۔ fychr ka antkhab: L1 ryghwlraizayshn ko khsawsayt kay antkhab kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، kywnkha yeh madal kay kuch pyramytrza ko safr par syt krskta hay ، jabky is main kuch pyramytrza ko safr par syt kya jaskta hay ، jabky yeh madal kay kuch pyramytrza ko syt krsktay hayn۔L2 ryghwlraizayshn khsawsayt ka antkhab nahin krty haay۔ rwbwstns: L2 bakaadghy L1 bakaadghy sy bahar janay walon kay liye zayada mzubwta haay۔awr dayta ki khsawsayat۔aaly jhaty aadad wa shmar kay sath kam karty wkt L1 bakaadghy mfyd hay kywnkha yeh kesi ko sab sy aham safat ka sab syt mntkhb karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔L2 ryghwlraizayshn mfyd hay jab aadad wa shmar main aaؤt lyirza par mushtamil hawta hay ya jab koi nan asprs hal mtalwb hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، L1 aur L2 bakaadghy sy zayada mnasb hony aur madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l machine mshyn lrnngh main aam tawr par astamal hony wali do tknyk hayn۔L1 aur L2 ko bakaadghy kay mabyn aham akhtlafat jrmanay ki asatalaha ، bhaadry ، khsawsayt ka antkhab ، mzubwtay aur kmpywtyshnl pychydghy hayn۔L1 aur L2 ko bakaadghy kay darmiyan antkhab ka anhasaar msilay ko hal karnay ki nwayt aur aadad wa shmar ki khsawsayat par haay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: lfza aymbydangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main astamal hawty hay takha kam jhaty jghha main hakyky kdr waly wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔lfza aymbydangh ka mksad alfaza ki manwy aur msanway khsawsayat aur isi jmlay ya dstawyza main dusray alfaza kay sath un kay talkat ko haasal karna haay۔lfza aymbydangh mkhtlf ayn ayl py kamwn main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay jzabat ka tjzayha ، mshyn trjmha ، aur namzad hasty ki shnakht۔ayn ayl py kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay kuch astamal yeh hayn: jzabat ka tjzayha: lfza aymbydangh ko kesi jmlay main alfaza aur jmlay kay jzabat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo poray jmlay kay jzabat ki drjha bndy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔aymbydangh ko mkhtlf zabanwn main alfaza ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo jmlay ko ayk zaban sy dusri zaban main trjmha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔jwab dyna: lfza aymbydangh ko kesi swal kay tnazar aur mmknha jwabat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo anthaaiy mtalkha jwab tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ aam tawr par astamal hony waly lfza ko srayt karnay ki tknyk wrda 2 wy ay sy aur dstanay hayn۔wrda 2 wy ay sy ayk aasaaby nyt wrk par mbny tknyk hay jo kesi jmlay main kesi lfza kay syak wa sbak ki pysh ghwiy krkay lfza srayt sykhty haay۔dstanay ayk ghnty par mbny tknyk hay jo ayk karps main alfaza kay shryk hony waly mytrks ka tjzayha krkay alfaza ki srayt sykhty haay۔ khlasaha ، lfza aymbydangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo NLP main astamal ki jati hay takha kam jhaty jghha main hakyky kdr waly wyktr kay tawr par alfaza ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔lfza aymbydangh mkhtlf ayn ayl py kamwn main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay jzabat ka tjzayha ، mshyn trjmha ، aur namzad hasty ki shnakht۔sb sy aam tawr par astamal hony waly lfza ko srayt karnay ki tknyk wrda 2 wy ay sy aur dstanay hain ۔1 jy ay ay ayksfwrjyks 2 dablyw kypydaya 3 jwskamachwkwladws 4 nyptwn 5springer

Question: trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: pehla kdm RNN ki trbyt kay liye dayta tyar karna haay۔as main dayta ko trbyt aur janch kay sytwn main tksym karna ، aur RNN.Model fn tamyr kay liye ayk mnasb shkl main tbdyl krkay dayta ko pysh karna shaml haay: aghla mrhalha RNN kay fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna haay۔as main prtwn ki tadad ، hr prt main nywran ki tadad ، aur astamal karnay kay liye ayktywyshn fnkshn ki ksm ka fysalha karna shaml haay۔ madal ko trbyt dyna: aghla mrhalha aar ayn ayn ko trbyt kay syt par trbyt dena haay۔as main RNN main un pt trtyb ko khana khlana ، aaؤt pt ki kmpywtngh karna ، aur nksaan ka hasab lghanay kay liye asal aaؤt pt sy mwazanha karna shaml haay۔as kay bad wzan ko ap dayt karnay kay liye nyt wrk kay zaryaha nksaan ko byk prwpygh kya jata haay۔ tshkhysa: aghla mrhalha twsayk kay syt par RNN ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karna haay۔as main nksaan aur dyghr mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr ki ghnty shaml haay۔ haaiprprmytr tywnngh: aghla mrhalha is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye RNN kay haaiprprmytrza ko tywn karna haay۔as main sykhnay ki shrha ، ahadwn ki tadad ، aur dyghr pyramytrza ko aydajst karna shaml hay jo trbyt kay aml ko mtasar karty hayn۔ tystngh: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tystngh syt par RNN ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main madal ki karkrdghy ki tsadyk kay l loss nksaan aur dyghr mytrks ki ghnty shaml haay۔ khlasaha main ، trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ayk aar ayn ayn ki trbyt main dayta ki tyary ، madal fn tamyr ki wzuahat ، madal ki trbyt ، twsayk ، haaiprprmytr tywnngh ، aur janch shaml haay۔aar ayn ayn ki karkrdghy ka andazaha mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main chalw karnay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrks main astamal ki jati hay takha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko kam kya jaskay aur sykhy hui khsawsayat ko aam karnay main bhatry laiy jaskay۔ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn ka mksad nyt wrk main nywrwn ki srghrmywn ko chhwta hony par mjbwr karna hay ، jo nyt wrk ko mazeed mzubwta aur aam khsawsayat ko sykhnay ki trghyb dyta haay۔yha hay keh ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn kis tarah kam krty haay: bakaadghy ki asatalaha shaml kryn: pehla kdm aasaaby nyt wrk kay nksaan kay fnkshn main bakaadghy ki asatalaha shaml karna haay۔yha bakaadha asatalaha nyt wrk main bray srghrmywn ko jrmanha aaid krty haay۔nyt wrk ka kal nksaan ، jo byk prwpyghyshn kay doran nyt wrk kay wzan ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as pyramytr ko zayada sy zayada kymt tlash karnay kay l gr ghrda srch ya bay trtyb tlash jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey bnaya jaskta haay۔ ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn ayk aam nktaha nzar hay jsay zayada tr aksam kay nywrl nyt wrk madal kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl aatw ankwdarza aur ankwdar daykwdar madal۔ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn aam tawr par dyghr bakaadghy ki tknykwn kay sath mil kar astamal ki jati hay jesay wzan ko bakaadghy aur darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn nyt wrk ki karkrdghy ko mazeed bhatr bnanay kay l .۔ khlasaha main ، ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrks main astamal ki jati hay takha zurwrt sy zayada ftngh ko kam kya jaskay aur sykhy hui khsawsayat ko aam kya jaskay۔ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn nyt wrk kay nksaan kay fnkshn main bakaadghy ki asatalaha shaml krkay ، bakaadghy sy hony waly nksaan ki kmpywtngh ، isy kal nksaan main shaml krkay ، aur bakaadha pyramytr ko tywnngh krkay kam krty haay۔ayktywyshn ryghwlraizayshn ayk aam nktaha nzar hay jsay zayada tr aksam kay nywrl nyt wrk madal kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay aur aam tawr par dyghr bakaadghy ki tknykwn kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: prnspl jzaw tjzayha (py sy aay) kay tsawr aur jhaty main kami main is kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: prnspl jzaw tjzayha (py sy aay) ayk aadad wa shmar ki tknyk hay jo tawl wa arzu main kami kay l machine mshyn lrnngh main astamal hawty haay۔py sy aay ka mksad mtghyrat kay ayk braay syt ko ayk chhwty sy main tbdyl karna hay js main ab bhi braay syt main zayada tr malwmat mwjwd hayn۔jhaty kami kay liye py sy aay madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: mayary: pehla mrhalha yeh hay keh aadad wa shmar ko mayary bnana aur mayary anharaf kay zaryaha tksym krkay۔yha akdam is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye zurwry hay keh tamam mtghyrat main ayk hi pymanha haw۔ kwwryns mytrks: aghla mrhalha mayary aadad wa shmar kay kwwyrns mytrks ki ghnty karna haay۔kwwyrins mytrks mtghyrat kay mabyn artbata ki daghry ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ ayghn wyktrza aur ayghn wylywza: aghla mrhalha kwwyrns mytrks kay ayjyn wyktrza aur ayghn wylywza ki ghnty karna haay۔ayghyn wyktr aadad wa shmar main zayada sy zayada tghyrat ki smtwn ki nmaindghy karty hain ، jabky ayghyn wylywza hr ayjyn wyktr kay zaryaha byan krdha tghyr ki mkdar ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ prnspl ajzaaa ko mntkhb kryn: aghla mrhalha un prnspl ajzaaa ka antkhab karna hay jo aadad wa shmar main sab sy zayada tghyrat ki wzuahat karty hayn۔yha ayghyn wylywza ko nzawl trtyb main drjha bndy krkay aur upar kay ayghyn wyktrza ko mntkhb krkay kya jaskta haay۔ dayta ko tbdyl kryn: hatmy mrhalha aadad wa shmar ko mntkhb prnspl ajzaaa kay zaryaha byan krdha niy nchlay jhaty jghha main tbdyl karna haay۔yha mntkhb krdha ayghyn wyktrza kay zaryaha mayary dayta ko zurb dy kar kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha ، py sy aay ayk aadad wa shmar ki tknyk hay jo tawl wa arzu main kami kay l machine mshyn lrnngh main astamal hawty haay۔tawl wa arzu main kami kay liye py sy aay madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat mayary kary ، kwwyryns mytrks ki kmpywtngh ، ayghyn wyktrza aur ayghn wylywza ki kmpywtngh karna ، prnspl ajzaaa ka antkhab karna ، aur aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl karna haay۔py sy aay wsya pymanay par tlashy aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay main aur pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔

Question: ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalnay main kya aham chylnjza hain aur isy snbhalnay kay liye kon sy tknyk astamal ki jaskty haay؟
Answer: dayta tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalna ayk aam chylnj haay۔ghmshdha dayta mkhtlf wjwhaat ki wjha sy hawskta hay ، jesay namkml malwmat ، adm rdaml ، ya dayta bdanwany۔ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay main kuch aham chylnjza yeh hayn: tasab: ghmshdha aadad wa shmar tjzayha main tasab mtaarf krasktay hain ، js sy ghalat ntaij aur fysalay hawtay hayn۔ aadadwshmar ki taakt ko kam kya jaskta haay: ghmshdha aadad wa shmar tjzayha ki aadadwshmar ki taakt ko kam krsktay hain ، js ka ptha lghana mshkl hawjata haay۔aham asar۔ ghair ykyny sawrthaal: ghmshdha aadad wa shmar tjzayha ki ghair ykyny sawrthaal ko braha sakta hay ، js sy pyramytrza ki hakyky akdar ka andazaha lghana mshkl hawjata haay۔ ghmshdha dayta ko snbhalnay kay liye ، mtadd tknykwn ko astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl: hazaf: is main ktaarwn ya kalmwn ko hatana shaml haay۔ghmshdha dayta kay sath۔yha tknyk is wkt mwsar saabt hawskty hay jab ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ki mkdar chhwty ho ، lekin is sy tasab aur aadadwshmar ki taakt ko kam kya jaskta haay۔ ampryshn: is main tkhmynha shuda akdar kay sath ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ko pُr karna shaml haay۔yha tknyk is wkt mwsar saabt hawskty hay jab ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ki mkdar bray ho ، lekin is sy tasab mtaarf kraya jaskta hay aur aadad wa shmar ki tghyr ko kam kya jaskta haay۔ ayk niay zamray ki tfwyzu krna: is main ghmshdha aadad wa shmar kay liye ayk nya zamrha bnana shaml haay۔yha tknyk is wkt mwsar saabt hawskty hay jab ghmshdha aadad wa shmar wazuha hon ، lekin is sy tasab aur aadadwshmar ki taakt ko kam kya jaskta haay۔yha alghwrthm is wkt mwsar saabt hawsktay hain jab ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ki mkdar chhwty ho ، lekin woh ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ki ksm sy hasas hawsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، dayta tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main dayta ghmshdha ayk aam chylnj haay۔ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay main aham chylnjza tasab ، aadad wa shmar ki taakt ko kam karnay aur ghair ykyny sawrthaal main azuafha hayn۔aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur hal hony waly msilay par mnhasar hay ، hazaf karnay ، astsanyٰ ، ayk nya zamrha tfwyzu karnay ، aur kuch alghwrthm jesay aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tsawyry jnryshn kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GAN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: amyj jnryshn kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GAN) ki trbyt main mndrjha zayl aham akdamat shaml hayn: dayta ki tyary: pehla kdm GAN ki trbyt kay liye dayta tyar karna haay۔as main tsaawyr ka daytasyt mntkhb karna aur tsaawyr ko dwbarha tyar karnay ، fsal bnanay aur mamwl par latay hoey pry prwsysngh shaml haay۔ jnrytr madal: aghla mrhalha jnrytr madal ki wzuahat karna hay ، jo niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔jnrytr madal ayk bay trtyb shwr wyktr ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur aaؤt pt kay tawr par ayk shbyhaha tyar krta haay۔ daskrymynytr madal: aghla mrhalha amtyazay madal ki wzuahat karna hay ، jo hakyky aur jaly amyjza kay mabyn frk karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔amtyazay slwk ka madal un pt kay tawr par ayk shbyhaha lyta hay aur is bat ka amkan pyda krta hay keh shbyhaha hakyky haay۔ aydawrysyryl trynngh: aghla mrhalha jnrytr aur amtyazay slwk kay madalza ko mkhalf andaza main trbyt dena haay۔jnrytr madal ko aysy tsaawyr tyar karnay ki trbyt di jati hay jo amtyazay slwk kay madal ko bay wkwf bnaskty hain ، jabky amtyazay slwk kay madal ko hakyky aur jaly tsaawyr kay mabyn frk karnay ki trbyt di jati haay۔ haaiprprmytr tywnngh: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye GAN kay haaiprprmytrza ko tywn karna haay۔as main sykhnay ki shrha ، ahadwn ki tadad ، aur dyghr pyramytrza ko aydajst karna shaml hay jo trbyt kay aml ko mtasar karty hayn۔ niy tsaawyr ko jnm dyna: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye trbyt yaftha jnrytr madal ka astamal kryn۔as main jnrytr madal main bay trtyb shwr wyktr ko khana khlana aur aaؤt pt kay tawr par ayk niy shbyhaha haasal karna shaml haay۔ khlasaha main ، amyj jnryshn kay liye ayk GAN ki trbyt main aadad wa shmar ki tyary shaml hay ، jnrytr aur amtyazay slwk kay madalza ki wzuahat ، aydawryshl trynngh ، haaiprprmytr tywnngh ، aur niy tsaawyr tyar karna shaml hayn۔GANs niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal ki gain ، jesay amyj trkyb ، astail ki mntkly ، aur dayta brahaw۔

Question: bych tdryjy nzawl aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl main kya frk haay؟
Answer: bych tdryjy nzawl aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl dono hi asalaha kay alghwrthm hain jo mshyn lrnngh madalza ، jesay lkyry rjat aur aasaaby nyt wrks main laght kay kam ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔dwnwn kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: bych mylan nzawl: hr tkrar main poray trbyty daytasyt ka astamal karty hoey madal pyramytrza kay slslay main laght kay fnkshn kay mylan ki ghnty kryn۔.kwstk tdryjy nzawl: hr ayk tkrar main sirf ayk hi trbyt ki msaal ya msaalwn ka ayk chhwta sa zayly syt astamal karty hoey tdryjy ki ghnty kryn۔ jldy sy kam krta hay lekin kam drst hawskta hay kywnkha yeh msaalwn kay sab syt ka astamal karty hoey mylan ki ghnty krta hay ، jo zayada shwr aur tghyrat ko mtaarf kraskta haay۔tdryjy tkhmynha۔ un dono kay mabyn ayk smjhwtha mny bych mylan nzawl hay ، jo hr kdm par ayk sy zayada trbyty msaal (jsay "mny bych" kaha jata haay) kay khlaf tdryj ki ghnty krta haay۔yha hakyky astakstk tdryjy nzawl sy nmayan tawr par bhatr karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krskta hay kywnkha kwda hr msaal kay liye alag alag ghrydaynt ki kmpywtngh karnay kay bjaiay wyktraizayshn laibryrywn ka astamal krskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، bych tdryjy nzawl aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl do asalaha kay alghwrthm hain jo laght kay kam ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔mshyn lrnngh madal۔dwnwn kay mabyn aham akhtlafat dayta prwsysngh kay nktaha nzar ، knwrjnsy ki rftar aur hasab ktab hayn۔mny bych tdryjy nzawl dono kay mabyn ayk smjhwtha hay aur woh hakyky astakstk tdryjy nzawl sy nmayan tawr par bhatr karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krskta haay۔

Question: ayk ghrm ankwdangh kay tsawr aur is kay astamal kay mtghyr mtghyr ki nmaindghy karnay main is kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk ghrm ankwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mshyn lrnngh madal main addy akdar kay tawr par zamrha mtghyr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔yha ayk mtghyr mtghyr ki bainry wyktr ki nmaindghy hay jahan wyktr ki lmbaiy mtghyr main alag alag zamray ki tadad kay brabr haay۔as wyktr main ، tamam akdar 0 hon gi swaiay is ki kymt jo 1 hogi ، jo mtghyr kay ITH zamray ki nmaindghy kray ghy۔ayk ghrm ankwdangh ka astamal dwtwk dayta mtghyr ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kya jata hay takha woh pyshn ghwiy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ko mhaya krskyn۔ ayk ghrm ankwdangh kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: yeh madalza main zamrha dar mtghyrat kay astamal ki ajazat dyta hay js main addy un pt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔madal ko mtghyr mtghyr kay baray main mazeed malwmat fraham krkay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiyn۔ yeh aardaynty kay msilay sy bchnay main mdd mil sakti hay ، jo is wkt hawskta hay jab ayk mtghyr mtghyr main kdrty trtyb (jysay "chhwtay" ، "mydaym" ، "braay") haw۔. ayk ghrm ankwdangh kay astamal kay nksaanat main shaml hayn: is sy tawl wa arzu main azuafha hawskta hay ، kywnkha mtghyr main hr zamray kay liye ayk alyhadha kalm tshkyl diya jata haay۔as sy madal ko zayada pychydha aur trbyt denay main sst rftar mil sakti haay۔mtghyr main hr zamray kay liye alyhadha kalm۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar ayk mtghyr mtghyr ki do ksmyn hain ، mrd aur khwatyn ، tou ayk ghrm ankwdangh sy do alag alag kalm pyda hon ga ، ayk mrd kay liye aur ayk awrt kay liay۔aghr dayta pwaint ITH zamray sy talk rkhta hay tou ، is kay ntyjay main wyktr main mwjwd tamam akdar 0 ki hon gi swaiay ITH wylyw kay ، jo 1. khlasaha ho gi ، ayk ghrm ankwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mtghyr mtghyr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay jesa keh addy akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mshyn lrnngh madal۔yha ayk mtghyr mtghyr ki bainry wyktr ki nmaindghy hay jahan wyktr ki lmbaiy mtghyr main alag alag zamray ki tadad kay brabr haay۔ayk ghrm ankwdangh ka astamal dwtwk dayta mtghyr ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kya jata hay takha pysh ghwiwn ko bhatr bnanay kay l they woh mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ko mhaya kya jaskay۔as kay fwaid hain jesay madalza main zamrha dar mtghyrat kay astamal ki ajazat dena js main addy un pt ki zurwrt hawty hay aur aardaynty kay msilay sy ghryza karna hawta hay ، lekin is main brahtay hoey tawl wa arzu aur wyrl dayta jesay nksaanat bhi hawtay hayn۔

Question: drjha bndy kay liye spwrt wyktr mshyn (ays wy aym) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: drjha bndy kay liye spwrt wyktr mshyn (ays wy aym) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: pehla kdm ays wy aym ki trbyt kay liye dayta tyar karna haay۔as main lybl laga hoa msaalwn ka daytasyt mntkhb karna aur is ko askylngh aur isy mamwl par lakr dayta pry prwsys karna shaml haay۔ madal ka antkhab: aghla mrhalha ays wy aym kay liye mnasb dana ki tkryb aur haaiprprmytrza ka antkhab karna haay۔dana fnkshn un pt dayta ko ayk aaly jhaty jghha main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jahan isy haaipr plyn kay zaryaha alag kya jaskta haay۔ madal ko trbyt dyna: aghla mrhalha ays wy aym ko lybl laga hoa msaalwn par trbyt dena haay۔as main haaipr plyn ki tlash shaml hay jo aadad wa shmar ki do klaswn kay mabyn marjn ko zayada sy zayada krta haay۔marjn haaiprplyn aur hr klas sy kryb trien dayta pwaints kay darmiyan fasalha haay۔ tshkhysa: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh twsayk kay syt par ays wy aym ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ haaipr pyra mytr tywnngh: aghla mrhalha is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ays wy aym kay haaiprprmytrza ko tywn karna haay۔as main dana kay fnkshn ، bakaadghy sy pyramytr ، aur dyghr pyramytrza ko aydajst karna shaml hay jo trbyt kay aml ko mtasar karty hayn۔ tystngh: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh tystngh syt par ays wy aym ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main madal ki karkrdghy ki tsadyk kay l met mytrks ki kmpywtngh shaml haay۔ khlasaha main ، drjha bndy kay liye ays wy aym ki trbyt main dayta ki tyary ، madal ka antkhab ، madal ، twsayk ، haaiprprmytr tywnngh ، aur janch shaml haay۔ays wy aym drjha bndy kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal hawty hain ، jesay chharay ka ptha lghanay ، dkhl andazay ka ptha lghanay ، ay mylza ki drjha bndy ، khbrwn kay mzuamyn aur wyb safhaat ، jynwn ki drjha bndy ، aur haynda raitngh ki phachan۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrks main astamal ki jati hay takha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwk skay aur sykhy hogi khsawsayat ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka mksad trbyt kay doran tsaadfy tawr par nywran aur un kay mtalkha rabtawn ko ghair faal karna hay ، jo nyt wrk ko snghl nywran par bohat zayada anhasaar karnay sy rwkta hay aur tamam nywran ko bhatr bnanay kay l learn sykhnay par mjbwr krta haay۔yha hay keh darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn kis tarah kam krty haay: tsaadfy tawr par nywran ko ghair faal kryn: trbyt kay doran ، aasaaby nyt wrk ki hr prt main nywran ki ayk khasa fysad tsaadfy tawr par ghair faal hawjaty hay js ko darap aaؤt ryt kaha jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh un nywran ki aaؤt pt safr par syt
