ki hogi hay ، aur un kay mtalkha rabtaay hata dyiay gaye hayn۔ nyt wrk ko tryn kryn: nyt wrk ko trmym shuda dayta par trbyt di jati hay ، aur wzan ko byk prwpyghyshn ka astamal karty hoey ap dayt kya jata haay۔trbyt kay aml ki hr tkrar main darap aaؤt aml dharaya jata haay۔ tystngh: janch kay doran ، tamam nywran astamal kyay jatay hain ، lekin un kay aaؤt pt ko darap aaؤt ryt sy is hakykt ka hasab ktab karnay kay liye tyar kya jata hay keh trbyt kay doran kuch nywran ghair faal krdyiay gaye thay۔ darap aaؤt ka bnyady faidhabakaadghy sy yeh hay keh yeh nywran kay bahamy mwafkt ko kam krkay aur tamam nywran ko bhatr bnanay kay l learn sykhnay par mjbwr krkay zayada mnasb hony sy rwkta haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ayk aam nktaha nzar hay js ko zayada tr aksam kay nywrl nyt wrk madal kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main mjazay asaby nyt wrks aur bar bar nywrl nyt wrks shaml hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrks main astamal ki janay wali khsawsayat ko bhatr bnanay aur sykhnay wali khsawsayat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn trynngh kay doran tsaadfy tawr par nywran aur un kay mtalkha rabtawn ko ghair faal krkay kam krty hay ، jo tamam nywran ko bhatr bnanay kay l learn sykhnay par mjbwr krty haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ayk aam nktaha nzar hay jsay zayada tr aksam kay nywrl nyt wrk madal kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madalza aur thyk twnngh ka astamal karty hoey mntkly kay sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mntkly lrnngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mshyn lrnngh main kesi niay kam par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko dwbarha astamal karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay ، jo wkt aur kmpywtyshnl wsail ki bcht krskty haay۔phalay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko ayk braay daytasyt par trbyt di jati hay aur isy kesi niay kam kay nktaha aaghaza kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta haay۔fain twnngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko apnay wzan ko ap dayt krkay niay kam main dahalnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔phalay sy trbyt yaftha madalza aur fain tnngh ka astamal karty hoey mntkly kay sykhnay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal mntkhb kryn: pehla kdm pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ka antkhab karna hay jo ayk braay daytasyt par trbyt yaftha tha aur woh niay sy mtalk haay۔kamphalay sy trbyt yaftha madal ayk mjazay aasaaby nyt wrk (sy ayn ayn) ya bar bar aanay waly nywrl nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) hawskta haay۔ aakhry prt ko khtm kryn: aghla mrhalha pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ki aakhry prt ko hatana hay ، jo aam tawr par drjha bndy ki prt haay۔as sy madal ko niay task kay mtaabk dahalnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ ayk niy prt shaml kryn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal main ayk niy prt shaml ki jaye jo niay kam sy mkhsawsa haay۔yha prt ayk drjha bndy ki prt ya rjat psndy ki prt hawskty hay ، jo niay kam ki nwayt par mnhasar haay۔ wzan ko aazaad kryn: aghla mrhalha pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal kay wzan ko mnjmd karna hay ، jo inhain trbyt kay doran ap dayt hony sy rwkta haay۔as sy madal ko asal task sy sykhay gaye alm ko brkrar rkhnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ madal ko tryn kryn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal kay mnjmd wzan ko ayk nktaha aaghaza kay tawr par astamal karty hoey madal ko niay kam par trbyt di jaiay۔as main niy prt kay wzan ko ap dayt karna shaml hay jabky pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal kay wzan ko brkrar rkhtay hawiay۔ fain twnngh: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal kay kuch wzan ko ghair mnkwlha krkay madal ko thyk karna hay aur is ko jary rkhna haaytrbyt ka aml۔as sy madal ko niay kam ko zayada mwsar andaza main apnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ khlasaha main ، mntkly lrnngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mshyn lrnngh main kesi niay kam par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko dwbarha astamal karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jo wkt aur kmpywtyshnl wsail ki bcht krskty haay۔fain twnngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko apnay wzan ko ap dayt krkay niay kam main dahalnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔phalay sy trbyt yaftha madalza aur fain twnngh ka astamal karty hoey mntkly sykhnay main shaml aham akdamat ayk pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ka antkhab krrhaay hain ، aakhry prt ko hata rahay hain ، ayk niy prt ko shaml krrhaay hain ، wzan ko mnjmd kar rahay hain ، madal ko trbyt dytay hain ، aur thyk tnngh۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main dayta pry prwsysngh aur safaiy kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: dayta pry prwsysngh aur safaiy karna mshyn lrnngh main zurwry akdamat hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh dayta tjzayha kay liye mnasb shkl main haay۔dayta pry prwsysngh aur safaiy sthraiy main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki safaiy: is mrhalay main aadad wa shmar main ghltaywn ya tzuadat ki nshandhay karna aur un ko drst karna shaml hay ، jesay ghmshdha akdar ، aaؤt lyirza aur daplykyt۔dayta ki safaiy kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay keh astsanyٰ ، hatanay ، aur tbdyly۔ dayta anzumam: is mrhalay main mtadd zaraia sy dayta ko ayk hi daytasyt main jwrana shaml haay۔as main mkhtlf daytasyts kay mabyn tnazaaat ko hal karna aur yeh ykyny bnana shaml hay keh dayta mstkl aur drst haay۔ dayta main kmy: is mrhalay main ghair mtalkha ya bay kar khsawsayat ko khtm krkay daytasyt kay saiza ko kam karna shaml haay۔as sy mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy main bhatry aaskty hay aur zayada sy zayada ftngh kay khtaray ko kam kya jaskta haay۔ dayta tbdyly: is mrhalay main aadad wa shmar ko tjzayha kay l a ayk mnasb shkl main tbdyl karna shaml haay۔as main askylngh ، narmlaizayshn ، aur ankwdangh zamrha dar mtghyrat shaml hawsktay hayn۔ dayta tksym krna: is mrhalay main dayta ko trbyt ، twsayk aur janch kay sytwn main tksym karna shaml haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnana zurwry hay keh mshyn lrnngh madal trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par zayada mnasb nahin hay aur woh niay dayta ko achhy tarah sy aam krskta haay۔ dayta brahawa: is akdam main ghhwmnay ، askylngh aur pltna jesay tbdylywn ka atalak krkay mwjwdha dayta sy nya dayta tyar karna shaml haay۔as sy daytasyt kay saiza main azuafha hawskta hay aur mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، dayta pry prwsysngh aur safaiy mshyn sykhnay main zurwry akdamat hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh dayta tjzayha kay liye mnasb shkl main haay۔dayta pry prwsysngh aur safaiy sthraiy main shaml aham akdamat main dayta ki safaiy ، dayta anzumam ، dayta main kami ، dayta main tbdyly ، dayta aspltngh ، aur dayta ko brahana haay۔yha akdamat aadad wa shmar kay mayar ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur isy mkhsawsa mshyn lrnngh task kay liye zayada mwzawn bna saktay hayn۔

Question: sfarshat kay nzaam main madal par mbny aur mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh main kya frk haay؟
Answer: sfarshat kay nzaam main madal par mbny aur mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh woh kis tarah sfarshat tyar karty hayn۔yhaan klydy akhtlafat hayn: mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh: ayk sfarsh pyda karnay kay liye poray dayta bys kay poray dayta ka astamal krta haay۔ saarfyn awr/ya ashyaa kay mabyn mmasalt ka astamal aur astamal krta hay aur saarf kay liye drjha bndy ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye inhain "wzan" kay tawr par astamal krta haay۔aaitm.kyn sst aur twsya pzayr nahin hay ، khasa tawr par braay daytasyts kay liay۔ msaalwn main saarf par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh aur aaitm par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh shaml hayn۔ madal par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh: sfarshat tyar karnay kay liye dayta ka astamal krkay ayk madal tyar krta haay۔drjha bndy ka daytasyt ، daytasyt sy kuch malwmat nkalna ، aur is ko "madal" kay tawr par astamal karty hoey hr bar mkml daytasyt astamal kyay baghair sfarshat pysh karnay kay liay۔ mmknha tawr par rftar aur askyl ayblty dono kay fwaid pysh krta haay۔ msaalwn main mytrks fyktraizayshn aur ghhary sykhnay shaml hayn۔-bysda madalza۔ smry main ، mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ayk sfarsh pyda karnay kay liye poray dayta bys kay poray dayta ka astamal krty hay ، jabky madal par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh sfarshat pyda karnay kay liye dayta ka astamal krkay ayk madal tshkyl dyty haay۔mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh sst aur twsya pzayr nahin hawskty hay ، jabky madal par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh mmknha tawr par rftar aur askyl ayblty dono kay fwaid pysh krty haay۔mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ki msaalwn main saarf par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh aur aaitm par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh shaml hain ، jabky madal par mbny bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh ki msaalwn main mytrks fyktraizayshn aur ghhary lrnngh par mbny madal shaml hayn۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza aur un kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: wrda 2 wy ay sy ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main astamal hawty hay takha kam jhaty jghha main hakyky kdr waly wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔lfza aymbydangh ayn ayl py main bohat sy msail ko hal karnay ka ayk lazmi jzaw haay۔wha dkhatay hain keh ansan kis tarah mshyn ko zaban smjhtay hayn۔wrda 2 wy ay sy ayn ayl py ki dnya main haalyha pyshrft hay aur isy srayt karnay aur mtn kay tjzayay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔asay twmas mykwlwf nay mtaarf kraya tha aur yeh ayk atly do prtwn wala asaby nyt wrk hay jo mtradf alfaza ka ptha lghaskta hay aur ayk bar trbyt kay bad jzawy jmlwn kay liye azuafy alfaza tjwyza krskta haay۔wrda 2 wy ay sy ayk aaly jhaty jghha main addy wyktr bnata hay jabky un kay mabyn symntk aur nhawy talkat ko mhafwza rkhtay hawiay۔ wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydangh ka bnyady astamal kdrty zaban ki prwsysngh kay kamwn main hay jesay mtn ki mmasalt ، sfarsh kay nzaam ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، dstawyza klstrngh ، aur mtn ki drjha bndy۔wrda aymbydangh ko isi tarah kay alfaza ki ghnty karnay ، mtalkha alfaza ka ayk ghrwp bnanay aur mtn ki drjha bndy kay liye khsawsayat fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔wrda 2 wy ay sy ayk alghwrthm hay js ko ghwghl main trbyt kay alfaza ki sragh lghanay kay liye ayjad kya gaya haay۔yha tksym ki kyas aaraiy par anhasaar krta hay ، js main kaha gaya hay keh jn alfaza main aksar ayk hi prawsy alfaza hawtay hain woh ayk jesay hawtay hayn۔as sy jghrafyaiy tawr par kryb sy aymbydangh wyktrwn ko kryb sy mltay jltay alfaza ka nkshha bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔wrda 2 wy ay sy madal ayk un pt prt ، ayk prwjykshn prt ، aur ayk aaؤt pt prt kay sath atly aasaaby nyt wrk hayn۔ khlasaha ، wrda 2 wy ay sy ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ayn ayl py main astamal ki jati hay takha kam jhaty jghha main hakyky kdr waly wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydangh mkhtlf ayn ayl py kamwn main astamal hawta hay jesay mtn ki mmasalt ، sfarsh kay nzaam ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، dstawyza klstrngh ، aur mtn ki drjha bndy۔wrda 2 wy ay sy tksym ki kyas aaraiy par anhasaar krta hay aur ayk aaly jhaty jghha main addy wyktr bnata hay jabky un kay mabyn symntk aur nhawy talkat ko mhafwza rkhta haay۔

Question: trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ayk tawyl klyl mdty mymwry (LSTM) nyt wrk ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: trtyb ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye ayk tawyl klyl mdty mymwry (LSTM) nyt wrk ki trbyt main mndrjha zayl aham akdamat shaml hayn: dayta ki tyary: pehla kdm LSTM nyt wrk ki trbyt kay liye dayta ko tyar karna haay۔as main tslsl ka daytasyt mntkhb karna aur is ko askylngh aur isy mamwl par lakr dayta pry prwsys karna shaml haay۔ madal ka antkhab: aghla mrhalha ayl ays ty aym nyt wrk kay liye mnasb fn tamyr ka antkhab karna haay۔as main prtwn ki tadad ، hr prt main nywranwn ki tadad ، aur ayktywyshn kay afaal ko astamal karnay kay baray main fysalha karna shaml haay۔ madal ko trbyt dyna: aghla mrhalha ayl ays ty aym nyt wrk ko trtyb kay aadad wa shmar par trbyt dena haay۔as main nyt wrk main un pt tslsl ko khana khlana aur wkt kay zaryaay byk prwpyghyshn ka astamal karty hoey wzan ko ap dayt karna shaml haay۔ tshkhysa: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh kesi twsayk kay syt par ayl ays ty aym nyt wrk ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ haaipr pyra mytr tnngh: aghla mrhalha is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye LSTM nyt wrk kay haaiprprmytrza ko tywn karna haay۔as main sykhnay ki shrha ، ahadwn ki tadad ، aur dyghr pyramytrza ko aydajst karna shaml hay jo trbyt kay aml ko mtasar karty hayn۔ tystngh: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tystngh syt par ayl ays ty aym nyt wrk ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main madal ki karkrdghy ki tsadyk kay l met mytrks ki kmpywtngh shaml haay۔ khlasaha main ، trtyb ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye ayk ayl ays ty aym nyt wrk ki trbyt main dayta ki tyary ، madal ka antkhab ، trbyt ، twsayk ، haaiprprmytr tnngh ، aur janch shaml haay۔ayl ays ty aym tslsl ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal hawty hain ، jesay tkryr ki phachan ، mshyn trjmha ، aur astak ki kymt ki pysh ghwiy۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: abtdaiy tawr par rkna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt main astamal hawty hay takha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwka jaskay aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔abtdaiy rknay ka mksad trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ko zayada sy zayada kam karnay sy pehlay trbyt kay aml ko rwkna haay۔trbyt kay doran ayk twsayk par madal ki karkrdghy ki nghrany krkay aur trbyt kay aml ko rwknay kay bad abtdaiy rwk tham ka kam jab twsayk kay syt par karkrdghy main bhatry aaty haay۔abtdaiy rknay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: manytr madal ki karkrdghy: trbyt kay doran ، madal ki karkrdghy ko twsayk kay syt par manytr kya jata haay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ trbyt ko rwknay kay liye trghr kryn: jab twsayk kay syt par karkrdghy main bhatry aaty hay tou trbyt ka aml rwk diya jata haay۔as ka tayn kesi trghr kay zaryaha kya jata hay ، jo karkrdghy main bhatry kay liye ayk mkrrha tadad ya ayk had hawskta haay۔ astamal karnay kay liye madal ka antkhab: jab trbyt ka aml band hawjata hay tou ، madal pyramytrza jo twsayk kay syt par bhatryn karkrdghy dytay hayn۔hatmy madal kay tawr par astamal kya jata haay۔ tyzay sy rkna aasaaby nyt wrks main zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay kay liye ayk aasan aur mwsar tknyk haay۔as ko mkhtlf laibryrywn jesay kyras aur tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔abtdaiy rknay ka sab sy braa faidha yeh hay keh yeh madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bna sakta hay aur zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwk sakta hay ، jo niay aadad wa shmar par bhatr karkrdghy ka baasa bn sakta haay۔khlasaha yeh hay keh abtdaiy tawr par rkna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt main astamal hawty hay takha zayada mnasb hony aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔yha trbyt kay doran ayk twsayk par madal ki karkrdghy ki nghrany krkay aur trbyt kay aml ko rwknay kay zaryaha kam krta hay jab twsayk kay syt par karkrdghy bhatr hony sy rk jati haay۔abtdaiy rkna aasaaby nyt wrks main zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay kay liye ayk aasan aur mwsar tknyk haay۔

Question: ty sn (ty tksym shuda astakstk prawsy aymbydangh) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur tawl wa arzu main kami main is kay astamal۔
Answer: ty sn (ty tksym shuda astakstk prawsy aymbydangh) ayk aysy tknyk hay jo tawl wa arzu main kami aur dayta wyzenaizayshn kay liye mshyn lrnngh main astamal hawty haay۔yha khasa tawr par aaly jhaty daytasyts ko dykhnay kay liye mnasb haay۔yhaan 1MATHWRKS2LVDMAATEN3DATACAMP4TOWARDASDATASCIENCEINCEINCEIPEDIA hain

Question: drjha bndy kay liye bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra ko trbyt denay main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: drjha bndy kay liye bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra ko trbyt denay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: pehla kdm bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra ko trbyt denay kay liye dayta tyar karna haay۔as main lybl laga hoa msaalwn ka daytasyt ka antkhab karna aur is ko askylngh aur isy mamwl par lakr dayta pry prwsys karna shaml haay۔ madal ka antkhab: aghla mrhalha bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra kay l appropriate mnasb haaiprprmytrza ka antkhab karna haay۔as main drkhtwn ki tadad ، hr drkht ki zayada sy zayada ghharaiy ، aur dusray pyramytrza ka fysalha karna shaml hay jo trbyt kay aml ko mtasar karty hayn۔ madal ko trbyt dyna: aghla mrhalha lybl laga hoa msaalwn par bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra ko trbyt dena haay۔as main khsawsayat kay bay trtyb sab syt aur msaalwn kay bay trtyb sab syt ka astamal karty hoey fysalha kn drkhtwn ka ayk syt bnana shaml haay۔fysalay kay drkhtwn ko bay trtyb jnghl bnanay kay liye mlaya gaya hay ، aur wzan ko byghngh ka astamal karty hoey ap dayt kya jata haay۔ tshkhysa: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh twsayk kay syt par bay trtyb jnghl kay jwranay ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ haaiprprmytr tywnngh: aghla mrhalha is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra kay haaiprprmytrza ko tywn karna haay۔as main drkhtwn ki tadad ، hr drkht ki zayada sy zayada ghharaiy ، aur dusray pyramytrza ko aydajst karna shaml hay jo trbyt kay aml ko mtasar karty hayn۔as main madal ki karkrdghy ki tsadyk kay l met mytrks ki kmpywtngh shaml haay۔ khlasaha main ، drjha bndy kay liye bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra ko trbyt denay main dayta ki tyary ، madal ka antkhab ، madal ki trbyt ، twsayk ، haaiprprmytr tywnngh ، aur janch shaml haay۔bay trtyb jnghlat drjha bndy kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal ki gain ، jesay tsawyry drjha bndy ، mtn ki drjha bndy ، aur dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghana۔bay trtyb jnghlat kay jwranay ka astamal aasan hay aur un main kuch aham haaiprprmytrza hain ، jo un ko mshyn sykhnay kay bohat sy msail kay l a ayk mkbwl antkhab bnatay hayn۔

Question: lkyry rjat psnd madalza main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: lkyry rjat psnd madalza main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: L1 bakaadghy: madal kay pyramytrza ki mtalk akdar ki bnyad par jrmanha ki asatalaha shaml krty haay۔ madal kay kuch pyramytrza ko safr par trtyb dy kar wyrl halwn ko jnm dyta haay۔chwnkha yeh safr sy wabstha kesi bhi mtghyrat ko chhwra sakta hay jo safr par jatay hayn۔an main sy kesi ko balkl safr par syt kryn۔ jab kwlynyir ya kwda par mnhasar khsawsayat mwjwd hawn۔ ayl 2 ryghwlraizayshn ko ryj ryghwlraizayshn kay nam sy bhi jana jata haay۔ ayl 1 aur ayl 2 ryghwlraizayshn kay darmiyan bnyady frk khsaray ki tkryb main shaml jrmanay ki asatalaha ki ksm haay۔L1 ryghwlraizayshn madal kay pyramytrza ki mtalk akdar ki bnyad par jrmanay ki asatalaha main azuafha krty hay ، jabky L2 ryghwlraizayshn madal kay pyramytrza kay mrba ki bnyad par jrmanay ki asatalaha main azuafha krty haay۔as kay ntyjay main ، L1 bakaadghy sy madal kay kuch pyramytrza ko safr par trtyb dy kar wyrl hal pyda hawta hay ، jabky L2 bakaadghy sy madal kay tamam pyramytrza safr ki taraf kam hawjatay hain ، lekin un main sy kesi ko bhi safr par syt nahin krta haay۔L1 ryghwlraizayshn khsawsayt kay antkhab kay l useful mfyd hay ، jabky L2 ryghwlraizayshn mfyd hay jab wahan kwlynyir ya kwda par mnhasar khsawsayat mwjwd hawn۔ khlasaha ، L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn do aam tknyk hain jo lkyry ryghryshn madal main astamal hawty hain takha zayada mnasb hony aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔L1 ryghwlraizayshn madal kay pyramytrza ki mtalk akdar ki bnyad par jrmanay ki asatalaha main azuafha krty hay ، jabky L2 ryghwlraizayshn madal kay pyramytrza kay mrba ki bnyad par jrmanay ki asatalaha main azuafha krty haay۔L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn kay darmiyan bnyady frk khsaray kay fnkshn main shaml jrmanay ki asatalaha ki ksm haay۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main twjha kay tarykha kar kay tsawr aur trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: twjha kay tarykha kar ayk aysy tknyk hain jo aasaaby nyt wrks main trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn kay liye astamal hawty hain ، jesay mshyn trjmha aur tkryr ki phachan۔twjha kay tarykha kar ka mksad yeh hay keh aaؤt pt trtyb pyda karty wkt madal ko un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par twjha denay ki ajazat di jaiay۔tslsl sy trtyb kay kamwn main twjha kay tarykha kar ko astamal karnay main aham akdamat yahan shaml hayn: un pt trtyb ko ankwda kryn: pehla mrhalha yeh hay keh un pt trtyb ko pwshydha ryastwn kay ayk syt main ankwda kya jaye jesay bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) jesay ayl ays ty aym ka astamal kryn۔gru.com twjha kay wzan ko bhatr bnaiyn: aghla mrhalha un pt trtyb main hr pwshydha ryast kay liye twjha kay wzan ki ghnty karna haay۔as main mwjwdha daykwdar ryast kay sath is ki mmasalt ki bnyad par hr chhpy hui ryast kay liye askwr ki ghnty shaml haay۔ syak wa sbak wyktr ko jwrayn: aghla mrhalha un pt tslsl pwshydha ryastwn ka wzan wala rkm la kar syak wa sbak kay wyktr ki ghnty karna hay ، jahan wzan haaypchhlay mrhalay main twjha kay wzan ki ghnty ki ghiy۔daykwdar aar ayn ayn syak wa sbak wyktr aur pchhlay aaؤt pt twkn ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur aghly aaؤt pt twkn tyar krta haay۔ twjha kay tarykha kar ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh madal ko aaؤt pt tslsl pyda karty wkt un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par twjha denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔as sy madal ki karkrdghy main bhatry aaskty hay aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony kay khtaray ko kam kya jaskta haay۔twjha kay tarykha kar ko wsya pymanay par trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn main astamal kya jata hay jesay mshyn trjmha ، tkryr ki phachan ، aur mtn ka khlasaha۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، twjha kay tarykha kar ayk aysy tknyk hain jo trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn kay liye aasaaby nyt wrks main astamal hawty hain ، jesay mshyn trjmha aur tkryrphachantwjha kay tarykha kar madal ko aaؤt pt tslsl pyda karty wkt un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par twjha denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn main twjha kay tarykha kar ko astamal karnay main shaml aham akdamat un pt trtyb ko ankwda kar rahay hain ، twjha kay wzan ki kmpywtngh ، syak wa sbak wyktr ki kmpywtngh ، aur aaؤt pt trtyb ko zuabtaha kshaiy krrhaay hayn۔twjha kay tarykha kar ko trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata hay aur woh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony kay khtaray ko kam krskta haay۔

Question: Q- lrnngh ka astamal karty hoey ghhary kmk sykhnay kay ayjnt ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: Q-lrnngh ka astamal karty hoey ghhary kmk sykhnay kay ayjnt ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: Q- akdar ko shrwa kryn: pehla kdm hr ryast aykshn jwray kay liye Q- akdar ko shrwa karna haay۔yha tsaadfy tawr par ya ayk mkrrha kymt kay sath kya jaskta haay۔ ayk aml ko mntkhb kryn: aghla mrhalha mwjwdha bhatryn Q-value ki bnyad par kesi aml ka antkhab karna haay۔yha ayksplwryshn ayksplwyshn hakmt amly jesay aypsyln ghryday ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ aykshn ka prfarm kryn: aghla mrhalha mntkhb krdha karrwaiy ko anjam dena aur ntaij (niy ryast) ka mshahadha karna haay۔ anaam ko pysh kryn: aghla mrhalha anaam ki pymaish karna haay۔aykshn ko anjam denay kay bad۔ Q- akdar: aghla mrhalha byl myn msawat ka astamal karty hoey Q- akdar ko ap dayt karna hay ، js main aghly ryast ka zayada sy zayada Q-value lena aur anaam shaml karna shaml haay۔akdamat is wkt tak dharaiay jatay hain jab tak keh absrn haasal nah hawjaiay ya zayada sy zayada tadad tkrar tak phanch jaiay۔as sy trbyt kay aml ki asthakam aur karkrdghy main bhatry aaskty haay۔ aasaaby nyt wrk ko trbyt dyn: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh Q- akdar aur tjrbay main mhafwza krdha tjrbat ka astamal karty hoey aasaaby nyt wrk ko trbyt di jaiay۔kyw lrnngh kay astamal main Q- akdar ko shrwa karna ، aykshn ka antkhab karna ، aml anjam dena ، anaam ki pymaish karna ، Q- akdar ko ap dayt karna ، mzakwrha bala akdamat ko dharana ، tjrbha ry play ka astamal karna ، aur aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt shaml haay۔Q- lrnngh kmk sykhnay kay liye ayk mkbwl alghwrthm hay ، aur is ka astamal ayjntwn ko khyl khylnay ، mahawl ko nywyghyt karnay aur dyghr kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye trbyt denay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main bych ko mamwl par lanay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: bych ko mamwl par lana ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby nyt wrks main astamal hawty hay takha trbyt kay aml ko bhatr bnaya jaskay aur zayada sy zayada ftngh ko kam kya jaskay۔yha nyt wrk ki hr prt main aadanwn ko mamwl par latay hoey kam krta hay ، jo trbyt kay doran hony wali dakhly kwwyryt shft ko kam karnay main mdd krskta haay۔bych ko mamwl par lanay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: wsta aur tghyrat ki ghnty kryn: pehla mrhalha yeh hay keh hr prt main aadanwn kay wsta aur tghyr ki ghnty kryn۔yha msaalwn kay ayk mny bych par ya pori trbyt kay syt par kya jaskta haay۔ un pt ko narmlaiza kryn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh hr prt main aadanwn ko mamwl bnana hay aur mayary anharaf kay zaryaha tksym krkay۔as sy dakhly kwwryt shft ko kam karnay aur trbyt kay aml kay asthakam ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ askyl aur mamwl kay mtaabk un pt ko shft kryn: aghla mrhalha sykhnay kay kabl pyramytrza ka astamal karty hoey mamwl kay mtaabk un pt ko pymanha aur mntkl karna haay۔as sy nyt wrk ki nmaindghy ki taakt ko bhaal karnay aur madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ pyramytrza ko ap dayt kryn: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl ka astamal karty hoey nyt wrk kay pyramytrza ko ap dayt kryn۔ bych ko mamwl par lanay ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh yeh haay۔trbyt kay aml kay asthakam aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay ، zayada sy zayada ftngh ko kam krskta hay ، aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔bych ko mamwl par lanay main ghhary sykhnay main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay ، aur is ka atalak mkhtlf ksm kay asaby nyt wrks par kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl fydafwrwrda nyt wrks ، knwwlyshnl nywrl nyt wrks ، aur bar bar nywrl nyt wrks۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، bych ko mamwl bnana ayk aysy tknyk hay jo trbyt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye nywrl nyt wrks main astamal kya jata haay۔aml aur had sy zayada ko kam kryn۔yha nyt wrk ki hr prt main aadanwn ko mamwl par lanay ، sykhnay kay kabl pyramytrza ka astamal karty hoey mamwl kay aadanwn ko askylngh aur shft karnay ، aur byk prwprapshn aur astakstk mylan nzawl ka astamal karty hoey nyt wrk kay pyramytrza ko ap dayt krkay kam krta haay۔bych ko mamwl par lana ghhary sykhnay main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay aur trbyt kay aml ki asthakam aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay ، zayada mnasbyt ko kam krskta hay ، aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔

Question: ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay kamwn main aatw ankwdarza kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: aatw ankwdarza ayk ksm kay asaby nyt wrk fn tamyr hain jo ghair mnzam sykhnay kay kamwn kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wha un pt dayta ki mwsar nmaindghy sykhnay kay liye tyar kyay gaye hain takha isy nchly jhaty jghha main kam kryn۔aatw ankwdarza do aham hasawn par mushtamil hayn: ayk ankwdar aur ayk daykwdar۔ankwdar un pt dayta lyta hay aur isy kam jhaty nmaindghy main dbata hay ، jabky daykwdar kmprysda nmaindghy lyta hay aur asal un pt dayta ki tshkyl nw krta haay۔aatw ankwdarza ka mksad un pt dayta ki kmprysda nmaindghy sykhna hay jo aadad wa shmar ki sab sy aham khsawsayat ko apni ghrft main la jata haay۔ yahan ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay kamwn main aatw ankwdarwn ki kuch aham ayply kyshnza hayn: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay: aatw aynkwdarza ko dayta main adm tzuadat ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔madal ko aam dayta par trbyt dy kar aur phir is ko dayta pwaints ki nshandhay karnay kay l using astamal krkay jo aam tksym sy nmayan tawr par anharaf karty hayn۔ dayta daynwzangh: aatw ankwdarza ko shwr ki un pt sy asal dayta ki tshkyl nw kay liye madal ki trbyt krkay dayta sy shwr ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ amyj anpynngh۔: jzawy tawr par khrab un pt sy asal shbyhaha ki tshkyl nw kay liye madal ko trbyt dy kar kesi tsawyr kay ghmshdha hasawn ko bhrnay kay liye aatw aynkwdarza ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔ anfarmyshn bazayaft: aatw ankwdarza ko tykst dayta ki kmprysda nmaindghy sykhnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo malwmat ki bazayaft kay kamwn kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔. jhat main kmy: aatw ankwdarza ko aadad wa shmar ki ayk kmprysda nmaindghy sykh kar aaly jhaty aadad wa shmar ki jhat ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، aatw ankwdarza nywrl nyt wrk fn tamyr ki ayk ksm hain jo ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay kamwn kay liye astamal hawty hayn۔wha un pt dayta ki mwsar nmaindghy sykhnay kay liye tyar kyay gaye hain takha isy nchly jhaty jghha main kam kryn۔aatw ankwdarza kay pas ghair mnzam sykhnay kay kamwn main mkhtlf ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ، dayta daynwaizangh ، amyj anpyntngh ، malwmat ki bazayaft ، aur jhat main kami shaml haay۔

Question: klstrngh kay liye ghawsy mkschr madal (jy aym aym) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: klstrngh kay liye ghawsy mkschr madal (jy aym aym) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: madal pyramytrza ko shrwa kryn: pehla kdm madal pyramytrza ko shrwa karna hay ، js main mtalb ، kwwyryns aur akhtlata ghtank shaml hayn۔yha tsaadfy tawr par ya ayk mkrrha kymt kay sath kya jaskta haay۔yha baiys kay nzaryha ka astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔ myksymaizayshn mrhalha: aghla mrhalha twka mrhalay main mrtb hony waly amkanat ka astamal karty hoey madal pyramytrza ko ap dayt karna haay۔as main hr klstr kay liye niay wsylha ، hum aahanghy ، aur ghtankwn ko akhtlata karna shaml haay۔ rypyt akdamat 2-3: mzakwrha bala akdamat is wkt tak dharaiay jatay hain jab tak keh absrn haasal nah hawjaiay ya zayada sy zayada tadad tkrar tak phanch jaiay۔ pysh ghwiy klstr ki rknyt: ayk bar madal ki trbyt ki jaye ،as ka astamal niay dayta pwaints ki klstr mmbrshp ki pysh ghwiy kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ jy aym aym ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh pychydha dayta ki tksym ka nmwnha bna sakta hay aur ghair lkyry hadwd kay sath klstrza ki shnakht krskta haay۔jy aym aym ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main braay pymanay par astamal kya jata hay jesay amyj syghmnttyshn ، bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ، aur tkryr ki shnakht۔ khlasaha main ، klstrngh kay liye ayk ghawsy mkschr madal (jy aym aym) ki trbyt main madal pyramytrza ko shrwa karna shaml hay ، hr ayk klstr sy talk rkhnay waly hr dayta pwaint kay amkan ki ghnty karna ،madal pyramytrza ko ap dayt karna ، mzakwrha bala akdamat ko dharana ، aur klstr mmbrshp ki pysh ghwiy krna۔jy aym aym klstrngh kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hay aur pychydha aadad wa shmar ki tksym ka nmwnha bna sakti hay aur ghair lkyry hadwd kay sath klstrza ki shnakht kar sakti haay۔

Question: drjha bndy kay kamwn main sahat sy mtalk aur drstghy main kya frk haay؟
Answer: sahat sy mtalk aur drstghy do aham mytrks hain jo mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye drjha bndy kay kamwn main astamal hawty hayn۔sahat sy mtalk aur drstghy kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: drstghy: pymaish krty hay keh ntaij ki pysh ghwiy karnay main madal ktny bar drst hawty haay۔ pysh ghwiwn ki kal tadad kay zaryaha sahayha pysh ghwiwn ki tadad ko tksym krkay is swal ka hasab ktab kya jata haay: yeh swal: madal ktny bar sahayha hawta haay؟kchh maamlat main ghmraha kn hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par jab klaswn ko adm twazan bnaya jata haay۔ghlta msabt). swal jwab dyta haay: jab msabt pysh ghwiyan drst hawty hain tou mfyd haay؟ jab jhwtay msabt ki kymt zayada hawty hay ، jesay taby tshkhysa myn۔ khlasaha main ، drstghy ki pymaish krty hay keh ntaij ki pysh ghwiy karnay main madal ktny bar drst hawty hay ، jabky sahat sy mtalkpymaish krta hay keh madal ktny bar msabt tabkay ki pysh ghwiy krty haay۔kchh maamlat main drstghy ghmraha kn hawskty hay ، khasa tawr par jab klaswn main adm twazan hawta hay ، jab keh jhwty msabtat ki kymt zayada hony par sahat sy mtalk mfyd hawta hay ، jesay taby tshkhysa myn۔dwnwn mytrks drjha bndy kay kamwn main aham hain aur mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye mil kar astamal kya jana chahaiay۔

Question: wrda frykwynsy-anwrswrs dstawyza frykwynsy (TF-IDF) aur mtn kay tjzayay main is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: TF-IDF (asatalahay tadd-andars dstawyza frykwinsy) ayk aadadwshmar ka tarykha hay jo mtn kay tjzayha main astamal hawta hay takha dstawyzaat kay zakhyray (yany karps kay nsbt) kay zakhyray sy mtalk kesi dstawyza main kesi lfza ki ahamyt ka tayn kya jaskay۔yha ayk addy aadadwshmar hay js ka mksad is bat ki akasy karna hay keh kesi lfza ko kesi mjmwaha ya karps main kesi dstawyza kay liye kitna aham haay۔TF-IDF ko do hasawn main twraa jaskta haay: asatalahay tadd (TF) aur alta dstawyza ki frykwinsy (IDF)۔TF-IDF ka hasab lghanay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: asatalahay tadd (TF): mdt ki tadd pymaish krty hay keh kesi dstawyza main asatalaha ktny bar zaahar hawty haay۔as ka hasab mkhtlf akdamat ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta hay jesay kesi dstawyza (kham ghnty) main lfza zaahar hawta hay ya dstawyza main alfaza ki tadad kay zaryaha tksym krdha wakaat ki kham ghnty۔karps main ayk lfza kitna aam ya ghair mamwly haay۔as ki asatalaha par mushtamil dstawyzaat ki tadad kay zaryaha tksym krdha karps main dstawyzaat ki kal tadad kay lwghrthm kay tawr par hasab kya jata haay۔ ty ayf-aaiy day ayf: ty ayf aai day ayf ka hasab alta dstawyza ki frykwiynsy kay zaryaha asatalahay tadd ko zurb dy kar kya jata haay۔as sy shraita ko zayada wzan mlta hay jo karps main nayab hawtay hain lekin kesi dstawyza main ksart sy hawtay hayn۔ ty ayf aai day ayf ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh yeh kesi dstawyza ya karps main anthaaiy aham alfaza ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krskta haay۔yha mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay jesay anfarmyshn bazayaft ، tykst kan kny ، aur saarf madalngh۔ khlasaha main ، TF-IDF ayk aadad wa shmar ka tarykha hay jo mtn kay tjzayha main astamal kya jata hay takha dstawyzaat kay zakhyray sy mtalk kesi dstawyza main kesi lfza ki ahamyt ka tayn kya jaskay۔as main tadd ، alta dstawyza ki frykwinsy ki asatalaha ka hasab lghana aur TF-IDF askwr haasal karnay kay l them inhain zurb dena shaml haay۔TF-IDF mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay jesay anfarmyshn bazayaft ، tykst mainngh ، aur saarf madalngh۔

Question: jnrytw madalngh kay l a mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (VAE) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jnrytw madalngh kay l a mkhtlf mtghyrat aatw aynkwdar (VAE) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: un pt dayta ko ankwda kryn: pehla kdm un pt dayta ko ankwdar nywrl nyt wrk ka astamal karty hoey kam jhaty awykt jghha main ankwda karna haay۔ankwdar nyt wrk un pt dayta lyta hay aur isy awykt jghha main ghawsy tksym kay many aur tghyr par nkshha bnata haay۔ awykt jghha sy nmwnha: aghla mrhalha ayk awykt kwda pyda karnay kay liye awykt jghha main ghawsy tksym sy nmwnha bnana haay۔daykwda awykt kwda: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh daykwdar nywrl nyt wrk ka astamal karty hoey awykt kwda ko asal un pt aspys main waps krdya jaiay۔daykwdar nyt wrk awykt kwda lyta hay aur isy asal un pt aspys par nkshha bnata haay۔ nksaan ko rwkyn: aghla mrhalha asal un pt dayta aur tamyr nw kay aadad wa shmar kay mabyn hony waly nksaan ka hasab lghana haay۔as nksaan ka hasab tamyr nw kay nksaan aur kay ayl daaiywrjns nksaan kay jwhar kay tawr par kya jata haay۔kha woh un pt dayta ki kmprysda nmaindghy sykh saktay hain jo aadad wa shmar ki sab sy aham khsawsayat ko apni ghrft main lytay hain aur aadad wa shmar kay niay nmwnay tyar karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔VAEs mkhtlf ayply kyshnza jesay amyj jnryshn ، tykst jnryshn ، aur mywzak jnryshn main wsya pymanay par astamal hawtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، jnrytw madalngh kay liye ayk mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (VAE) ki trbyt main un pt dayta ko ankwda karna ، dyr sy kwda sy nmwnay lenay ، hasab ktab karna ، hasab ktab karna ، hasab ktab karna ، hasab ktab karna ، hasab ktab karna shaml haay۔nksaan ، aur nyt wrk kay zaryaha nksaan ko byk krna۔VAE jnrytw madalngh kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur un pt dayta ki kmprysda nmaindghy sykh sakti hain jo dayta ki sab sy aham khsawsayat ko apni ghrft main lyty hain aur niay dayta kay nmwnay tyar karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔

Question: tdryjy frwgh denay main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: abtdaiy tawr par rkna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo tdryjy frwgh denay main astamal hawty hay takha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwka jaskay aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔yha trbyt kay aml kay doran ayk twsayk syt par madal ki karkrdghy ki nghrany krkay aur trbyt kay aml ko rwknay kay bad kam krta hay jab twsayk kay syt par karkrdghy bhatr hony sy rk jati haay۔tdryjy frwgh denay main abtdaiy astapngh kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ko tksym kryn: pehla kdm dayta ko trynngh syt aur twsayk kay syt main tksym karna haay۔trbyt ka syt madal ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky twsayk ka syt trbyt kay aml kay doran madal ki karkrdghy ki nghrany kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ madal ko tryn kryn: aghla mrhalha madal ko tdryjy frwgh denay ka astamal karty hoey madal ki trbyt karna haay۔madal ko trynngh syt par trbyt di jati hay aur bakaadghy sy wkfwn par twsayk kay syt par is ka andazaha kya jata haay۔ karkrdghy ka mzaaharha: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh trbyt kay aml kay doran twsayk syt par madal ki karkrdghy ki nghrany karna haay۔yha kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr kay zaryaha kya jaskta haay۔ trbyt ko rwkyn: hatmy akdam yeh hay keh jab twsayk kay syt par karkrdghy main bhatry aaty hay tou trbyt kay aml ko rwkna haay۔yha rwadary kay pyramytr ki wzuahat kay zaryaha kya jaskta hay jo yeh kntrwl krta hay keh trbyt kay aml ko baghair kesi bhatry kay kitna arsaha jary rkhna chahaiay۔ jld rknay ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh yeh zayada mnasb hony sy bch sakta hay aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔abtdaiy rknay sy mkhtlf ayply kyshnza jesay tsawyry drjha bndy ، mtn ki drjha bndy ، aur dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، abtdaiy rkna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye tdryjy frwgh denay main astamal hawty haay۔as main dayta ko trynngh syt aur twsayk kay syt main tksym karna ، madal ki trbyt ، twsayk kay syt par madal ki karkrdghy ki nghrany karna ، aur twsayk kay syt par karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana band hawjata hay tou trbyt kay aml ko rwkna shaml hawta haay۔abtdaiy rknay sy mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay aur woh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony kay khtaray ko kam krskta haay۔

Question: aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main alfaza ki twjha kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: alfaza ki twjha ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main astamal ki jati hay takha trjmha kay aml kay doran un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par antkhaby tawr par twjha mrkwza krkay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main alfaza ki twjha kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: un pt trtyb ko ankwda kryn: pehla mrhalha yeh hay keh un pt trtyb ko pwshydha ryastwn kay ayk syt main ankwda karna hay jo bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) jesay ayl ays ty aym ya jy aar yw ka astamal karty hayn۔twjha kay wzan ka hasab lghaiyn: aghla mrhalha un pt trtyb main hr pwshydha haalt kay liye twjha kay wzan ki ghnty karna haay۔as main mwjwdha daykwdar ryast kay sath is ki mmasalt ki bnyad par hr chhpy hui ryast kay liye askwr ki ghnty shaml haay۔ syak wa sbak wyktr ko jwrayn: aghla mrhalha un pt tslsl pwshydha ryastwn ka wzan wala rkm la kar syak wa sbak kay wyktr ki ghnty karna hay ، jahan wzan haaypchhlay mrhalay main twjha kay wzan ki ghnty ki ghiy۔daykwdar aar ayn ayn syak wa sbak wyktr aur pchhlay aaؤt pt twkn ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur aghly aaؤt pt twkn tyar krta haay۔ alfaza ki twjha ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh is sy madal ko aaؤt pt trtyb pyda karty wkt un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par twjha denay ki ajazat mlty haay۔as sy madal ki karkrdghy main bhatry aaskty hay aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony kay khtaray ko kam kya jaskta haay۔asaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main lfza ki twjha wsya pymanay par astamal ki jati hay aur is ka atalak mkhtlf ksm kay asaby nyt wrks par kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl fydafwrwrda nyt wrks ، knwwlyshnl nywrl nyt wrks ، aur bar bar nywrl nyt wrks۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، alfaza ki twjha ayk aysy tknyk hay jo bhatr bnanay kay liye aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madal main astamal hawty haay۔trjmay kay aml kay doran un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par antkhaby tawr par twjha mrkwza krkay madal ki karkrdghy۔aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main alfaza ki twjha kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat un pt trtyb ko ankwda krrhaay hain ، twjha kay wzan ki kmpywtngh ، syak wa sbak wyktr ki kmpywtngh ، aur aaؤt pt trtyb ko zuabtaha kshaiy krrhaay hayn۔aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main lfza ki twjha wsya pymanay par astamal hawty hay aur madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti hay aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony kay khtaray ko kam krskty haay۔

Question: zaban ki madalngh kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: zaban ki madalngh kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: pry prwsysngh: pehla kdm aadad wa shmar ko lwda karna aur is ki janch karna ، isy saaf karna ، isy twknaiza karna ، aur is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh tamam tslsl ki lmbaiy ayk hi haay۔madalngh: aghla mrhalha aar ayn ayn madal ki tamyr ، trbyt aur janch karna haay۔aar ayn ayn madal ko pehlay sy chlnay waly aadad wa shmar par trbyt di jati hay aur bakaadghy sy wkfwn par ayk twsayk par is ki tshkhysa ki jati haay۔ aar ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha aar ayn ayn kay fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main prtwn ki tadad ، hr prt main nywranwn ki tadad shaml haay۔، ayktywyshn fnkshn ، aur RNN syl (jysay ، LSTM ya GRU) ki ksm۔ madal ko tshkyl dyn: aghla mrhalha RNN madal ko mrtb karna hay ، js main nksaan ki tkryb ، aaptymaizar ، aur tshkhysa mytrks ki wzuahat shaml haay۔madal: aghla kdm RNN madal ko byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl ka astamal karty hoey pry prwsysda dayta par trbyt dena haay۔madal ko trbyt kay syt par trbyt di jati hay aur bakaadghy sy wkfwn par twsayk kay syt par is ki janch ki jati haay۔ madal ki wzuahat kryn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par aar ayn ayn madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، pryshany ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ zaban ki madalngh kay liye RNNs ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh un pt dayta main aarzuy anhasaar par kbzuha krsktay hain aur mtghyr ki lmbaiy kay slslay pyda krsktay hayn۔RNNs ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main braay pymanay par astamal kya jata hay jesay tkryr ki phachan ، mshyn trjmha ، aur tykst jnryshn۔ khlasaha main ، zaban kay madalngh kay liye ayk RNN ki trbyt main aadad wa shmar ko pehlay sy tyar karna ، RNN fn tamyr ki wzuahat ، madal ko mrtb karna ، madal ki trbyt karna ، aur karkrdghy ka jaizaha lena shaml haay۔madal kaRNNs zaban ki madalngh kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur un pt dayta main wkty anhasaar par kbzuha krsktay hain aur mtghyr lmbaiy kay slslay pyda krsktay hayn۔

Question: lajstk ryghryshn madal main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn lajstk ryghryshn madal main astamal hony wali tknyk hain jo zayada mnasb hony aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay l. hayn۔L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: L1 bakaadghy: wzan ki mtalk kymt ko laght kay fnkshn main shaml krta haay۔ kuch wzan ko safr par taay krkay is ki tsadyk ki jati haay۔ khsawsayt kay antkhab kay liye astamal karnay waly aur madal main khsawsayat ki tadad ko kam karty hayn۔L2 ryghwlraizayshn sy zayada kmpywtyshnl mhangha۔ ayl 2 ryghwlraizayshn: wzan ki mrba kymt ko laght kay fnkshn main shaml krta haay۔ chhwtay aur ghair safr wzan ki tsadyk krta haay۔ madal kay asarat ko kam karnay aur madal kay asthakam ko bhatr bnanay kay l .۔hal aur L1 ryghwlraizayshn kay mkablay main kmpywtyshnl tawr par kam mhangha haay۔ khlasaha ، L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn lajstk ryghryshn madal main astamal ki janay wali tknyk hain jo zayada mnasb hony aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay l. hayn۔L1 ryghwlraizayshn asparsyty ki hawsalha afzaaiy krty hay aur khsawsayt kay antkhab kay l useful mfyd hay ، jabky L2 bakaadghy sy chhwtay aur ghair safr wzan ki hawsalha afzaaiy hawty hay aur yeh kwlynyiryty kay asarat ko kam karnay kay liye mfyd haay۔L2 ryghwlraizayshn L1 ryghwlraizayshn kay mkablay main kmpywtyshnl tawr par kam mhangha hay aur is main ayk band farm hal haay۔

Question: ghym play ayjntwn main ghhary kmk sykhnay aur is kay atalak kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: dayp kmk lrnngh lrnngh mshyn lrnngh ka ayk zayly fylda hay jo ayjntwn ko apnay mahawl sy sykhnay aur sykhay hoey tjrbay ki bnyad par fysalay karnay kay kabl bnanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay aur kmk sykhnay ko jwrata haay۔ghym play ayjntwn smyt mkhtlf ayply kyshnza par ghhary kmk sykhnay ka atalak kya gaya haay۔khyl kay khyl kay liye ayk ghhary kmk lrnngh ayjnt ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: ghym mahawl ki wzuahat kryn: pehla kdm ghym mahawl ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main ghym kay kwaad ، ghym astyt aur ghymza shaml hayn۔ anaam ki wzuahat kryn۔fnkshn: aghla mrhalha anaam kay fnkshn ki wzuahat karna hay ، jo is kay aamal ki bnyad par ayjnt ko aaraa fraham krta haay۔anaam ka kam msabt ya mnfy hawskta hay aur is ka astamal ayjnt ko mtalwbha tarza aml ki taraf rhanmaiy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ghhary kmk lrnngh sykhnay kay alghwrthm ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha ghhary kmk lrnngh alghwrthm ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main aasaaby nyt wrk fn tamyr ، aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm shaml hay ،awr rysrch ki hakmt amly۔ ayjnt ko tryn kryn: aghla mrhalha ghhary kmk anfwrsmnt lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey khyl kay mahawl par ayjnt ko trbyt dena haay۔ayjnt mahawl kay sath bat chyt krta hay ، ryast ka mshahadha krta hay ، akdamat krta hay ، aur anaamat wsawl krta haay۔ayjnt tjrbay sy sykhta hay aur mtwka anaam ko zayada sy zayada karnay kay liye apni palysy ko ap dayt krta haay۔ ayjnt ki nshandhay kryn: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par ayjnt ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay wn ryt ، awsta askwr ، aur awstaa ksta ki lmbaiy shaml haay۔ ghym play ayjntwn kay liye ghhary kmk sykhnay ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh tjrbay sy sykh sakta hay aur wkt kay sath apni karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ghhary kmk sykhnay ka atalak mkhtlf khylwn par kya gaya hay ، jn main shtarnj ، ghw ، aur wydayw ghymza shaml hain ، aur is nay jdyd trien karkrdghy haasal ki haay۔ khlasaha main ، ghhary kmk sykhnay mshyn lrnngh ka ayk zayly fylda hay jo ghhary sykhnay aur kmk sykhnay ko jwrata haay۔ayjntwn ko un kay mahawl sy sykhnay aur sykhay hoey tjrbay ki bnyad par fysalay karnay kay kabl bnana۔khyl kay khyl kay liye ghhary kmk lrnngh ayjnt ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat khyl kay mahawl ki wzuahat kar rahay hain ، anaam kay fnkshn ki wzuahat ، ghhary kmk sykhnay kay alghwrthm ki wzuahat ، ayjnt ki trbyt ، aur ayjnt ka jaizaha la rahay hayn۔ghhary kmk sykhnay ka atalak mkhtlf khylwn par kya gaya hay aur is nay jdyd trien karkrdghy haasal ki haay۔

Question: klstrngh kay liye khud sy mnzam nkshha (SOM) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: klstrngh kay liye khud mnzam nkshha (SOM) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: nkshha ko shrwa kryn: pehla kdm nkshha main hr nywran ko tsaadfy tawr par wzan tfwyzu krkay nkshha ko shrwa karna haay۔nkshha main nywran ki tadad aam tawr par un pt dayta kay saiza ki bnyad par mntkhb ki jati haay۔ un pt wyktr ko mntkhb kryn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh un pt dayta sy un pt wyktr ka antkhab karain aur isy swm main pysh kryn۔ bhatryn mmasal ywnt (by aym yw): aghla mrhalha nkshha main nywrwn tlash karna hay js ka wzan un pt wyktr sy zayada mlta jlta haay۔as nywrwn ko bhatryn mmasal ywnt (by aym yw) kaha jata haay۔ by aym yw aur is kay prawsywn kay wzan ko ap dayt kryn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh un pt wyktr sy zayada mmasal bnanay kay liye by aym yw aur is kay hamsayha mmalk kay wzan ko ap dayt kryn۔yha sykhnay ki shrha ka astamal karty hoey kya jata hay jo wkt kay sath sath kam hawta hay aur praws ki tkryb jo ap dayt ki had ka tayn krty haay۔ rypyt akdamat 2-4: un pt dayta main hr un pt wyktr kay liye mzakwrha akdamat dharaiay jatay hain jab tknkshha knwrj ۔asain klstrza: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh hr un pt wyktr ko is klstr ko tfwyzu kya jaye js kay by aym yw main un pt wyktr ka kryb trien wzan hawta haay۔ klstrngh kay liye ays aw aym ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh aaly jhaty aadad wa shmar main klstrwn ki shnakht krsktay hain aur is ka tsawr krsktay hayn۔ayk kam jhaty nkshha main klstrza۔mkhtlf ayply kyshnza jesay amyj prwsysngh ، dayta kmpryshn ، aur dayta wyzenaizayshn main ays aw aym ko wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، klstrngh kay liye sylf aarghnaizangh myp (ays aw aym) ki trbyt main nkshha shrwa karna ، un pt wyktr ka antkhab karna ، bhatryn mmasal ywnt tlash karna (by aym yw)) ، by aym yw aur is kay prawsywn kay wzan ko ap dayt karna ، mzakwrha bala akdamat ko dharana ، aur klstrza tfwyzu krna۔swmza klstrngh kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur aaly jhaty aadad wa shmar main klstrza ki shnakht krsktay hain aur kam jhaty nkshha main klstrza ko dykh saktay hayn۔

Question: mlty klas drjha bndy main sahat sy mtalk aur yad kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: sahat sy mtalk aur yaddasht mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye mlty klas drjha bndy main astamal hony wali do aham mytrks hayn۔sahat sy mtalk aur yad kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: sahat sy mtalk: un msaalwn main hakyky msabt kay tnasb ki pymaish krty hay jn ki madal nay msabt pysh ghwiy ki haay۔ yeh swal hay keh pysh ghwiy ki hogi msabt msaalwn main sy ktnay hi msabt hayn؟ mfyd hay jab jhwtay msabtat ki kymt par mfyd haay۔kya aaly hay ، jesay taby tshkhysa myn۔ ry kal: un tamam msaalwn kay darmiyan hakyky msabt kay tnasb ki pymaish krty hay jo hakykt main msabt hayn۔ yeh swal hay keh yeh swal: ktnay asal msabt wakaat ko sahayha tawr par pysh ghwiy ki hogi thy؟bhat zayada hay ، jesay dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay myn۔ khlasaha main ، sahat sy mtalk un wakaat main hakyky msabt kay tnasb ki pymaish krta hay jn ki madal nay msabt pysh ghwiy ki hay ، jabky yaddasht hakykt main msabt hony wali tamam msaalwn main hakyky msabt kay tnasb ko mapty haay۔sahat sy mtalk is wkt mfyd hay jab jhwtay msabt ki kymt zayada ho ، jab keh jhwtay mnfywn ki kymt zayada hony par yad mfyd haay۔dwnwn mytrks mlty klas ki drjha bndy main aham hain aur mshyn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye mil kar astamal kya jana chahaiay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza aur un kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghs ayk ksm ki lfza aymbydangh tknyk hay jo kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main astamal hawty hay takha kam jhaty jghha main hakyky kdr waly wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza dastry bywshn mfrwzuay par mbny hain ، js main kaha gaya hay keh aysay alfaza jo ayk jesay syak wa sbak main zaahar hawtay hain un kay many hawtay hayn۔wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydangh ko aasaaby nyt wrk fn tamyr ka astamal karty hoey mtn kay ayk braay karps par trbyt di jati hay jo alfaza kay mabyn anjmnwn ya anhasaar ko sykh sakti haay۔wrda 2 wy ay sy srayt ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: nywrl nyt wrk fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: pehla kdm nywrl nyt wrk fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main thawn ki tadad ، hr prt main nywran ki tadad ، aur ayktywyshn fnkshn shaml haay۔ trbyt ko pysh kryn۔aadad wa shmar: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh mtn ko twknaizangh ، alfaza ki tshkyl ، aur trbyt kay nmwnay tyar krkay trbyt ka dayta tyar karna haay۔ madal ko trbyt dyn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk ghrydaynt nzawl ka astamal karty hoey wrda 2 wy ay sy madal ko trynngh dayta par trbyt di jaiay۔madal syak wa sbak kay alfaza ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta hay js main ayk hadf ka lfza diya jata hay ya is kay braks۔ madal ka jaizaha lyn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par wrda 2 wy ay sy madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydangh ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh alfaza kay mabyn symntk aur nhawy talkat ko apni ghrft main la saktay hain aur mkhtlf ayn ayl py kamwn main astamal hawsktay hain jesay mtn ki drjha bndy ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، jzabat ka tjzayha ،awr mshyn trjmha۔wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata hay aur mkhtlf saft wyir laibryrywn jesay jynsym ، tynswrflw ، aur paitwrch۔ un smry main is par aml draamd kya gaya hay ، wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza ayn ayl py main astamal hony waly alfaza ki aymbydangh ki ayk ksm hay js main aay main hakyky kdr waly wyktrwn ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔nchly jhaty jghha۔wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydangh ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat aasaaby nyt wrk fn tamyr ki wzuahat kar rahay hain ، trbyty aadad wa shmar ki tyary ، madal ki trbyt ، aur madal ka jaizaha la rahay hayn۔wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza ko mkhtlf ayn ayl py kamwn main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata hay aur mkhtlf saft wyir laibryrywn main is par aml draamd kya gaya haay۔

Question: mshyn trjmay kay liye transfarmr madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mshyn translyshn kay liye transfarmr madal ki trbyt main mndrjha zayl aham akdamat shaml hayn: trynngh daytasyt tyar kryn: pehla kdm trynngh daytasyt tyar karna hay ، js main jwraay kay zaryaha aur hadf kay jmlwn par mushtamil haay۔daytasyt ko aam tawr par jmlay ko twknaiza karnay ، alfaza ko add main tbdyl karnay ، aur trtyb ko ayk mkrrha lmbaiy main daalnay kay zaryaha pehlay sy tyar kya jata haay۔ transfarmr madal ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha transfarmr madal fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main ankwdar aur daykwdar prt shaml hain ،twjha ka tarykha kar ، aur fydafwrwrda prtyn۔transfarmr madal ko mnba jmlay ki nmaindghy karnay waly add ki ayk trtyb main lenay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay aur hadf kay jmlha ki nmaindghy karnay waly add ka ayk slslha۔trbyt kay doran ، madal kras ayntrwpy jesay nksaan kay fnkshn ko kam sy kam krkay makhza ki szaa kay pysh nzar hadf ki szaa ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta haay۔ madal ka jaizaha lyn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par transfarmr madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، pryshany ، aur BLEU askwr shaml hayn۔ mshyn translyshn kay liye transfarmr madal ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh tawyl mdty anhasaar par kbzuha krsktay hain aur mtghyr lmbaiy kay un pt aur aaؤt pt trtyb ko snbhal saktay hayn۔transfarmr madalza nay mshyn translyshn kay mkhtlf kamwn main jdyd trien karkrdghy haasal ki hay aur mkhtlf saft wyir laibryrywn jesay tynsrflw ، paitwrch ، aur kyras daat kam main is par aml draamd kya gaya hay ، mshyn kay trjmay kay liye ayk transfarmr madal ki trbyt main trbyty daytasyt ki tyary shaml hay ،transfarmr madal fn tamyr ki wzuahat ، madal ki trbyt ، aur madal ka andazaha krna۔transfarmr madal mshyn trjmha kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur tawyl mdty anhasaar par kbzuha krsktay hain aur mtghyr lmbaiy kay un pt aur aaؤt pt trtyb ko snbhal saktay hayn۔

Question: mjaza asaby nyt wrks main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bnanay kay l convivivelive mjazay aasaaby nyt wrks (CNNs) main astamal hawty haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn trbyt kay doran sy ayn ayn main kuch nywran ko tsaadfy tawr par chhwra kar kam krty hay ، jo baky nywran ko mazeed mzubwta khsawsayat sykhnay par mjbwr krty haay۔sy ayn ayn main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: pehla kdm sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main prtwn ki tadad ، hr prt main nywran ki tadad ، aur ayktywyshn fnkshn۔madal: aghla mrhalha sy ayn ayn madal ko mrtb karna hay ، js main nksaan ki tkryb ، aaptymaizar ، aur tshkhysa mytrks ki wzuahat shaml haay۔ darap aaؤt prtyn: aghla mrhalha sy ayn ayn madal main darap aaؤt prtwn ko shaml karna haay۔darap aaؤt prtyn tsaadfy tawr par trbyt kay doran sy ayn ayn main kuch nywran chhwra dyty hain ، jo baky nywran ko mazeed mzubwta khsawsayat sykhnay par mjbwr krty hayn۔ madal ko trbyt dyn: aghla mrhalha sy ayn ayn madal ko byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk ghrydaynt nzawl ka astamal karty hoey trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par trbyt dena haay۔madal ko trbyt kay syt par trbyt di jati hay aur bakaadghy sy wkfwn par twsayk kay syt par is ki janch ki jati haay۔ madal ki wzuahat kryn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par sy ayn ayn madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur F1 askwr shaml hayn۔ CNNs main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh yeh zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwk sakta hay aur madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawty hay jesay amyj ki drjha bndy ، aabjykt ka ptha lghanay ، aur tkryr ki shnakht۔ khlasaha main ، darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn sy ayn ayn main astamal ki janay wali ayk tknyk hay jo zayada mnasb hony aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔sy ayn ayn main darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat kar rahay hain ، madal ko mrtb krrhaay hain ، darap aaؤt prtyn shaml krrhaay hain ، madal ki trbyt kar rahay hain ، aur madal ka jaizaha la rahay hayn۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata hay aur woh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony kay khtaray ko kam krskta haay۔

Question: khud sakhtha sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur kesi drkhwast ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: khud sakhtha sykhna ayk ksm ki mshyn lrnngh hay jahan madal khud ko ansany mdakhlt kay baghair khsawsayat aur mfyd nmaindghywn ko nkalnay kay liye baghair lybl waly dayta ki bray mkdar par trbyt dyta haay۔khwd sakhtha sykhnay main ، madal baghair lybl waly aadad wa shmar main lyta hay aur daytasyt kay ghmshdha hasawn ki pysh ghwiy karnay ya is ki tshkyl nw karnay ki kwshsh krta hay ya bhaanay waly kam kay tawr par tbdyl shuda hasawn ki tshkyl nw krta haay۔yha laptha ya tbdyl shuda hasawn ki pysh ghwiy karnay ya is ki tshkyl nw kay liye dakhly nmaindghy ka astamal krta haay۔trbyt kay bad sykhy hui nmaindghy ko bhaaw kay kamwn kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl tsawyry drjha bndy aur zaban۔khwd sakhtha sykhnay sy krshn haasal hawrhaa hay kywnkha is main daytasyt ki tyary kay liye kam wsail sy la kar wkty tshryha kay msail tak hawsktay hayn۔yha astamal kay maamlat main ayk namt hay jahan hum dayta sy mtalk chylnjwn sy nmttay hayn۔ayk aur chyza js kay liye yeh azaym hay woh hay bhaaw kam yany mntkly ki talym۔madalza ko ghair lyblda daytasyts par khud sy zayr nghrany andaza main pehlay sy trbyt di jaskty hay ، jo is kay bad mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlat kay l fine mazeed thyk twn ki jaskty haay۔ khud sakhtha sykhnay kay atalak ki ayk msaal kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) kamwn main haay۔zaban madalngh kay tawr pr.zaban ki madalngh main ، madal ko trbyt di jati hay keh aghlay alfaza ko kesi jmlay main pysh ghwiy ki jaye jo pchhlay alfaza kay pysh nzar hayn۔lybl laga hoa dayta ki zurwrt kay baghair mtn kay ayk braay karps par madal ko pehlay sy trbyt denay kay liye khud sakhtha sykhnay ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔as kay bad pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal ko mkhsawsa ayn ayl py kamwn jesay jzabat tjzayha ya mshyn translyshn kay liye ayk chhwtay lybl laga hoa daytasyt par thyk twn kya jaskta haay۔kmpywtr wyzen kay kamwn main bhi khud sakhtha sykhnay ka astamal kya gaya hay jesay tsawyry drjha bndy aur aabjykt ka ptha lghana۔an kamwn main ، madal ko shbyhaha kay ghmshdha hasawn ki pysh ghwiy karnay ya is ki tshkyl nw ya tsawyr kay mkhtlf hasawn kay mabyn talkat ko tslym karnay ki trbyt di hogi haay۔

Question: dstawyza klstrngh kay liye drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: dstawyza klstrngh kay liye drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: daytasyt tyar kryn: pehla kdm daytasyt tyar karna hay ، js main dstawyzaat ka ayk mjmwaha hay js main klstr hony ki zurwrt haay۔daytasyt ko aam tawr par dstawyzaat ko twknaiza karnay ، astap alfaza ko hatanay ، aur alfaza ko astym karnay kay zaryaha pysh kya jata haay۔yha mkhtlf tknykwn jesay bygh aaf wrdaza ، trm frykwynsy andars dstawyza frykwynsy (TF-IDF) ، ya lfza aymbydanghza ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ haaiyrarklykl klstrngh madal ki tamyr: aghla mrhalha hay js main drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ki tamyr karna hay ، js main shaml haay۔fasalha mytrk aur talk ka tarykha mntkhb krna۔fasalaty mytrk do dstawyzaat kay mabyn mmasalt ki pymaish krta hay ، jabky talk ka tarykha yeh taay krta hay keh klstrza kis tarah tshkyl paiay jatay hayn۔ madal ki trbyt kryn: aghla mrhalha yeh hay keh nkalay gaye khsawsayat ka astamal karty hoey pry prwsysda daytasyt par drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ko trbyt di jaiay۔madal isi tarah kay dstawyzaat ko ayk sath ghrwp karna sykhta hay aur alag alag dstawyzaat ko alag krta haay۔ madal ka jaizaha lyn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay tahaart ، ayntrwpy ، aur ayf wn askwr shaml hayn۔ dstawyza klstrngh kay liye drjha bndy kay klstrngh ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh isi tarah kay dstawyzaat ko ayk sath ghrwp bna sakta hay aur mkhtlf dstawyzaat ko drjha bndy kay andaza main alag krskta haay۔mkhtlf ayply kyshnza jesay malwmat ki bazayaft ، tykst mainngh ، aur dstawyza ki drjha bndy main drjha bndy ka klstrngh wsya pymanay par astamal hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، dstawyza klstrngh kay liye ayk drjha bndy klstrngh madal main daytasyt tyar karna ، khsawsayat ko nkalna ، drjha bndy klstrngh madal ki tamyr ، madal ki trbyt ، aur madal aur ، shaml karna shaml haay۔madal ka andazaha krna۔dstawyzay klstrngh kay liye drjha bndy ka klstrngh ayk taaktwr tknyk hay aur isi tarah kay dstawyzaat ko ayk sath ghrwp bna sakta hay aur mkhtlf dstawyzaat ko drjha bndy kay andaza main ghrwp krskta haay۔

Question: rjat psndy kay kamwn main mtalb askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay) aur mtalb mtalk ghltay (MAE) kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: aym ays ay aur aym aay ay madal ki karkrdghy ki pymaish karnay kay liye rjat psndy kay kamwn main aam tawr par astamal hony waly do mytrk hayn۔aym ays ay aur aym aay ay kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: mtalb askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay): pysh ghwiy aur asal akdar kay mabyn awsta mrba frk ki pymaish krta haay۔ chhwty ghltaywn sy zayada bray ghltaywn ka tayn krta haay۔ astamal ki janay wali ghltaywn ki shdt ko kam sy kam karnay ki zurwrt hay aur is ki zurwrt haay۔.myan mtalk ghltay (MAE): pysh ghwiy shuda aur asal akdar kay mabyn awsta mtalk frk ki pymaish krty haay۔ tamam ghltaywn ko yksan tawr par pysh krta hay ، ktaa nzar is sy ktaa nzar keh un ki shdt sy ktaa nzar۔ ghltaywn ki shdt aham nahin hay aur sirf ghltaywn ki smt ki smt۔MSE aur MAE dono ghltay ki pymaish hain jo madal ki karkrdghy ki pymaish kay liye rjat kay kamwn main astamal hawty hayn۔aym ays ay chhwty ghltaywn sy zayada bray ghltaywn ko szaa dyta hay ، jabky aym aay ay un ki shdt sy ktaa nzar ، tamam ghltaywn ko yksan tawr par szaa dyta haay۔aym ays ay mfyd hay jab ghltaywn ki shdt aham hay aur isy kam sy kam karnay ki zurwrt hay ، jabky aym aay ay mfyd hay jab sirf ghltaywn ki smt hi ahamyt rkhty haay۔aym ays ay aur aym aay ay kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay aur ghltaywn ki wsat ki ahamyt par haay۔

Question: transfarmr madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar kay tsawr aur zaban ko smjhnay kay kamwn main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: transfarmr madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar ayk ksm ka tarykha kar hay jo madal ko un pt trtyb kay mkhsawsa hasawn par mntkhb tawr par twjha denay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy drst pysh ghwiyan pyda hawty hayn۔kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) kay wsya rynj par madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye twjha kay tarykha kar ayk aham zaryaha bn chukay hayn۔twjha ka tarykha kar bohat sy transfarmr madalza ، jesay brt aur rabrta main astamal hawta hay ، aur madalza ko un pt trtyb kay mtalkha hasawn main shrkt karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، js sy drst pysh ghwiyan pyda hawty hayn۔twjha ka tarykha kar un pt trtyb kay mtalkha hasawn main shrkt kay liye swalat ، chabyan aur akdar ka astamal krkay kam krta haay۔swalat ka astamal twjha wzan pyda karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jo akdar ko wzan karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔twjha ka tarykha kar mkhtlf NLP kamwn main astamal kya jaskta hay jesay zaban ki madalngh ، mshyn trjmha ، aur mtn ki drjha bndy۔ zaban ko smjhnay kay kamwn kay liye transfarmr madal main twjha kay tarykha kar ko astamal karnay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta tyar kryn: pehla kdm tyar karna haay۔aadad wa shmar ، js main mtn ko twknaiza karna ، alfaza ki tshkyl karna ، aur trbyt kay nmwnay tyar karna shaml hayn۔ transfarmr madal ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha transfarmr madal fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main ankwdar aur daykwdar prtyn ، twjha ka tarykha kar ، aur fydafwrwrda prtyn shaml hayn۔madal ko trbyt dyn: aghla kdm transfarmr madal ko byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl ka astamal karty hoey trynngh dayta par trbyt dena haay۔madal kesi nksaan ki tkryb jesay kras ayntrwpy ko kam sy kam krkay un pt tslsl ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta haay۔ madal ka jaizaha lyn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par transfarmr madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، pryshany ، aur BLEU askwr shaml hayn۔ transfarmr madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh tawyl mdty anhasaar par kbzuha krsktay hain aur mtghyr lmbaiy kay un pt aur aaؤt pt trtyb ko snbhal saktay hayn۔twjha kay tarykha kar bohat sy transfarmr madalza main ayk mayary tknyk bn chukay hain aur mkhtlf NLP kamwn main pysh ghwiwn ki drstghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna chukay hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، transfarmr madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar ayk ksm ka tarykha kar hay jo madal ko un pt kay mkhsawsa hasawn par mntkhb karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔trtyb ، drst pysh ghwiyan pyda krna۔zaban ko smjhnay kay kamwn kay l trans transfarmr madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar ko astamal karnay main shaml aham akdamat aadad wa shmar ki tyary kar rahay hain ، transfarmr madal fn tamyr ki wzuahat ، madal ki trbyt ، aur madal ka jaizaha la rahay hayn۔twjha kay tarykha kar bohat sy transfarmr madalza main ayk mayary tknyk bn chukay hain aur mkhtlf NLP kamwn main pysh ghwiwn ki drstghy main nmayan bhatry laiy haay۔

Question: kmk sykhnay kay liye ghhary Q-nyt wrk (DQN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kmk sykhnay kay liye ghhary Q-Network (DQN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: mahawl ko tyar kryn: pehla kdm mahawl ko tyar karna hay ، js main ryasty jghha ، aykshn ki jghha aur anaam kay kam ki wzuahat shaml haay۔mahawl aam tawr par ayk khyl ya nkaly hawta hay js kay sath ayjnt taaml krta haay۔ DQN fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha DQN fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main un pt prt ، pwshydha prtyn aur aaؤt pt prt shaml haay۔day kyw ayn ayk aasaaby nyt wrk hay jo ryast main un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur hr aykshn kay liye kyw wylywza ko aaؤt krta haay۔ day kyw ayn ko ghair ykyny bnaiyn: aghla mrhalha day kyw ayn ko bay trtyb wzan kay sath shrwa karna haay۔ayjnt ko mahawl kay sath taaml karnay aur tjrbay ko ry play bfr main zakhyrha krkay dayta۔as tjrbay main mwjwdha haalt ، karrwaiy ، anaam mwsawl hony wali karrwaiy ، aur aghly ryast shaml haay۔ day kyw ayn ko trbyt dyn: aghla mrhalha byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl ka astamal karty hoey trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par day kyw ayn ko trbyt dena haay۔day kyw ayn ryast ko dyiay gaye hr aykshn kay liye kyw wylywza ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta haay۔ hadf nyt wrk ko ap dayt kryn: aghla mrhalha hadf nyt wrk ko ap dayt karna hay ، jo trbyt kay doran hadf kyw akdar pyda karnay kay liye astamal hony waly day kyw ayn ki ayk kapy haay۔asthakam ko bhatr bnanay aur zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay kay liye hadf nyt wrk ko wkta fwkta ap dayt kya jata haay۔ day kyw ayn ki tsadyk kryn: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par day kyw ayn ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay awsta anaam ، ksta ki lmbaiy ، aur kyw wylyw tkhmynay shaml hayn۔ kmk sykhnay kay liye day kyw ayn ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh sykhay hoey tjrbay ki bnyad par fysalay karna sykh saktay hain aur wkt kay sath apni karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔day kyw ayn ka atalak mkhtlf ayply kyshnza par kya gaya hay ، bshmwl ghym play ، rwbwtks ، aur khud mkhtar daraiywngh۔ khlasaha main ، kmk sykhnay kay liye ayk day kyw ayn ki trbyt main mahawl ki tyary ، day kyw ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat ، day kyw ayn ki abtda ، trbyt ka dayta aktha karna ، day kyw ayn ki trbyt ، ap dayt karna ، ap dayt karna ، ap dayt karna shaml haay۔targht nyt wrk ، aur DQN ka andazaha krna۔DQNs kmk sykhnay kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur sykhay hoey tjrbay ki bnyad par fysalay karna sykh saktay hain aur wkt kay sath un ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: mjaza aasaaby nyt wrks main bych ko mamwl par lanay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: bych narmlaizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo hr prt main aadanwn ko mamwl bna kar madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mjsmha aasaaby nyt wrks (sy ayn ayn ays) main astamal hawty haay۔bych ko mamwl par lanay ka bnyady mksad andrwny kwwyryt shft ko kam karna hay ، jo trbyt kay doran hr prt main un pt akdar ki tksym main tbdyly haay۔sy ayn ayn main bych ko mamwl par lanay main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta tyar kryn: pehla kdm dayta tyar karna hay ، js main dayta ko trbyt ، twsayk ، aur tyst main tksym karna shaml haay۔ sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha wzuahat karna haaysy ayn ayn fn tamyr ، js main prtwn ki tadad ، hr prt main nywrwn ki tadad ، aur ayktywyshn fnkshn shaml haay۔ aay day day bych ko mamwl par lanay ki thawn: aghla mrhalha sy ayn ayn madal main bych ko mamwl par lanay ki thawn ko shaml karna haay۔bych ko mamwl par lanay wali prtyn hr prt main aadanwn ko mamwl par laiyn aur mayary anharaf kay zaryaha tksym krkay۔ madal ko tryn kryn: aghla mrhalha byk prwprayshn aur astakstk mylan nzawl ka astamal karty hoey sy ayn ayn madal ko trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par trbyt dena haay۔madal kesi nksaan ki tkryb jesay kras ayntrwpy ko kam sy kam krkay un pt ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta haay۔ madal ka jaizaha lyn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par sy ayn ayn madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks jesay drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad ، aur ayf 1 askwr shaml hayn۔ sy ayn ayn main bych ko mamwl par lanay ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh yeh dakhly kwwryt shft ko kam krkay aur sykhnay kay aml ko msthakm krkay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔bych ko mamwl par lana mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay jesay amyj ki drjha bndy ، aabjykt ka ptha lghanay ، aur tkryr ki phachan۔ khlasaha main ، bych ko mamwl par lana ayk aysy tknyk hay jo sy ayn ayn main astamal ki jati hay takha hr prt main aadanwn ko mamwl bna kar madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔sy ayn ayn main bych ko mamwl par lanay main shaml aham akdamat aadad wa shmar ki tyary kar rahay hain ، sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat kar rahay hain ، bych ko mamwl par lanay wali prtwn ko shaml krrhaay hain ، madal ki trbyt kar rahay hain ، aur madal ka jaizaha la rahay hayn۔bych ko mamwl par lana mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay aur dakhly kwwyrt shft ko kam krkay aur sykhnay kay aml ko msthakm krkay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔

Question: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrks (GANs) kay tsawr aur tsawyry trkyb main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GANs) ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ka fn tamyr hay js main do aasaaby nyt wrks par mushtamil hawta hay jo ayk dusray kay sath safr kay khyl kay frym wrk main mkablha karty hayn۔dwnwn nyt wrks ko jnrytr aur amtyazay slwk kaha jata haay۔jnrytr jaly aadad wa shmar tyar krta hay jo kuch marwf aadad wa shmar ki tksym sy mshabhat rkhta hay ، jabky amtyazay slwk karnay wala asaly aur jaly aadad wa shmar main frk karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔amyj ki trkyb kay liye GANs kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta tyar kryn: pehla kdm dayta tyar karna hay ، js main tsaawyr ka ayk braa daytasyt jma karna shaml hay js main jnrytr nkaly karna sykhay gha۔ GAN fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha haay۔GAN fn tamyr ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، js main jnrytr aur amtyazay slwk shaml haay۔jnrytr bay trtyb shwr wyktr main un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur kesi shbyhaha ko aaؤt pt krta hay ، jabky amtyazay slwk karnay wala un pt kay tawr par kesi shbyhaha main lyta hay aur amkan kay askwr ko aaؤt krta hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh tsawyr asaly hay ya jaly۔byk prwpyghyshn aur astakstk tdryjy nzawl ka astamal karty hoey trbyt kay aadad wa shmar pr۔jnrytr jaly tsaawyr bnana sykhta hay jo hakyky tsaawyr sy mshabhat rkhta hay ، jabky amtyazay slwk karnay wala asaly aur jaly tsaawyr kay mabyn frk karna sykhta haay۔ GAN ka azaalha kryn: aakhry mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par GAN ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks shaml hay jesay aaghaza askwr aur frycht anpykshn fasalha۔ amyj trkyb kay liye GANs ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh aaly mayar ki tsaawyr tyar krsktay hain jo hakyky tsaawyr sy mltay jltay hayn۔GANs ka atalak mkhtlf ayply kyshnza par kya gaya hay ، jn main amyj tw amyj translyshn ، astail ki mntkly ، aur wydayw jnryshn shaml hayn۔ khlasaha main ، GANs ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ka fn tamyr hay jo do aasaaby nyt wrks par mushtamil hay jo ayk dusray kay sath safr kay sath mkablha krta haay۔ghym frym wrk۔amyj trkyb kay liye GANs kay astamal main shaml aham akdamat aadad wa shmar ki tyary ، GAN fn tamyr ki wzuahat ، GAN ki trbyt ، aur GAN ka jaizaha la rahay hayn۔GANs amyj trkyb kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur aaly mayar ki tsaawyr tyar krskty hain jo hakyky tsaawyr sy mlty hayn۔

Question: fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye rydayl bys fnkshn (aar by ayf) nyt wrk ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye rydayl bys fnkshn (aar by ayf) nyt wrk ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta tyar kryn: pehla kdm dayta tyar karna hay ، js main un pt aaؤt pt jwraay ka ayk braa daytasyt jma karna shaml hay js main aar by ayf nyt wrk sykhay gha۔tkryba .۔ aar by ayf nyt wrk fn tamyr ki wzuahat kryn: aghla mrhalha aar by ayf nyt wrk fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main un pt prt ، pwshydha prt aur aaؤt pt prt shaml haay۔pwshydha prt shaaay bnyad kay afaal par mushtamil hay jo un pt dayta ko aaly jhaty jghha main tbdyl krty haay۔phalay mrhalay main shaaay bnyad kay afaal kay mrakza ka tayn karna shaml hay ، jo klstrngh ، wyktr kwantaizayshn ، ya drjha bndy kay drkht alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔dwsray mrhalay main shaaay bnyad kay afaal kay askylngh pyramytrza ka tayn karna shaml haay۔tysray mrhalay main zayr nghrany sykhnay ka astamal karty hoey pwshydha prt ko aaؤt pt prt sy jwranay waly wzan ka tayn karna shaml haay۔ aar by ayf nyt wrk ka jaizaha lyn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh tyst syt par aar by ayf nyt wrk ki karkrdghy ka andazaha kya jaiay۔as main kmpywtngh mytrks shaml hain jesay mrba askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay) ya mtalk ghltay (aym aay ay)۔ fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye aar by ayf nyt wrks ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh bohat kam pyramytrza kay sath pychydha afaal ka andazaha lghasktay hain aur kmpywtyshnl mwsar hayn۔aar by ayf nyt wrks ka atalak mkhtlf ayply kyshnza par kya gaya hay ، bshmwl taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy ، sstm ki shnakht ، aur kntrwl۔ khlasaha main ، fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye ayk aar by ayf nyt wrk ki trbyt main aadad wa shmar ki tyary shaml hay ، aar by ayf nyt wrk fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna ، tyn fyza ka astamal karty hoey aar by ayf nyt wrk ko trbyt dena haay۔sykhnay ki askym ، aur aar by ayf nyt wrk ka jaizaha lyna۔aar by ayf nyt wrk fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hain aur bohat kam pyramytrza kay sath pychydha afaal ka tkhmynha lghasktay hayn۔

Question: mlty klas drjha bndy ki tshkhysa main mykrw awsta aur maiykrw awsta main kya frk haay؟
Answer: mlty klas drjha bndy kay madal ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye mykrw awsta aur maiykrw awsta do aam tawr par astamal hony waly tarykay hayn۔mykrw awsta aur maiykrw awsta kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: mykrw awsta: hr tabkay kay liye mytrk ko aazaadanha tawr par ghnty karain aur phir awstaa hr tabkay ka alaj karty hayn۔ jab tamam tabkat yksan tawr par aham hon aur is ka mksad mtwazan haasal karna haaytmam klaswn main karkrdghy۔tabkaty tksym ka adm twazan haay۔mykrw awsta tamam tabkwn ka yksan slwk krta hay aur jab tamam tabkat yksan tawr par aham hawtay hain tou woh mfyd hawta hay ، jabky maiykrw awsta akaؤnt klas main adm twazan ko mdnzar rkhta hay aur mfyd hawta hay jab mksad madal ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana hawta haay۔mykrw awsta aur maiykrw awsta kay darmiyan antkhab mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay aur tabkaty adm twazan ki ahamyt par mnhasar haay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: lfza aymbydangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main astamal hawty hay takha kam jhaty jghha main addy wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza aur dstawyzaat ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔lfza aymbydangh mfyd hain kywnkha woh aysay hi many waly alfaza ko isi tarah ki nmaindghy karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، aur woh tkhmynha many aur msanway aur manwy malwmat par kbzuha krsktay hayn۔ayn ayl py kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay astamal main shaml kuch aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta tyar kryn: pehla kdm dayta tyar karna hay ، js main mtn ka ayk braa daytasyt jma karna shaml hay js main lfza aymbydangh par trbyt di jaye ghy۔ lfza aymbydangh ki wzuahat kryn۔fn tamyr: aghla mrhalha lfza aymbydangh fn tamyr ki wzuahat karna hay ، js main un pt prt ، pwshydha prt aur aaؤt pt prt shaml haay۔pwshydha prt main lfza aymbydanghza par mushtamil hawta hay jo un pt alfaza ko nchly jhaty jghha main tbdyl krta haay۔lfza aymbydanghs kam jhaty jghha main alfaza aur dstawyzaat ko addy wyktr ki haysayt sy nmaindghy karna sykhtay hayn۔ lfza aymbydanghs ka astamal kryn: hatmy mrhalha yeh hay keh ayn ayl py kamwn main trbyt yaftha lfza aymbydangh ko mtn ki drjha bndy ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، aur mshyn trjmha jesay trbyt yaftha lfza aymbydangh ka astamal kya jaiay۔lfza aymbydanghza ko mshyn lrnngh madalza kay un pt khsawsayat kay tawr par ya bhaaw kay kamwn kay liye pry prwsysngh mrhalay kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta haay۔ ayn ayl py main lfza aymbydangh ka bnyady faidha yeh hay keh woh alfaza aur dstawyzaat kay many aur syak wa sbak par kbzuha krsktay hain ، jo is main bhatry lasktay hayn۔ayn ayl py madalza ki karkrdghy۔mtn ki drjha bndy ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، aur mshyn translyshn smyt mkhtlf ayply kyshnza par lfza aymbydangh ka atalak kya gaya haay۔ khlasaha main ،
