Answer: tnazaaha ko frwgh denay waly alghwrthm kay liye yahan ayk azaghr ki klas hay ، js ki bnyad askyt lrn kay ghrydaynt bwstnghryghrysr klas par mbny haay: paiythnfrm asklrn۔self.n_estimators = n_estimators selldayf ft (khwd ، X ، Y): self.model.fit (x ، Y) DEF pyshn ghwiy (khwd ، x): rytrn sylf.mwdayl۔ pysh ghwiy (x) ghrydaynt bwstnghryghryshn klas main tyn aham tarykay hayn: __init__ ، ft ، awrpysh ghwiy kryn۔__init__ ka tarykha tdryjy frwgh denay waly madal kay haaiprprmytrza ki abtda krta hay ، js main drkhtwn ki tadad N_ESTIMATORS ، sykhnay ki shrha sykhnay ki shrha ، drkhtwn ki zayada sy zayada ghharaiy ، aur bay trtyb byj bay trtyb_ astyt shaml haay۔ft ka tarykha un pt dayta X aur hadf mtghyr Y ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur tdryjy frwgh denay waly madal ko trbyt dyta haay۔pyshn ghwiy ka tarykha nya un pt dayta X main lyta hay aur pysh ghwiy shuda hadf mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔ ghrydaynt bwstnghryghryshn klas ghrydaynt bwstngh ryghryshn ko anjam denay kay liye skyt lrn ki ghrydaynt bwstnghryghrysr klas ka astamal krty haay۔an pt dayta ayks aur hadf mtghyr Y ko dlail kay tawr pr: azaghr askylrn۔ daytastyts draamd lwda_bwstnbwstn = lwda_bwstn () x = bwstn.daytay = bwstn۔ tarjtghbr = ghrydaynt bwstngh ryghryshn (N_estimators = 100 ، lrnngh_tyt = 0.1 ، zayada sy zayadha_dayt = 3 ، 3 ، 3 ، zayada sy zayadha)gbr.fit (x ، y) is sy un pt dayta x aur hadf mtghyr y ka astamal karty hoey tdryjy frwgh denay waly madal ki trbyt hawghy۔niay un pt dayta par pysh ghwiyan karnay kay liye ، niay un pt dayta kay sath pysh ghwiy kay tarykha kar ko btawr dlyl kal kryn: paiytwnks_nw = [[[0.00632 ، 18.0 ، 2.31 ، 0 ، 0.538 ، 6.575 ، 65.2 ، 4.0900 ، 1 ، 296.0 ، 15.3 ، 396.90 ،4.98] ، [0.02731 ، 0.0 ، 7.07 ، 0 ، 0.469 ، 6.421 ، 78.9 ، 4.9671 ، 2 ، 242.0 ، 17.8 ، 396.90 ، 9.14] ، [0.02729 ، 0.0 ، 7.07 ، 0 ، 0.469 ، 7.185 ،

Question: daytasyt ko astrytyfaida nmwnay lenay ka astamal karty hoey trbyt aur janch kay sytwn main tksym karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main astrytyfaida nmwnay lenay ka astamal karty hoey trbyt aur janch kay sytwn main daytasyt ko tksym karnay kay l we ، hum skkyt lrn laibryry 12 sy tryn_tyst_splt () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔strtyfaida symplngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh asal daytasyt main klaswn ka tnasb trbyt aur janch main brkrar rakha jata haay۔mytrks ، Y hadf mtghyr haay۔tyst_saiza pyramytr tystngh syt main shaml karnay kay liye daytasyt kay tnasb ki wzuahat krta hay ، jo is msaal main 0.3 ya 30 ٪ par syt kya gaya haay۔astratyfai pyramytr Y par syt kya gaya hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh nmwnay lenay ko hadf mtghyr Y ki bnyad par kaim kya gaya haay۔ yeh fnkshn char safwn ko lwtata haay: X_TRAIN aur Y_TRAIN baltrtyb mytrks aur hadf mtghyr kay liye trbyt kay syt hain ، aur X_TEST aur Y_TEST hayn۔tystngh fychr mytrks aur targht mtghyr kay liye baltrtyb syt krty haay۔ nwt karain keh tryn_tyst_splt () fnkshn ko trbyt aur janch kay sytwn main tksym karnay sy pehlay dayta ko dayfalt kay zaryaha tbdyl krta haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnana hay keh aadad wa shmar kay trtyb sy nmwnay lenay ka asar nahin prata haay۔

Question: bygh aaf wrdaza madal ka astamal karty hoey khsawsayt nkalnay kay l a ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: bygh aaf wrdaza madal ayk aysy tknyk hay jo tykst dstawyzaat 123 sy khsawsayat ko nkalnay kay liye kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main astamal hawty haay۔yha trbyt kay syt main mwjwd tamam dstawyzaat main paiay janay waly tamam anwkhay alfaza ki ayk zakhyrha alfaza pyda krta haay۔aasan alfaza main ، yeh alfaza ka ayk mjmwaha hay js main alfaza ki ghnty kay sath kesi jmlay ki nmaindghy hawty hay aur zayada tr is trtyb ko nzarandaza karna js main woh zaahar hawtay hayn۔bygh aaf wrdaza madal mtn ko addy nmaindghy (addy fychr wyktr) main tbdyl karnay main mdd krta hay jesay mshyn lrnngh alghwrthmza 4 ka astamal karty hoey madalza ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔bygh aaf wrdaza madal: paiytwnfrm asklrn ۔fytwr_ aykstrykshn۔ tykst ampwrt kaؤnt wyktraizar# ayk kaؤnt wyktraizar aabjykt wyktraizar = kaؤnt wyktwraizar ()# wyktraizar ko tykst dayta wyktwraizar par ft kryn۔= wyktwraizar۔ transfarm (tykst_dayta) mzakwrha kwda main ، kaؤnt wyktraizar asklrn main ayk klas haay۔ft () ka tarykha tykst dayta sy alfaza ko sykhnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur transfarm () ka tarykha tykst dayta ko bygh aaf wrdaza mytrks main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main BAG_OF_WORDS mytrks ayk wyrl mytrks hay jahan hr ktaar ayk dstawyza ki nmaindghy krty hay aur hr kalm alfaza main ayk lfza ki nmaindghy krta haay۔mytrks main akdar hr dstawyza main hr lfza ki tadd ki nmaindghy krty hayn۔

Question: daytasyt main ghmshdha akdar ko khtm karnay kay l a ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main many khamy anjam denay kay l we ، hum pandaas dayta frym kay flna () tarykha kar ko astamal krsktay hain aur kalm ki awsta kdr ko btawr dlyl 12345 astamal krsktay hayn۔aadad wa shmar kay syt main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar main astamal hony wali ayk tknyk haay۔as ka astamal aksar is wkt kya jata hay jab ghmshdha akdar addy hawty hain aur mtghyr ki tksym tkryba normal mamwl ki hawty haay۔ yahan daytasyt main ghmshdha akdar ko khtm karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay: PDDEF Mean_imputation (DF) kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas:# hr kalm kay wsylha ka mtalb hay = df.mean () # kalm kay sath ghmshdha akdar ko bhryn js ka mtalb hay df.fillna (mtalb hay ، inplace = true) waps DFIN ko waps karain ، DF ayk pandaas dayta frym hay js main ghmshdha akdar hayn۔awsta () tarykha hr kalm kay wsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur flna () tarykha kar kalm kay many sy ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwr ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh asarandaza hony waly afrad main daytasyt main ghmshdha akdar ko khtm karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha haay۔taham ، yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh agar ghmshdha kymt ka tkhmynha mstkl nahin hay tou is ka mtalb tasab kay ntaij ka baasa bn sakta haay۔

Question: trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye pwshydha markwf madal (HMM) alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas nafza kryn۔
Answer: pwshydha markwf madal (HMM) ayk shmaryaty madal hay jo mkhtlf shabwn jesay tab ، kmpywtr sains ، aur dayta sains 12 main trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aych aym aym ayk pydawary amkany madal hay jo ayk pwshydha markwf chyn ki wzuahat krta hay jo hr kdm par kesi mshahaday ko is amkan kay sath kharj krta hay jo mwjwdha ryast 3 par mnhasar haay۔aych aym aym alghwrthm main ryasty jghha ، mshahaday ki jghha ، aur ryasty mntkly kay amkanat aur mshahaday kay amkanat kay pyramytrza ki wzuahat karna shaml hay ، bwm-wylch alghwrthm ya farwrda bykwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey madal ki trbyt ، js ka astamal karty hoey pwshydha ryastwn kay mmknha tslsl ko zuabtaha kshaiy karna haay۔wtrby alghwrthm ، aur madal 2 ki karkrdghy ka jaizaha lyna۔ trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye HMM alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum HMMLERN laibryry 43 astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh hay keh hum anmyshn mytrks kay sath ayk sadha aych aym aym ko kis tarah nafza karain js ka astamal karty hoey hammlyirn ka astamal karty hayn: azaghr sy hammlyir ampwrt hammklas hmm: def __init __ (khwd ، n_states ، n_emissions): self.n_states = n_states self.n_modemissions = n_imissions = n_imissions = n_imissions self.n_imissions = n_imissions self.n_imissionselfis.hammlyir laibryry main ayk klas hay jo mjrd mshahadat kay liye HMM alghwrthm ko nafza krty haay۔N_STATES pyramytr pwshydha ryastwn ki tadad ki wzuahat krta hay ، aur N_EMISSION pyramytr mmknha akhraj ki tadad ki wzuahat krta haay۔an pt dayta ayks par madal ko trbyt denay kay liye ft () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، aur pysh ghwiy () tarykha un pt dayta x.overll kay liye pwshydha ryastwn kay sab sy zayada mmknha tslsl ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، HMM alghwrthm ayk taaktwr twl hay is kay liye ayk taaktwr twl haay۔azaghr main tslsl ki pysh ghwiy ، aur hammlyir is ko nafza karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: klstrngh kay ntaij kay liye slymyt askwr ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main klstrngh kay ntyjay kay liye slhayt askwr ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum Skleln.Metrics madaywl 12345 sy slhawyt_skwr () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔slymyt askwr ayk pymanha hay keh klstr main hr dayta pwaint dusray klstrwn sy kitna achhy tarah sy alag hawta haay۔askwr -1 sy 1 tak hay ، jahan 1 ka askwr is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh dayta pwaint dusray klstrwn sy bohat door hay aur apnay klstr main alag alag hay ، aur -1 ka askwr is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh dayta pwaint dusray klstrza kay kryb haay۔as kay apnay sy zayadha۔ yahan klstrngh kay ntaij kay liye slymyt askwr ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kis tarah nafza kya jaiay: azaghr askylrn۔ mytrks ko ampwrt slhawity_skwrydaf kylkwlyt_sylhawt_skwr (ayks ، lybl): askwr = slhawity_swr (ayks ، lyblza) rytrn askwr (ayks ، lyblza) rytrn askwr (ayks ، lyblza)، x khsawsayt mytrks hay aur lybl hr dayta pwaint ko tfwyzu krdha klstr lybl hayn۔klstrngh kay ntaij kay liye slymyt askwr ka hasab lghanay kay liye slymyt_skwr () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main askwr waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، slhayt askwr azaghr main klstrngh kay ntaij kay mayar ka andazaha karnay kay liye ayk mfyd mytrk hay ، aur asklrn۔ mytrks madaywl is ka hasab lghanay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: mayary kary ka astamal karty hoey fychr askylngh anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main mayary kary ka astamal karty hoey fychr askylngh ko anjam denay kay l we ، hum asklrn.prwsysngh madaywl 12345 sy astyndardars askylr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔mayary kary ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay keh is ka mtalb 0 aur mayary anharaf 1 haay۔ yeh tknyk is wkt mfyd hay jab khsawsayat main mkhtlf trazaw hawta hay ، aur hum inhain isi tarah kay pymanay par lana chahti hayn۔mayary kary ka astamal karty hoey fychr askylngh ko anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kesay nafza kya jaiay: paiytwnfrm askylrn۔ pryprwsysngh ampwrt astyndardas askylr dayf prfarm_ astyndardaaizayshn (X): askylr = astyndardas askylr () x_scaled = askylr.ft_transfarm (x) wapsy x_Scaledin mzakwrha kwda ، X haay۔astyndardars askylr klas ko fychr mytrks par mayary kary karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔Fit_transform () ka tarykha askylr ko dayta main ft karnay aur dayta ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay ntyjay main askylda fychr mytrks waps aaghya haay۔ awwral ، mayary kary ayk sadha aur mwsar tarykha hay jo azaghr main fychr askylngh anjam denay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha hay ، aur asklrn۔ pryprwsysngh madaywl is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: asmwt alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey aklyty tabkay ki had sy tjawza karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main asmwt alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey aklyty tabkay ki had sy zayada karkrdghy ka mzaaharha karnay kay l we ، hum imblearn.over_sampling madaywl 12345 sy smwt klas astamal krsktay hayn۔Smote (msanway aklyt sy zayada nmwnay lenay ki tknyk) ayk had sy tjawza karnay wali tknyk hay jo mwjwdha 1 ki tarah ki niy msaalwn ko tshkyl dy kar aklyty tabkay kay liye msanway nmwnay tyar krty haay۔as sy tabkaty tksym ko mtwazan karnay main mdd mlty hay aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrythm ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔ is ki msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk msaal kay tawr par ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk aklyty tabkay ko astamal karnay kay liye kis tarah ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza kya jaskta haay: azaghr imblearn.over_sampling draamd Smotedef prfarm_smwt_ awwrzamplngh (X ، Y):smote = smote () x_resampled ، y_resampled = smote.fit_resample (x ، y) waps x_resampled ، y_resampledin mndrjha bala kwda ، x khsawsayt mytrks hay aur y hadf mtghyr haay۔dhwan dar klas aklyty tabkay ki had sy tjawza karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔fit_resample () tarykha astamal shuda madal ko dayta par ft karnay aur dayta ko dwbarha trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main dwbarha tyar krdha fychr mytrks aur hadf mtghyr ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ is kay alawha ، smwt azaghr main aklyty tabkay ki had sy zayada smplngh ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha hay ، aur imblearn.Over_sampling madaywl is ko nafza karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: rjat kay liye fysalay kay drkht alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: rjat kay liye fysalay kay drkht alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum asklrn daat try madaywl 123 sy fysalha kntryrghrysr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔fysalay kay drkht ayk mkbwl mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm hain jo drjha bndy aur rjat psndy dono kay msail kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔fysalay kay drkht alghwrthm main khsawsayat ki akdar ki bnyad par aadad wa shmar ko mtnazaaha tawr par tksym karna shaml hawta hay jab tak keh rknay waly mayar ko myt 4 nahin kya jata haay۔ ryghryshn kay liye fysalay kay drkht alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko kis tarah nafza kya jaiay: azaghr asklrn۔: def __init __ (khwd ، max_depth = koi bhi nhayn): sylf۔ myks_daypth = myks_daypth sylf ۔mwdal = fysalha kntryrghrysr (myks_daypth = myks_ day py ty aych) dayf ft (khwd ، ayks ، waiy): sylf۔mwdayl.fyt (ayks ، waiy) dayf pyshn ghwiy (khwd)، X): khud ko waps kryn۔ mwdal۔ pysh ghwiy (x) mzakwrha kwda main ، fysalha kntrysrr asklrn daat try madaywl main ayk klas hay jo rjat kay liye fysalay kay drkht alghwrthm ko nafza krta haay۔myks_daypt pyramytr drkht ki zayada sy zayada ghharaiy ki wzuahat krta hay ، jo pehlay sy taay shuda tawr par kesi ko bhi syt nahin kya jata haay۔an pt dayta ayks aur hadf mtghyr Y par madal ko trbyt denay kay liye ft () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، aur pysh ghwiy () tarykha un pt dayta x.overll kay liye hadf mtghyr ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، fysalha try alghwrthm ayk taaktwr twl haayazaghr main rjat kay l and ، aur asklrn daat try is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: do mtghyrat kay mabyn bahamy malwmat ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main do mtghyrat kay mabyn bahamy malwmat ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum Sklearn.Metrics madaywl 123 sy mywchl_ anfw_skwr () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔bahamy malwmat malwmat ki mkdar ka ayk pymanha hay jo ayk mtghyr dusray mtghyr kay baray main fraham krta haay۔dwsray mtghyr kay baray main malwmat kay pysh nzar yeh ayk mtghyr kay baray main ghair ykyny sawrthaal main kami ka andazaha krta haay۔ yahan do mtghyrat kay mabyn bahamy malwmat ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko amly jamha phananay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr asklrn۔ mytrks ko draamd mywchl_ anfw_swrdayf hasab ktab_mwtwmywryshn (X ، Y): askwr= mywchl_ anfw_swr (x ، y) rytrn askwrn mzakwrha kwda ، x aur y woh do mtghyr hain jn kay liye hum bahamy malwmat ka hasab lghana chahti hayn۔mywchl_ anfw_skwr () fnkshn do mtghyr kay mabyn bahamy malwmat ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main askwr waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، bahamy malwmat azaghr main do mtghyrat kay mabyn talkat ki mkdar kay l a ayk mfyd mytrk hay ، aur askln۔ mytrks madaywl is ka hasab lghanay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: ghrda srch aur kras twsayk ka astamal karty hoey madal kay antkhab ko anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main ghrda srch aur kras twsayk ka astamal karty hoey madal ka antkhab anjam denay kay l we ، hum asklrn.mwdayl_ slykshn madaywl 12345 sy ghrda srch sy wy klas astamal krsktay hayn۔ghrda srch ayk aysy tknyk hay jo haaiprprmytrza kay hr mmknha amtzaaj ko mkml tawr par aazama kar mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm kay bhatryn haaiprprmytrza ki tlash kay liye astamal hawty haay۔kras twsayk ayk aysy tknyk hay jo dayta ko trbyt aur janch main tksym krkay mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔kras-wylydayshn: paiytwnfrm asklrn.mwdayl_ slykshn ampwrt ghrda srch sy wy ayf aar aw aym asklrn۔day ty ، pyrm_ghryda ، sy wy = 5) ghrda_srch.ft (ayks ، waiy) waps ghrda_sarch.byst_params_ ، ghrda_srch.byst_swr_nn mzakwrha kwda ، ayks fychr mytrks hay aur Y hadf mtghyr haay۔pyrm_ghryda pyramytr haaiprprmy mytrza aur un ki mtalkha akdar ki ayk lght hay jsay hum bhatryn karkrdghy kay liye janchna chahti hayn۔sy wy pyramytr kras twsayk kay liye prtwn ki tadad ki wzuahat krta haay۔ghrda srch sy wy klas fysalay kay drkht ryghrysr par ghrda tlash aur kras twsayk karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ntyjay main bhatryn haaiprprmytrza aur bhatryn askwr waps krdyiay jatay hayn۔ awwr ، madal ka antkhab ghrda srch aur kras twsayk ka astamal karty hoey azaalha main mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm kay bhatryn haaiprprmytrza tlash karnay kay liye ayk taaktwr tknyk hay ، aur asklrn۔ madal_sylykshn madaywl ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔as par aml draamd karnay kay liye

Question: bat chyt ki shraita pyda krkay fychr anjynirngh anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main taaml ki shraita pyda krkay fychr anjynirngh ko anjam denay kay l we ، hum asklrn.prwsysngh madaywl 1234 sy ksayr aljmaay klas klas astamal krsktay hayn۔bat chyt ki shraita do ya do sy zayada khsawsayat ko ayk sath mil kar ayk niy khsawsayt pyda karnay kay liye bnaiy jati hain jo un kay mabyn talkat ko apni lpyt main lyty hayn۔ yahan bat chyt ki shraita pyda krkay fychr anjynirngh ko anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaalha asklrn۔x): pwly = pwlywmyilfytchrza (taaml_nly = sch ، shaml_byas = ghlta) x_poly = poly.fit_transform (x) waps x_polyin mndrjha bala kwda ، x khsawsayt mytrks haay۔ksayraljhaty tabkay ki klas kay mabyn taaml ki shraita pyda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔bat chyt_wnly pyramytr sirf bat chyt ki shraita pyda karnay kay liye drst hay nah keh mtadd asatalahaat۔bat chyt ki shraita kay sath ntyjay main hony wali khsawsayt ka mytrks waps krdya gaya haay۔ bat chyt ki shraita pyda karna ، azaghr main fychr anjynirngh kay liye ayk mfyd tknyk hay ، aur asklrn۔ pryprwsysngh madaywl is ko nafza karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: ghawsy mrkb madalza kay liye twka-myksymaizayshn (EM) alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ghawsy mrkb madalza kay liye twka-myksmaizayshn (EM) alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum asklrn daat mkschr madaywl 123 sy ghaؤsyn mykschr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔EM alghwrthm ayk tkrary alghwrthm hay jo ghawsy mkschr madal kay pyramytrza ka andazaha lghanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔alghwrthm main hr klstr sy talk rkhnay waly dayta pwaints kay bad kay amkanat ki tkrary tawr par kmpywtngh shaml hawty hay ، aur phir un amkanat ki bnyad par ghawsy tksym kay pyramytrza ko ap dayt karna shaml hawta haay۔ yahan ghwsy mrkb madal kay liye EM alghwrthm kay liye azaghr klas ko kis tarah nafza kya jaiay: is ki ayk msaal haay:pythonfrom Sklearn.mixture draamd ghwsyan mykstrklas Gmm: def __init __ (khwd ، n_components = 2 ، covariance_type = 'mkml' ، myks_trains = 100 ، Tol = 1e-4).tol = tol self.model = gaussianMixture (n_components = n_components ، covariance_type = covariance_type ، myks_tr = myks_tr ، twl = twl) dayf ft (khwd ، x): sylf.mwdayl.ft (x) dayf pyshn ghwiy (khwd ، x):sylf aym aw day ay day ayl۔ pysh ghwiy (ayks) mzakwrha kwda main ، ghwsyan mykschr asklrn main ayk klas haay۔ mkschr madaywl jo ghawsy mrkb madalza kay liye EM alghwrthm ko nafza krta haay۔N_COMPONENTS pyramytr ghawsy ajzaaa ki tadad ki wzuahat krta hay ، aur kwwyrns_ taip pyramytr kwwyryns mytrks ki ksm ki wzuahat krta haay۔myks_tr pyramytr tkrar ki zayada sy zayada tadad ki wzuahat krta hay ، aur twl pyramytr hum aahanghy kay liye rwadary ki wzuahat krta haay۔an pt dayta ayks par madal ko trbyt denay kay liye ft () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، aur pysh ghwiy () tarykha un pt dayta x.overll kay liye mmknha klstr ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔azaghr main ghair nghrany shuda sykhnay kay l and ، aur asklrn۔ mkschr madaywl is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: drjha bndy kay madal kay liye K (ap@k) main awsta sahat sy mtalk ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔

Answer: azaghr main kfayt shaary hamwar (ETS) kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay l we ، hum statsmodels.tsa.holtwinters madaywl 12345 sy aasan ayks py ays aymwtngh klas astamal krsktay hayn۔ay ty ays taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ki pysh ghwiy karnay ka ayk tarykha hay jo mazuy kay mshahadat ki wzan kay awsta ka astamal krta hay ، js main mshahadat ki amr brahnay kay sath sath wzan main tyzay sy kami waka hawty haay۔yha ayk taaktwr pysh ghwiy karnay wala tarykha hay jsay ghair mtzalzal taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay js main koi rjhaan ya mwsmy hawta haay۔، alfa = 0.2 ، N_FORECAST = 10): madal = smpl ay ayks py ays aymwthngh (x) madal_ft = madal.ft (hamwar_lwywl = alfa) y_pred = madal_ft.fwrkast (mrhalha = n_forcast) waps Y_Predin waps kwda ، x hay ، x hay ، x hay ، x hay ، alfahamwar karnay wala pyramytr hay ، aur N_FORECAST pyshn ghwiy karnay kay liye wkt kay akdamat ki tadad haay۔sadha sy py ays aymwthngh klas ka astamal mkhsawsa hamwar pyramytr kay sath ETS madal bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔an pt dayta ayks par madal ko ft karnay kay liye ft () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ pyshn ghwiy () ka tarykha aghlay N_FORECAST wkt kay akdamat ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، ay ty ays pythwn main taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur astyts mwdalza daat ty ays aay۔ hawlt wntrs madaywl is ko nafza karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Answer: azaghr main mytrks ki tkmyl ka astamal karty hoey daytasyt main ghmshdha akdar ko khtm karnay kay l we ، hum fynsypt madaywl 12 sy saft aympt klas astamal krsktay hayn۔mytrks ki tkmyl mshahadha shuda akdar ki bnyad par ghmshdha akdar ka tkhmynha laga kar daytasyt main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔yha tarykha khasa tawr par mfyd hay jab ghmshdha akdar ko tsaadfy tawr par daytasyt 3 main tksym nahin kya jata haay۔ yahan mytrks ki tkmyl ka astamal karty hoey ghmshdha akdar ki khraby ko anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr sy mtalk ampwrt saft aaiympt dayf prfarm_mytrks_mpltyshn_mptyshn (X)) x_imputed = imputer.fit_transform (x) waps x_imputedin mndrjha bala kwda ، x ghmshdha akdar kay sath un pt daytasyt haay۔saft aympt klas ayk amptr aabjykt bnanay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo mshahadha shuda akdar ki bnyad par ghmshdha akdar ka tkhmynha lghata haay۔FIT_TRANSFORM () ka tarykha un pt dayta X par mwjwd amptr ko ft karnay aur ghmshdha akdar ko nafza krkay isy tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay ntyjay main hony wala daytasyt lwtya gaya haay۔

Question: tawyl klyl mdty mymwry (ayl ays ty aym) kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔

Answer: azaghr main kharjy mtghyr (ARIMAX) madal kay sath aatwrghrysys antyghrytda mwwngh awsta ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay l we ، hum astyts mwdal madaywl 1 ka astamal krsktay hayn۔arymyks ayk ksm ka aryma madal hay js main azuafy aazaad mtghyrat ، ya kharjy mtghyr shaml hain ، jo pyshn ghwiy ki drstghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔arymyks madalza ko taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy ki ayply kyshnza jesay astak prais ki pyshn ghwiy ، mwsm ki pysh ghwiy ، aur twanaiy ki talb ki pysh ghwiy ki pysh ghwiy 1 main braay pymanay par astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk azaghr fnkshn ko wkt ki syryza ki pyshn ghwiy ko anjam denay kay liye ayk msaal kay tawr par arymyks ka astamal karty hoey wkt ki syryza ki pysh ghwiy ki jaiay: Pythonimport stussmodels.api as smdef prfarm_arymyks_syryza_sryza_fwryza۔x_train ، y_train ، x_test ، aardar ، aykgh): madal = sm.tsa.statespace.sarimax (y_train ، exog = x_train [exog] ، aardar = aardar) madal_ft = madal.ft (dasp = ghlta) y_pred = madal_ft.prydakt (astart = lyn (Y_Train) ، akhttam = lyn (Y_TRAIN) + lyn (X_TEST) - 1 ، Exog = x_test [exog]) Y_Predin ko mndrjha bala kwda ، x_train aur y_train trbyt ka dayta hay ، X_Test hay ، aardar hay ، aardar hay ، aardar haay۔aryma madal ka hakm ، aur ayksgh aykwjyns mtghyr ka nam haay۔Statsmodels.API madaywl sy SARIMAX klas mkhsawsa aardar aur kharjy mtghyr kay sath ayk arymyks madal bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an pt dayta Y_TRAIN aur kharjy mtghyr X_TRAIN [EXOG] par madal ko ft karnay kay liye FIT () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔pyshn ghwiy () tarykha un pt dayta x_test aur exogenous mtghyr x_test [exog] kay liye mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwr ، armyks azaghr main pysh ghwiy karnay waly taim syryza kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur astyts mwdalza madaywl is ko nafza karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔ barnanalytks۔

Question: wyktr aatwrghryshn (VAR) madal ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main wyktr aatwrghryshn (VAR) madal ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay l we ، hum astyts mwdal madaywl 1 ko astamal krsktay hayn۔VAR madal ayk mlty wyryt pyshn ghwiy karnay wala alghwrthm hay jo astamal kya jata hay jab do ya zayada wkt ki syryza ayk dusray par asar andaza hawty haay۔VAR madal wkt par mnhasar mtghyrat kay ayk ghrwp ki nmaindghy krta hay js ki apni mazuy ki akdar aur ghrwp 2 main dyghr tamam mtghyrat ki mazuy ki akdar kay ayk lkyry fnkshn kay tawr pr۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk azaghr fnkshn ko nafza karnay kay liye taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy ko anjam denay kay liye kis tarhavar madal: pythonimport pandas as pdimport statsmodels.api kay tawr par Smdef prfarmns_wr_t taim_syryza_fwrysysngh (x_train ، Y_train ، x_test ، aardar): madal = sm.tsa.varmax (pd.concat ([Y_Treain ، x_train] ، xisis = 1)rjhaan = 'C') madal_ft = madal.ft (myksytr = 1000 ، dasp = ghlta) y_pred = model_fit.forecast (kdm = x_test) ، exog = x_test) waps Y_Predin mndrjha bala kwda ، x_train aur Y_Train trbyt ka dayta haay، X_TEST tyst ka dayta hay ، aur aardar VAR madal ka hakm haay۔astyts mwdalza sy wrmayks klas۔ aay py aai madaywl mkhsawsa aardar aur rjhaan kay sath ayk VAR madal bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔an pt dayta PD.concat ([y_train ، x_train] ، mhawr = 1) par madal ko ft karnay kay liye ft () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔pyshn ghwiy () ka tarykha un pt dayta X_TEST kay mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، wy aar tywn main taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur astyts mwdalza madaywl is ko nafza karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: kmk sykhnay kay liye mwnty karlw try srch (aym sy ty ays) alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas nafza kryn۔
Answer: kmk sykhnay kay liye mwnty karlw try srch (aym sy ty ays) alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum aym sy ty ays pykyj 12 astamal krsktay hayn۔aym sy ty ays ayk hawrstk srch alghwrthm hay jo msanway zahaant aur ghym playngh ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta haay۔alghwrthm ayk nwda ka antkhab krkay ، is main twsya karty hoey ، twsya shuda nwda sy bay trtyb play aaؤt ki nkaly karty hoey ، aur nwda kay aadadwshmar 3 ko ap dayt karnay kay liye ntaij ko byk prwpyghyt karnay kay zaryaha tlashy ka drkht bnata haay۔ aym sy ty ays alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko kesay nafza kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay۔kmk lrnngh kay liay: azaghr aym sy ty ty ays ampwrt myktsklas myktsjnt: dayf __init __ (khwd ، ayksplwryshn_ wyt = 1): sylf aym sy ty ays = aym sy ty ays = aym sy ty ays (ayksplwryshn_ wyt = ayksplwryshn_ wyt) dayf ghyt_ aykshn (sylf ، astyt): rytrn sylf daat aym sy ty ays۔ap dayt (khwd ، ryast ، aykshn ، anaam ، nykst_ astyt): sylf aym sy ty ays۔ ap dayt (ryast = ryast ، aykshn = aykshn = aykshn = aykshn ، anaam = anaam ، aghla_styt = aghla_styt) mzakwrha kwda main ، myk tysynt ayk aysy klas hay jo aym sy ty ays alghwrthm ko nafza krty haay۔kmk sykhna۔ayksplwryshn_ wyt pyramytr yw sy ty farmwlay main astamal hony waly ayksplwryshn wzan ki wzuahat krta haay۔aym sy ty ays pykyj sy aym sy ty ays klas ka astamal mkhsawsa ayksplwryshn wzan kay sath aym sy ty ays aabjykt bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔tlash () ka tarykha aym sy ty ays ki tlash ko anjam denay aur di hogi ryast kay liye bhatryn karrwaiy waps karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ap dayt () ka tarykha aym sy ty ays try ko pchhlay aykshn kay ntaij kay sath ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: ghawsy prwsys ryghryshn (jy py aar) madal ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main ghawsy prwsys ryghryshn (jy py aar) madal ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay l we ، hum skkyt lrn madaywl 12 astamal krsktay hayn۔jy py aar ayk ksm ka rjat alghwrthm hay jo un pt mtghyr aur aaؤt pt mtghyr kay mabyn talkat ko madal karnay kay liye ghawsy amlwn ka astamal krta haay۔jy py aar ko taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy main braay pymanay par astamal kya jata hay jesay astak prais ki pyshn ghwiy ، mwsm ki pysh ghwiy ، aur twanaiy ki talb ki pysh ghwiy ki pysh ghwiy 3۔ yahan jy py aar ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnfrm asklryn۔sghma = madal۔ pysh ghwiy (x_test ، rytrn_st day = sch) Y_Predin ko mzakwrha bala kwda ، X_TRAIN aur Y_TRAIN trbyt ka dayta hain ، aur X_TEST tyst ka dayta haay۔asklrn. gaussian_process.kernels madaywl sy talk rkhnay waly kanstnt karnyl () aur aar by ayf () klaswn ka astamal mkhsawsa pyramytrza kay sath dana aabjykt bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔asklrn. gaussian_process madaywl sy ghaؤsyn prwsysrghrysr klas mkhsawsa dana ، bakaadghy sy pyramytr alfa ، aur aaptymaizar ko dwbarha shrwa karnay waly N_RESTARTS_OPTimizer kay sath jy py aar madal bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an pt dayta X_TRAIN aur hadf mtghyr Y_TRAIN par madal ko ft karnay kay liye ft () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔pyshn ghwiy () tarykha un pt dayta X_TEST kay mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، jy py aar azaghr main taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur askyt lrn madaywl is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Answer: azaghr main drkhtwn par mbny khsawsayt ki ahamyt ka astamal karty hoey khsawsayt ka antkhab anjam denay kay l we ، hum asklrn madaywl 1234 astamal krsktay hayn۔drkht par mbny khsawsayt ki ahamyt khsawsayt kay antkhab kay liye ayk tknyk hay jo fysalha kay drkht main is khsawsayt ko tksym krkay haasal ki janay wali njast main kami ki bnyad par hr khsawsayt ki ahamyt ka andazaha krty haay۔as ka mksad yeh hay keh pysh ghwiy karnay waly pawr 1 ko brkrar rkhnay ya brahanay kay liye aaly ahamyt kay haaml fychr sbsyt ko tlash krna۔ yahan drkhtwn par mbny khsawsayt ki ahamyt ka astamal karty hoey khsawsayt kay antkhab ko anjam denay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kesay nafza kya jaiay: azaghr asklrn۔، N_FEATURES): madal = ryndamfwrst klasyfair () madal.ft (ayks ، waiy) ahamyt = madal ۔fytwr_mpwrts_ andayks = ahamyt۔ aarghswrt۔mzakwrha bala kwda ، X un pt daytasyt hay ، Y hadf mtghyr hay ، aur N_Features mntkhb karnay kay liye aaly khsawsayat ki tadad haay۔asklrn daat aynsmbl madaywl sy ryndam farst klasyfair klas ka astamal pehlay sy taay shuda pyramytrza kay sath bay trtyb jnghlaty madal bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔an pt dayta ayks aur targht mtghyr Y par madal ko ft karnay kay liye ft () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔fychr_mpwrts_ wsaf hr khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki ghnty kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔arghswrt () ka tarykha kar nzawl trtyb main ahamyt ki akdar ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur [: N_FEATURES] slais ka astamal aaly N_Features ki khsawsayat ko mntkhb karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔mntkhb krdha khsawsayat kay sath ntyjay main daytasyt ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، drkht par mbny khsawsayt ki ahamyt azaghr main khsawsayt kay antkhab kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur asklrn madaywl is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Answer: ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay liye mhadwd bwltzaman mshyn (aar by aym) alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum RBM pykyj 123 astamal krsktay hayn۔aar by aym ayk ksm ki nsl kshy ka madal hay jo ghair nghrany shuda sykhnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha msanway aasaaby nyt wrk ki ayk ksm hay jo un pt dayta kay ayk syt par amkany tksym sykhnay ki ahalyt rkhty haay۔aar by aym ays ko mkhtlf shabwn main braay pymanay par astamal kya jata hay jesay bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ، fychr lrnngh ، drjha bndy ، rsk ka ptha lghanay ، aur karwbary aur maashy tjzayha 3۔ ghair mahar sykhnay kay liye aar by aym alghwrthm kay liye ayk azaghr klas ko kis tarah nafza kya jaiay: azaghr kay aar by aym ampwrt aar by aym sy ayl aay ays aar by aym aylghwrythm:def __init __ (khwd ، n_visible ، n_hidden ، lrnngh_ryt = 0.1 ، n_iterations = 100): self.n_visible = n_visible self.n_hidden = n_hidene sylf..ghyr mnzam sykhnay kay liye aar by aym alghwrthm۔N_Visible pyramytr mriy ywntwn ki tadad ki wzuahat krta hay ، N_HIDID pyramytr pwshydha ywntwn ki tadad ki wzuahat krta hay ، lrnngh_ryt pyramytr sykhnay ki shrha ki wzuahat krta hay ، aur N_ETERATIONS pyramytr tkrar ki tadad ki wzuahat krta haay۔aar by aym pykyj sy aar by aym klas ka astamal mkhsawsa pyramytrza kay sath aar by aym aabjykt bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔tryn () ka tarykha kar un pt dayta ayks par tkrar ki mkhsawsa tadad aur sykhnay ki shrha kay liye trbyt kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an pt dayta ayks ko pwshydha nmaindghy main tbdyl karnay kay liye rn_wysbl () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main pwshydha nmaindghy waps krdy hogi haay۔

Answer: azaghr main bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay l we ، hum mkhtlf laibryrywn jesay tynswr flw ، kyras aur paiwrch astamal krsktay hayn۔kyras kay sath aar ayn ayn tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kesay nafza kya jaye is ki ayk msaal yeh hay khatslsl () madal.ada (LSTM (50 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (N_STEPS ، N_FEATURES))) madal.ada (ghhnay (1)) madal.kympail (aaptymaizar = 'aydam' ، nksaan = 'aym ays ay') madal.ft (x_train ، Y_Train ، Epochs = 200 ، wrbwza = 0) y_pred = madal.prydakt (x_test) Y_Predin ko mndrjha bala kwda ، x_train aur Y_Train ki trbyt ka dayta hay ، x_test tyst dayta hay ، n_steps ki tadad haay۔wkt kay akdamat ، aur N_Features khsawsayat ki tadad haay۔kyras.mwdalza madaywl ki trtyb war klas ayk trtyb madal bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔kyras.lyirza madaywl sy ayl ays ty aym klas ka astamal ayl ays ty aym prt ko 50 ywntwn ، rylw ayktywyshn fnkshn ، aur un pt ki shkl (N_STEPS ، N_Features) kay sath shaml karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔Keras.layers madaywl sy ghhnay klas 1 ywnt kay sath ghhnay prt ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔mrtb () ka tarykha kar aydam aaptymaizar kay sath madal mrtb karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur is ka mtalb askwair ghltay sy hony waly nksaan kay fnkshn kay sath hawta haay۔an pt dayta X_TRAIN par madal ko ft karnay kay liye ft () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay aur 200 aypwch kay liye mtghyr Y_TRAIN ko hadf bnata haay۔pyshn ghwiy () tarykha un pt dayta X_TEST kay mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، aar ayn ayn azaghr main pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur mkhtlf laibryrywn jesay tynsr flw ، kyras ، aur paiwrch is ko nafza karnay kay liye aasan aur mwsar tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔

Answer: azaghr main mwsmy aatwrghrysys antyghrytda mwwngh awsta (sryma) madal ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay l we ، hum astyt mwdal laibryry 123 astamal krsktay hayn۔sryma ayk ksm ka taim syryza madal hay jo rjhaanat aur mwsmy rjhaanat par mushtamil tarykhy aadad wa shmar par mbny mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔sryma armyma madal ki ayk twsya hay jo wazuha tawr par mwsmy ansar ko ghair mtzalzal dayta 1 main madal krty haay۔ yahan sryma madal ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy karnay kay liye ayk azaghr fnkshn ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnympwrt astytsmwdalza۔ aay py aai kay btawr SMDEF prfarmns_saryma_sryza_fwrysysngh (X_SERIES_FORECASTING (X_SERIES_FORECASTING (X_SERIES_FORECASTING (X_SERIES_FORECASTING (X_TRIMA_SERIES_FORECASTING (X_TRIMA_SERIES_FORMODELS.API۔mwsmy_adardar): madal = sm.tsa.statespace.sarimax (x_train ، aardar = aardar ، mwsmy_adar aardar = mwsmy_adar ، enfort_stationatibility = ghalat ، enfort_invertibility = ghlta) madal_fyt = madal.ft (dasp = 0) Y_PRED = madal_fyt۔)) Y_PREDIN ko mzakwrha bala kwda ، X_TRAIN trbyt ka dayta hay ، aardar madal kay ghair mwsmy jzaw ka hakm hay ، aur mwsmy_adar madal madal kay mwsmy jzaw ka hakm haay۔Statsmodels.API madaywl sy SARIMAX klas mkhsawsa ahakamat aur dyghr pyramytrza kay sath sryma madal bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an pt dayta x_train par madal ko ft karnay kay liye ft () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔pyshn ghwiy () ka tarykha tyst kay aadad wa shmar kay liye mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ntyjay main pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ awwral ، sryma azaghr main pysh ghwiy karnay waly taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha hay ، aur astyts mwdal laibryry is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krty haay۔
